2a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rin gyis durlabs kyi snying pa gas
2a2(rgyud): theg pa chen po'ir de// sangs rgyas dang ngang chub sems
2b1(rgyud): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na di ma
2b2(rgyud): rmed pa'i kun dga' ra ba dang / ri ne pi rba sna byidun gyi
2b3(rgyud): d+hIng na/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge' dun chen po dang / nyan
2b4(rgyud): thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
3a1(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri zad nga / lha ma yir dang dmakha' lding dang / mi 'am
3a2(rgyud): tswi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi
3a3(rgyud): mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing / mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu
3a4(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi nang nga nas bram ze shing sa la cher po lnga ba mkhas
3a5(rgyud): pa/ mdzangs pagasal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dag pa bcu'i las kyi
3a6(rgyud): lam yongasu bzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de// nga yang dkon mchog gsum
3b1(rgyud): la dad cing gus la phyag byed pa'i dge pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/ zhib ma brtags pa/ sems
3b2(rgyud): can thams cad dang dge bo'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ phyug pa/ rdzas mang
3b3(rgyud): ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas bram ze chen po dri medo legs snang bcom ldan 'das
3b4(rgyud): ga la ba der song ste par nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba bas nas
3b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang bdag pas mngon par mchod ngo // ni bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang
3b6(rgyud): gsol// bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal 'bum ri ba yang gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo
3b7(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal ti/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
4a1(rgyud): / skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sras kyi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gi sdum
4a2(rgyud): bar gdugs chod la spyan 'dren na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par cig nang / de nas bcom
4a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis spyan drangs par thugasu chud nas/ ci'ang mi gsung bar gyur
4a4(rgyud): bar gnang ngo // de nas bram ze chen po legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas cang mi gsung bar
4a5(rgyud): gnang bar rig nas/ des rings pa rings par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang / zhal
4a6(rgyud): zas dang / yo byad dang / zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po bshams nas/ bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal
4a7(rgyud): med chen po dang / gzhal med khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog drang bdag pa khyer te 'khor ma
4b1(rgyud): dang sil spyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nus bcom ldan 'das la du
4b2(rgyud): la bab par gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri mod legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// 
4b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i dus tshod la bab na
4b4(rgyud): bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci ga nAd de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang
4b5(rgyud): dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs te bka' stsal ba/ 'khor ji ltar lhags pa thams cad
4b6(rgyud): dang don chen por mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom
4b7(rgyud): ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung te/ 'od zer
4b8(rgyud): gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
5a1(rgyud): las yang dag par bskul te gzigs nas gshegs par shes so// de nas bram ze
5a2(rgyud): chen po legs snang gi mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul
5a3(rgyud): mdzes pa cher byas so// 'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
5a4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / m+b+ha phyi na na po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs
5a5(rgyud): ba dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang
5a6(rgyud): gshegs shul mdzes par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lam gyi bar gyi nang zhig na skyed mol tshal bde byed ces bya ba zhig
5a7(rgyud): yod de/ skyed mos tshal de'i nang na/ mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa tsher mas gang ba/ rtsa dang
5a8(rgyud): shing dang gyo mos kun tu gang ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu zhig yod de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa bya
5b1(rgyud): dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bar ba kha dog sna tshogs pa dag byung ngo // phyag dar gyi phung po de las kyang legs so zhes
5b2(rgyud): ba'i sgra byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so// deng ni gshegs pa'i lhas bzang po'o// bram ze chen po
5b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drang ba na yang khyed legs so// deng khyed la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
5b4(rgyud): bas mchod rnying de phyug dang kyi srang ba bu dang/ yan las rdzas phyag mdza nasad kyi sku mas na bza' gsil nas mchod rten
5b5(rgyud): pa la phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la gsal rten/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mchi ma byung ba chen po phyung bas bshums pa mdzad nas/ bcom
5b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad pa bstan te/ 'dzum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mthil na bzhugs pa bzhin du
5b7(rgyud): mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang spyan mchi mas gang zhing bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
5b8(rgyud): cad kyis kyang 'od zer bkye ste/ mchod rten rnying pa'i phung po der bzhugs so// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de ya
6a1(rgyud): mtshan chen por gyur te/ bad chad de 'khod par gyur // de nas gnad sbyin gyi sring pon lag
6a2(rgyud): na rdo rje lus ni 'dang zhing snying ni 'gul/ rdo rje ni gsor zhing / rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
6a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
6a4(rgyud): 'das ba shum pa'i snga lhas chen po gang 'a gang gis nA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mam mas gang ba'i sna ltas gda' ba/ bcom
6a5(rgyud): ldan 'das ci lags slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar tsa
6a6(rgyud): gnang de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na
6a7(rgyud): rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying
6a8(rgyud): po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der de bzhi
6b1(rgyud): gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba til gyi gang bu ji snyed gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa khar yas/ khar yas shes bya ba snyed
6b2(rgyud): sku gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba
6b3(rgyud): til gyi gang bu dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug tor dang spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so// lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnams grangs 'di gnas pa de
6b4(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon
6b5(rgyud): che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ni phan yon ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam
6b6(rgyud): grangs 'di ni bkra shis thams cad rdzogs par bye ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos
6b7(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos mig rdul mapo dri ma dang bral la/ de nas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bra'o// kha gcig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rdza
6b8(rgyud): go/ kha gcig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid zab bo// kha cig gis ni rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir 'ong ba'i/ 
7a1(rgyud): 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gan so// kha cig gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob bo// kha cig gis ni sa dang po'o// kha cig gri
7a2(rgyud): ni sa gnyis pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa gsum pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa lnga pa'o// kha cag gis ni sa drug pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bdun pa'o// kha cig gis
7a3(rgyud): ni sa brgyad pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa dgu pa'o// kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogaso// / bram ze chen po
7a4(rgyud): de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / sar sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu
7a5(rgyud): mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan
7a6(rgyud): yon gyi brgyan pa 'di lta bu thob na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du phud dang bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta tsa smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji lta bu yang
7a7(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang
7a8(rgyud): la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dri bar byed na/ lag na rdo rje des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang / 
7b1(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rje su bzung bar 'gyuraro// gang zhig klog par byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
7b2(rgyud): gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcangs par 'gyuraro// gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi
7b3(rgyud): gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyin gcig bzhin
7b4(rgyud): gzigs par 'gyuro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grang sa 'di la mchod pa byed pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang // / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyu dang / na
7b5(rgyud): bza' dang / lha ba lhub dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam// dge bsnyen ma des/ phyogs bcu dang phyogs re re'i de bzhin
7b6(rgyud): gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu la/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phred rgyu dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhab
7b7(rgyud): lbub dang / rgyan gyis mchod par 'gyuraro// phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab chen po tsam gyi phung po
7b8(rgyud): yon byung ba 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de rnams dang / 
8a1(rgyud): sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang la mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ mchod rten snying pa phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis
8a2(rgyud): brlabs nas/ 'di ni rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yino zhes zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
8a3(rgyud): 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten tu gda' ba bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi/ 'di ni
8a4(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yi no// lag na rdo rje 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ston pas nub par
8a5(rgyud): gyur gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bste la gyi snying po'i mchod rten rnams ni 'jig pa 'am/ 'gyes parami 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying / 
8a6(rgyud): bo'i sku ji ltar 'gyes par 'gyur/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur te/ lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sdig pa kun
8a7(rgyud): tu spyod pa dang / sdig pa can dang / dmyal ba la gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed
8a8(rgyud): par mi byed rgyu de dang / rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo// lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung ngo // dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ 
8b1(rgyud): 'di lta bu ni nub par gyur gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod
8b2(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar
8b3(rgyud): 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bris te/ mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi rdo rje'i stong por
8b4(rgyud): ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi gzungs kyi snying po gsang bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa
8b5(rgyud): til gyi gang du steng dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// 
8b6(rgyud): gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan nam/ mchod rten thams cad kyi nang du 'jog par byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs
8b7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar sbrel ba dang bcas pa dang / bkra shis dang / char kab kyi gzugs dang / dril bu bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
8b8(rgyud): du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang / byin gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / dam tshig gis byang chub
9a1(rgyud): kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// sems can gang dag mchod rten de la phung dud dang / sti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par
9a2(rgyud): 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// phyag 'tshal ba gcig dang / bskor ba gcig gis mnar med pa la thug gi bar
9a3(rgyud): la sogs pa rnams las yongasu thar bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// gnas gang na mchod rten nam gzugs brnyan
9a4(rgyud): 'di lta bu gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// phyogs der klu mi srun pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ sad dang
9a5(rgyud): ser bas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gnas der srog chags mi sbun pa dang / gdug pas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ gcan zan gyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bya mi srun pa dang / 
9a6(rgyud): ne tso dang ri skegs dang / byi ba dang / sre mo dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / byi ba dang / sbrang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / rta la'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur// sbrul gdugs pas
9a7(rgyud): kyang mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// phyogs der yams kyi nang dang / nad 'gro ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dra dang / brjed byed kyi
9a8(rgyud): 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / phol ma
9b1(rgyud): dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing / mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// phyon de
9b2(rgyud): ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khyi'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 
9b3(rgyud): dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin par 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin mtshon gyis ma yin zhing me dang chus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa
9b4(rgyud): ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po'i dmag gi 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang rtag tu rgyun
9b5(rgyud): mi 'chad par sa phyogs de srung bar byed/ yongs su skyong bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de ngag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang / 
9b6(rgyud): skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyuraro// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen po yang nyin mtshan 'thun par byed par 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun
9b7(rgyud): mi 'chad par mdangs mi 'phrog cing / legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyuraro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen po de la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa
9b8(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo // yul du gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo // bstod par byed/ 
10a1(rgyud): bskor ba byed par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyan
10a2(rgyud): de'i drung du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa la 'ong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin gyis rlob cing bzhug so// 
10a3(rgyud): mchod rten dang gzugs brnyan ji lta ji lta bu las byed pa'i sa 'am/ rdo'i 'am/ shing gi 'am/ dngul gyi 'am/ gser gyi 'am/ zangs kyir byed pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris
10a4(rgyud): te/ de'i nang du bzhag na/ bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// byin gyis ba rlabs par 'gyur ro// 'phang dang / them skas dang / kha sran dang / 
10a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdu gas dang / dril bu 'phyang ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du
10a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// phyogs bzhi'i kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan gnas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i
10a7(rgyud): mchod rten rin po che dang / sku gdung gi snying po'i mchod rten dang / mchod gnas su 'gyuraro// sku gzugs dang mchod rten de 'og min gyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongasu bskyang ba dang / mchod pa
10a8(rgyud): yongs su gzung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par
10b1(rgyud): rang lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ 
10b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yinino// rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i za ma tog gi
10b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par ci gnang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / 
10b4(rgyud): da ltar byung ba dang / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tham sa cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum ste/ chos kyi
10b5(rgyud): sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / de bzhin du sprul pa'i sku ste/ dus gsum pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi chos kyi
10b6(rgyud): rnam grangs yin no// / na mas+t+rai ya d+hi kA nAn/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta nAn/ oM b+hu bi bA na ba ra ba tsa re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ d+ha ra d+ha re/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ d+hA tu d+hA re/ pad+ma ma b+ha ti/ dza ya ba re/ 
10b7(rgyud): a tsu le/ sma ra ta thA ga ta/ d+har+m+ma tsakra pra brta ne badz+ra bo d+hi mat+te a laM kA ra/ a la~M kr-i te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha naM/ bud+d+ha bud+d+he/ saM bo d+ha ni saM bo d+ha ya/ tsal
10b8(rgyud): la/ tsa ban+tu sar+b+ba A ba ra ShA mi sin+da pA pa bi ga te/ hu ru phu ru/ sar+b+ba shoka bi ga te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-id ya/ badz+ri Ni sa~M b+ha ba sa~M b+ha ga ta thA ga te kuH/ d+hA ra Ni mu dre/ bu bre bu d+he/ su bud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ka
11a1(rgyud): ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hA tu gan+d+he swA hA/ sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Ti te swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ d+hA tu mu dre swA hA/ su pra tiSh+Thi ta/ stu pe ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ hUM hUM swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga Na
11a2(rgyud): uSh+NI Sha d+hA tu mu drA Ni swAhA/ sarba ta thA ga tAn sA d+hA tu bi b+hU Shi ta a d+hiSh+Ti te hu ru hu ru/ hUM hUM swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di bshad ma thag tu/ 
11a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
11a4(rgyud): shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod rten
11a5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang byin gyis brlabs pa yino// gang na ring bsrel gyi
11a6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di ston par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
11a7(rgyud): par rje su 'brang zhing bzhugs par 'gyuraro// thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// rje 'grus bshad pa dang / ji tsam na mchod rten
11a8(rgyud): snying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten du mngon par 'phags shing / 'phang dang / legs par rnam par 'phyes pa dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba pa
11b1(rgyud): bkra shis dang bcas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyinapa
11b2(rgyud): dri za dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la yi rangs te/ mngon par bstod do// 
11b3(rgyud): 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra pra d+ha dang
11b4(rgyud): zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de rtsangs de ben dra rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi gar+b+ha lang+ga ra lak+Sha d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 
11b5(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po rgyan 'bum gyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'alo// oM na mo b+ha ga ba to/ khi buM la ba da keny+dza nod kIg+ha/ prad+d+ha
11b6(rgyud): sa ke tu mar+d+ha ye ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+d+ha te samyakle bud+d+ha ya/ na mo b+ha ba te shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te/ sa myak+She bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+hi ni bo d+ha ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta gau tsa re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha
11b7(rgyud): ha ra khwa ha rare pra ha ra/ ma hA bo d+ha tsit+ta d+ha re/ tsu lu tsu lu/ sha ta rasmi sats+tshe da te/ sarba ta thA ga tAb+h+r-i Shi ka te/ guN+De gu Na ba ta~M/ sarba bud+d+ha kur+N+Na ba b+ha se/ mi li maM la ga gan ta le/ bA tiSh+Tha te/ sarba ta thA thA
11b8(rgyud): ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ na b+hastA le/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha me/ sarba pA paM pra sha ma ne/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni/ hu lu hu lu hUM/ ma hA bo d+hi mArga saM pre tiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga ta su pra tiSh+Thi te shud+d+he swA hA/ mU la
12a1(rgyud): san+t+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga tra bya ba mo ki te/ dza ma dza ya swA hA/ dza me/ oM hu ru hu ru/ dza sa mu khe swAhA/ u badz+rad ye/ oM badz+ra A su She swA hA/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen/ 
12a2(rgyud): nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gzungs 'di bris te/ mchod rten byas la/ mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na des mchod rten cig
12a3(rgyud): byas na 'bum byas par 'gyuraro// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur
12a4(rgyud): te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhig mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sabya kon log dang chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la yang ma chod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyu ro// 
12a5(rgyud): dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tsom za ba dang / 'tshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sems can dmyal
12a6(rgyud): ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang 'tshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang / dge
12a7(rgyud): slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de bzhin du rab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyu ro// 
12a8(rgyud): de ste de bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di la nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas na chos kyi rgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung
12b1(rgyud): dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// sdong pos rgyan pa bklags shing kha ton du byas par 'gyuraro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyuraro// byang chub kyi sku
12b2(rgyud): po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa/ 'bum gyi gzungs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dA da sha bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu
12b3(rgyud): gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
12b4(rgyud): khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs
12b5(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
12b6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i
12b7(rgyud): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu tig can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas na mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/ 
13a1(rgyud): sku rnam par spras shing legs par rgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam gyis brgyan pa/ rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings
13a2(rgyud): las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'dzam bu'i
13a3(rgyud): gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
13a4(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam kha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i
13a5(rgyud): sku dang ldan pa/ spos mchog dam pas mchod pa/ sku rnam par spras shing legs par rgyan pa/ gtsug tor gyi gtsug na nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'od smon lam
13a6(rgyud): gyis rgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongasu mya ngan la sa 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na/ 
13a7(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig
13a8(rgyud): pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
13b1(rgyud): chu zla gzhon nu/ nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad+ma gser sdug na mkha' lta bu'i sku rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab rgyan thogs med 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur 'od zer
13b2(rgyud): rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun snang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// shar phyogs de nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
13b3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bkod pa dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // tshig 'don to// phyag bya'o// lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
13b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa'i rgyal la dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med
13b5(rgyud): zla ba'i tog gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi nga gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa me tog bkod pa snang bar mdzad pa zhes bya
13b6(rgyud): ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mdzod ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de
13b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med rnam par gzi
13b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bral bog tsha mi mnga' spu zing mi byed ces bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag
14a1(rgyud): bya'o// 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge bgyings pa'i mid pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// steng gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs/ 
14a2(rgyud): pa gser 'od gzi brjid 'jigs bral rgyal po zhes bya ba'i mtshan kyang gzung ngo // phyag bya'o// byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos bcom ldan 'das de
14a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gi mtshan brjod la/ nyi ma bcur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshar par bya/ dge
14a4(rgyud): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rje su yi rang bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thang chos kyi dbyingasu yod
14a5(rgyud): su bsngo bas yongasu bsngo bar bya'o// 'on tang sdig pa thams cad zad par 'gyuraro// las kyi sgrib pa thaMd rnam par byang bar 'gyuraro// de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi
14a6(rgyud): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // mi 'jigs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun phun sum tsho pa
14a7(rgyud): dang / gzungs phun sum tshogs pa yang thob bo// ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa yang thob bo// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
14a8(rgyud): dge ba'i bshes gnyen phun sum tshogs pa yang myur du yong su 'dzin to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yong su nyams par yang mi
14b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro// 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe yang kun tu mdzes pa dang / de'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs
14b2(rgyud): pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs 'dra ba'i skye bo'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongasu 'dzin to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gang dang gang du skyes pa yi/ tshe rabs
14b3(rgyud): tshe rabs thams cad du// mthong na dga' zhing dga' byed dang // 'od byed pa dang mthu che dang // 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ba yin// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyis gzhi rnams kyang brjod par
14b4(rgyud): bya'o// t+r+ya b+hU a le ma khi sa me tu mu khe sa~MTak+She/ nI drug te pra b+he/ sa ma yo ga/ oMN+Di tsit+tan+te/ a khe mche/ mad ne/ bi bat+te/ sa man+ta mu \u0f7f/ sad t+ta me/ s+'uk+She pra muH/ 
14b5(rgyud): tsi li mi li/ ma sa le A na le tsa ne/ oM tsi ki tsi mu a ra te/ bdud / mA yu gr-i ha hes ba tiHtib ti/ d+harmAtsit+ta ts+tsha ti b+hag/ a bi k+She bi ra p+nak+Sha me/ skaMH
14b6(rgyud): bak+te// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig/ de la 'di skad ces
14b7(rgyud): bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni bzung byas na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams// de dag de la dgongs par 'gyur// skye ba dag ni kun tu yang // dge
14b8(rgyud): ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur// chung zad dge ba gang yin pa// don rnams thams cad 'byor par 'gyur// pad+ma'i snying por bzhugs pa yi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni mngon du mthong
15a1(rgyud): gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa// mkhas pa dpal ldan brdzus te skye// dran dang blo gros brtag pa dang // mos dang shes rab rab tu 'phel// thos pa thams cad 'dzin
15a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// thos pa rnams kyis yongs mi nyams// 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gi// mtshan rnams su zhig brjod byed pa// ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni// bzang 'gror sbyar bar
15a3(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// ting 'dzin dang gzungs kyi mchog de dag de la mngon du 'gyur// byang chub rab tu de 'tshang rgya// zhing ni bye ba phrag stong dag/ gser gyis bkang ste sbyin byin pas// gang zhig de
15a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi// bsod nams phung po de ches mang // rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// 
15a5(rgyud): mi khom thams cad rnam spangs te// sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// dad pa bla na med pa thob// sangs rgyas rnams la rab dang
15a6(rgyud): cis mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthong nas ston la rab tu dang // 'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni// mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams
15a7(rgyud): 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas// byang chub myur du 'chang yang d+ha// nyin zhag bdun du tshang bar ni// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// gang gis
15a8(rgyud): na rnams mang 'gyur ba'i gyi chem tsham ni myom par 'gyur 'dis rten mtshan pa de dag gi na rnams kyi gang 'dzin byed/ skye ba gang dang gang skyes pas don rgyas bya 'gyur/ 
15b1(rgyud): mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// bkur sti ma yin thob mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na grags pa 'thob// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la bskal
15b2(rgyud): pa du mar ni// lha rnams sti stang byed par 'gyur// byang chub myur du 'tshang yang rgya// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// mos med shes rab 'chal mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sgyu ni rnam par spangs// 
15b3(rgyud): rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang dri za klu dbang dang // mkha' lding lha min gsang ba pa// rtag tu de la srung bar byed// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun
15b4(rgyud): sum tshogs// nor che khyim du skye bar 'gyur// sems can kun la sbyin par byed// dpa' zhing gtong phod ser sna med// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang por// lha yi tsan dan dmar po dang
15b5(rgyud): shin tu dri zhem spros kun gyis// spos dang de yi kha nas 'byung // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/ bskal pa bye bar sgra skad ni/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par
15b6(rgyud): 'gyur// rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan/ mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// rin chen sna bdun pad+ma'i mdag/ bye ba stong phrag mang yod las// 'byor chen de skye lha gzugs ldan/ mtshan
15b7(rgyud): rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de ni pha ma sngun sdug dang / skye bo dag gi tshogs rnams dang / 'bral bar 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo // drang srong chen po rnams kyi mtsham// khung meng kyis ni bzung bya
15b8(rgyud): ga zud med yus la ma tshams nas skyes pa kri gros ldan par 'gyur/ mi yi lus ni thib gyur nas/ tha ming byang chub thob 'gyur te/ chos kyi 'khor mo ba brgod nas/ 'jo ba rje do
16a1(rgyud): mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa// de yi lus la mtshon dang ni// dug dang me dang rgyal po dang // g.yon can rnams kyis mi chug so// mtshan rnams 'di dag
16a2(rgyud): su 'dzin pa// de yi sems la nam kyang ni// dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa yi// bdud kyis glags rnyed mi 'gyuraro// 'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams// mi gang 'dzin par byed pa de// zhing ni
16a3(rgyud): bye ba bsam yas par// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams mchod nas// 'jigs pa med par zhu ba zhu// de dag de yis bsam mkhyen nas// rgyal ba de dag lung
16a4(rgyud): ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mgon po de dag las// lung bstan ba ni thob gyur nas// de ni shin tu yi rang ste// rgyal ba'i bstan la the tsom med// mtshan rnams 'di
16a5(rgyud): ngag 'dzin byed pa// 'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te// thos nas tha~Mng 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas pha rol phyin pa dang // mi 'jigs pa
16a6(rgyud): dang stobs rnams dang // mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams// ma lus par ni rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni// gang gi zhing du 'dod 'gyur ba// der ni bla med yang dag
16a7(rgyud): rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa 'am ni bud med gang // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa yi// yon tan 'di dag gzhan dag kyang // sangs rgyas bskal par
16a8(rgyud): rgyun tu gsungs// bag yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun sum 'di thos nas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa// de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
16b1(rgyud): 'di dag dpal snying po// sprin gyi rgyal po mi yi mchog/ 'jig rten mgon po 'di dag gis// mtshan ni bskal par gang nyan dang // gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing // thos nas gus par
16b2(rgyud): byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag shes rab che// rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// drang srong chen po de dag gis// 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas// bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur
16b3(rgyud): la/ shes rab ldan mi su mi 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de
16b4(rgyud): ngag dang / dge slong de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'ji garten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
16b5(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgya sa bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po
16b6(rgyud): dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
16b7(rgyud): sap+ta bud+d+ha kan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas po dun pa zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di
16b8(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ti se'i ri'i rtse mo lha'i gnas na drang srong gi spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi
17a1(rgyud): dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas 'dis ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
17a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po dang / kun tu bzang po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig
17a3(rgyud): tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ri'i rtse mo'i nags khrod de nyid na/ dge slong zhig 'byung pos zin nas rdol zhing gtsor bu gos med la lag pa sgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug pa
17a4(rgyud): gzigaso// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po namakha'i snying pos/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
17a5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i dkyil na kyi hud ces
17a6(rgyud): sgra 'byin pa 'dri dang / dge slong gcer bu gos ma mchis la lag pa stong pa cig shos 'di yang su zhig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17a7(rgyud): chen po rnam pa'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ nam pa'i snying po 'di ni nad kyis btab pa yin no// cig shos 'di yang nad kyis btab pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
17a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam kha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// nang thad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po bzlog pa'i rig sngags bcom ldan 'das kyi
17b1(rgyud): bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa mdzad de/ de nas ma mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung ngo // bdun pa ni sangs rgyas
17b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i
17b3(rgyud): don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya
17b4(rgyud): thA/ oM ha la ha la/ hi li hi lA ya/ na mau dza ga na mi tsi nA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzhi kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
17b5(rgyud): po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam kha'i snying po gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'chang ngam k+ko ga gam kun chub par byed na de'i lus la mtshon
17b6(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang / sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// de dug zos kyang zas bzhin du 'gyuraro// 
17b7(rgyud): ras dang skom la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te thos na/ pha rlos gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // nang thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 
17b8(rgyud): dbadzin gshegs pa 'dun gyi mazus po mdzang bar 'gyu'o// char bam pa'i ni bar rnas brjod byas la bla ma'i mar snar ni/ yang ba skal kyis pam pa rnamam sa
18a1(rgyud): / ngag srung ba la sngon po dang / shu ti dang / nyeru shing ba rnams bsres pa'i mar byin na nang thams cad sos par 'gyur/ las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// des
18a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog/ 
18a3(rgyud): ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha yan mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHse g+ha ya/ oM ba tsa ba tsa ba tsA ya pa tsA ya/ sarba b+hU tA nA~M tsi ta ya/ ki lA ya pa ra bid+yAn+da
18a4(rgyud): swA hA/ na mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'go mnyes pa dang / rmi lam ngan thang bzlog
18a5(rgyud): pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgag pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing / ngas kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di zung shig/ 
18a6(rgyud): namakha'i snying po gang la la zhig nga'i snying po 'di nyin lan gsum yid la byed na de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs
18a7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyuraro// gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed par 'gyuraro// de nas 'di'i
18a8(rgyud): cho ga gzhan ni/ nad thams cad la skud pa bcing bar bya'o// 'dus pa las gyur pa la ni sna ma'i mar la bzlas brjod byas te sbyin no// chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// skud pas bdag
18b1(rgyud): / sbyang ngo // byis pa rnams kyi gdon dag la skud ba sngon po gdag so// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar lan bdun bzlas brjod bya'o// gzhan dag la yang rang gi blos sbyar bar bya'o// denas
18b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thang bzlog
18b3(rgyud): ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ oM ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ku long sA da naM/ ku ru sarba gra ha NaM swA hA/ 
18b4(rgyud): namakha'i snying po gsang sngag ci ni 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis gsungs shing / ngas kyang nga
18b5(rgyud): ltar bshad de/ namakha'i snying po khyod kyis gsang sngags pa/ zhi 'di dag zung shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed mdo'i lus la mtshon gyis
18b6(rgyud): mi tshugs dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig drug gis mi tshugs/ ris nad kyis mi 'debs shing chu dang dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrub pa
18b7(rgyud): rnams ni ma ga / sa stong // dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen mas dge bsnyen ma gang lal zhog dang par sangs nas mgo ba sa te bzhin gshegs pa'i spyang sngam la
18b8(rgyud): sa na ngo sa kyi grub pa thams cad byang bar 'gyug/ des sems can snang ba gang ga rgyal po rnams pag ma smra bar 'chu'o/ mams can ma pa nga
19a1(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad kyi nang du yid la bya'o// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gangag so// mig nang la shing 'o ma can
19a2(rgyud): las skud pa byas te rna ba la gdag so// dmag rengs par byed par 'dod pas zho dang sbrang rtsil bsngags pa'i 'bras yos lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// rA dzA naM rA dzA ma tra ma bA
19a3(rgyud): shi kA re t+yA kA ma ma'o ma can gyi shing gi sngar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thang dang / sdig pa
19a4(rgyud): sbyangs shing dpal chen po dang / nor gyi phung po chen po sgrub par 'dod na/ 'o ma can gyi shing sbar shing gis me bus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o// sdig pa ji snyed pa
19a5(rgyud): thang sbyangs par 'dod pa dang / rig sngags thams cad sgrub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu ti dang / na lang dang / khre dang / shi ri sha dang / rgya spos dang / 
19a6(rgyud): gur gum dang / bla sgang dang / in+d+ra ba ru dang / byang chub kyi shing dang / a mra'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bya zhing
19a7(rgyud): bum pa gsar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi
19a8(rgyud): spyan sngar seng ljang gi phur ma spyi bor spyugs la brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas smos te sbyin sreg byas na dug mi gdug par 'gyuraro// gdon dang / srung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thang
19b1(rgyud): la yang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i'o
19b2(rgyud): don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ na maHkra
19b3(rgyud): kuts+tshan dA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ad+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ka Ta ka rba/ ki Ti ki gi ki thi ki shri/ ki TA pa ya na maHswA hA/ na mkha'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
19b4(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par dang sel ces bya ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag ni sa gsungs shing rje su yi rang ba'i snying po 'di khyod kyis
19b5(rgyud): zung shig/ blangs shing bzung ste/ kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i tshe dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag de'i tshe dkon mchog gsum la dad pa rnyed
19b6(rgyud): nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dag gi mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par 'gyur te/ tshe rabs bdun du tshe
19b7(rgyud): rabs dran par 'gyuraro// lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par 'gyuraro// yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// yang na cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na de mir skye ba tha ma
19b8(rgyud): thob par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ tshe 'di la yang rtag tu brjod na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// thos pa 'dzin par
20a1(rgyud): / 'gyur ro// zas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun bsngags te zos 'thungs na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyuraro// ji ste skom zhi bar 'dod na/ bza' thams cad la
20a2(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya'o// lkog rgal bcad na zangs khab kyis bya'o// 'thab pa dang / rjod pa dang / bcings pa thams cad las thar bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ste/ rtag tu
20a3(rgyud): nor yang 'phel bar 'gyur/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyuraro// ci ste de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod na des phyogs gtsang mar 'jig rten gyi 'khor
20a4(rgyud): sar dkyil 'khor bskus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sngas shar phyogasu bstan te nyal na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
20a5(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyuraro// yod la ci smos pa thams cad ston to// tshe 'am stobs sam 'pham rgyal thams cad kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub ste gi namakha'
20a6(rgyud): la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo
20a7(rgyud): bud+d+ha yan mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsaM g+ha yan ma ka na ka mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+tar+d+ha te samyakle bobud+d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ si ro sa ri/ si ri si ri/ sI rA ya/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma
20a8(rgyud): d+hu me d+hu ma d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu ma gan mo na ma ka na ga sun be Na thA ga tA ye/ an+ta tes s+ya kle prad+hA ya swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'o stong / 
20b1(rgyud): po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// na mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce 'bab
20b2(rgyud): pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug tha~Md kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur/ dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ 
20b3(rgyud): tshe ring por 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod
20b4(rgyud): byas na sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyuraro// ci ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed par 'dod na ci nus su gtor ma gtong zhing pog gam/ a ga rus bdugs la gza' thang la
20b5(rgyud): khrus bya'o// mdze dang skangs nad dang mtshan sman la shu dag 'jam po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngag
20b6(rgyud): la bkus na mdze nad thams cad sos par 'gyuraro// zhag bzhi pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snga ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te mi'i mgol
20b7(rgyud): bcings na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyuraro// mtshon btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byed las thar bar 'gyuraro// lus hrul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me
20b8(rgyud): tog gis bdug go// de la sogs pa'i las rnams byed de/ las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la
21a1(rgyud): phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ 
21a2(rgyud): na maHsaM g+hA ya/ oM ha ra ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ha sAn ma kA shrA pA ya / ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te sa mak+saM bud+d+ha ya/ sid d+hAn+t+ra man+t+ra pA da swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub
21a3(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying ba~M la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mkha'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye
21a4(rgyud): ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ na mkha'i snying po khyod kyis kyang snying po 'di zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par
21a5(rgyud): byed dam/ nyin mo 'am mtshan mo lan gsum bzlas brjod byed na/ mdor na rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur
21a6(rgyud): te/ sngon gyi las ni ma gtog so// las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// mdze dang sha kar la sogs pa la sogs pa la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
21a7(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bsngags te bklags shing bkrus na sos par 'gyuraro// klad pa na ba la sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan
21a8(rgyud): sngar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad du yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nA brjes de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa steng gi na mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la
21b1(rgyud): phan pa'i don gyi phyir rig sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+ha ya/ na mo d+har+m+ma ya/ na maHsa~M g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me/ ma hA g+h+rA me/ ta le ta le/ ma hA ta le/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ 
21b2(rgyud): d+hu re d+hu re/ ma hA d+hu re/ ti ri ti ri/ ma hA ti ri/ ki li ki li/ ma hA ki li/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA tsu ru/ mi li mau li/ ma hA ma li/ ti li ti li/ ma hA ta li/ d+hu me d+hu me/ ma hA d+hu me/ tsa le tsa le/ ma hA tsa le/ 
21b3(rgyud): khaM ri khi ri/ ma hA khi ri/ tsi li tsi li/ ma hA tsi li swA hA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces
21b4(rgyud): bka' stsal to// klad pa'i nad bsal na mtshon dang lag mthil gyis bya'o// sprin bzlog na shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas bya'o// dug spon chus bya'o// las gzhan rnams kyang bya'o// 
21b5(rgyud): khrus kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o// cho ga thad dus thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
21b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po yi rangs te/  ma ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bdun pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo
21b7(rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha a~M ga ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 
21b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung chen po'i 'gram na/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / 
22a1(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag skyes
22a2(rgyud): pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la 'jigs pa chen po 'di dag 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste rga ba dang / na ba dang / chung pa dang / 'chi ba'o// de la yang 'jigs pa chen po
22a3(rgyud): gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa chen po ste/ btsam pa med pa/ gnyen po med pag/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'o// rgyal po chen po dag de la/ 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i
22a4(rgyud): gnyen po ngas 'dir brjod par bya'o// de nas btso/ ma ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ bcom ldan
22a5(rgyud): 'das kyis srog rab tu stsal pas skye dgu rjes gzung ba 'di ni/ deng bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogasu thugs mngon du
22a6(rgyud): phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md la bskul te/ 'di skad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang
22a7(rgyud): su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig/ 
22a8(rgyud): des na bdag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o// sngon ma
22b1(rgyud): bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o// zhes gsung ngo // de bzhin du/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thang la bskul te/ 'di skad
22b2(rgyud): ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b3(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces/ gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang / 
22b4(rgyud): stobs dang / kha dog dang ldan pa yongasu grub cing / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thaMd bdag gi grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de na
22b5(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi spyan la snang bar gyur pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham ngag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi gang du
22b6(rgyud): bzhin du gang te/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad ces gsu// tad+ya thA tsal rtsa
22b7(rgyud): la tsa le bin ti/ sastai ke/ tsakra e ga ti/ pra sha maM du/ sarba ro ga a na te/ kuN+De kuN+De/ ma hA kuN+De/ tsa re tsa re re/ he ma gi ri/ he ma go ri/ he ma ni shun+ti/ he ma si si/ kau ra be kaur ba ge he ku ra re/ 
22b8(rgyud): ku ra re ku ma ti/ bi Sha sa ma Ni/ shi 'u b+hi/ tsa le tsa lo/ bi tsa le mA bi laM ba hu mu hu mu swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po ji snyed pa thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye
23a1(rgyud): bar 'dug nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ hUM hUM/ si si swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
23a2(rgyud): la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis srung bar bgyi'o// dus ma lags
23a3(rgyud): par 'gum pa las bzlog par bgyi'o// tad+ya thA/ shwe te shwe te shwe te/ le li li/ 'phags skyes pos kyang smras pa/ mA taM ge mA taM ge/ mA taM gi ni/ shU mA shA mA/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang
23a4(rgyud): smras pa/ tsa re tsa re re/ swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang smras gab li ba pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig sangs rgyas
23a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re/ 'don na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am
23a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo de ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dis sems can tha~Md kyi srog la phan btags par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi don tu nyin cig bzhin
23a7(rgyud): du tshig tu 'don pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do// de'i lus la nang ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyuraro// 
23a8(rgyud): mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab pas ma yin no// gang la la rgyal ba'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
23b1(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o// yi ger 'dri ba 'am yi ger 'jug pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro bya ba thams cad kyi sti stang byas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
23b2(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung ba'i phyir ro// su zhig gis 'di bris nas yan lag la
23b3(rgyud): btags na de'i yan lag thang bsrungs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang
23b4(rgyud): lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa
23b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkha na po dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsAb ba na de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skang gas
23b6(rgyud): chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud+d+ha hrid yaM nA ma d+hA ra Ni d+harma par+yA ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i
23b7(rgyud): gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
23b8(rgyud): spyod yul/ chos kyi dbyings dgon pa/ rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyi rnam par spyad pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod/ 
24a1(rgyud): / pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjesu spyod pa// kun nas 'od zer gyi khang bzang dbus na/ 
24a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thaMd
24a3(rgyud): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang / ting 'dzin sna tshogs thob pa/ sha stag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas thabs gcig tu
24a4(rgyud): bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po
24a5(rgyud): la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i chos kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
24a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
24a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bye ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ 
24a8(rgyud): dang dam/ lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur// sangs/ 
24b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la rim
24b2(rgyud): gro byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khor ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir rnyil bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du
24b3(rgyud): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung po'i tshogs thang srung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
24b4(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshugs par
24b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang // dug gzhil bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud
24b6(rgyud): sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yid la byas pa der bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing / sngangs la sngangs
24b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyuraro// de la 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// sangs rgyas kyi chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas thad kyi tshig go// de
24b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshig yin no// tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he su bud+d+he/ ma hA bud+d+he/ i hA bud+d+he/ ta tra bud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha ma ti bud+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/ a nu ma he/ sar+b+ba bud+d+he/ a nu dz+nyA na te/ bud+d+he/ bud+d+ha / bud+d+ha / bud+d+ha/ 
25a1(rgyud): bud+d+ha bud+d+ha / bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha / bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas mod kyi/ gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor na chos sgom pa'o// gzungs 'di ni sen rnams
25a2(rgyud): kha thugs brtse ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa ste/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no// d+ya thA/ shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ su shud d+he/ sho d+ha ni/ saM sho d+ha ni/ nar+b+ba le ma la a ba ga te/ ga ti
25a3(rgyud): samA d+hi traM ti/ kra ma~M sa ma sa re sa rA sa ra ba ri a sho khaM sho ka sho ka sha ma ni shI te u pa shI te/ ba shA te/ a ba b+hA se/ sar+b+ba pu N+ye pa ri mi tate/ sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma pra ti maN+Di ti/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la ha ra/ Nar
25a4(rgyud): tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ tsa la tsa la saM tsa la/ ta la ta la ma ta la/ sa ma ta la/ ri Ne ri Ne/ su ri Ne/ sa ma ri Ne/ ri Na ma ti lo ka d+ha re/ lo ka d+hA ri Ne d+ha ra d+ha ra Da ra Da ra/ ro d+ha ro d+ha/ ma hA bi dza ya/ 
25a5(rgyud): bI hi ni/ ha na ha na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+he/ he pre shi tra si/ sarba dz+nyA ba the/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA pa ri mi te/ ma hA pra ti b+hA na/ saM ban+d+he/ sa man+t+ra/ a lo ke bud+d+he/ bi Sha ye/ bud+d+ha / pra ti me Di te / b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ 
25a6(rgyud): pra sa ra pra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ pra sa ra sar+b+ba sho ka a be ga te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi snying po gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas
25a7(rgyud): bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa yang g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrur/ 
25a8(rgyud): rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrug so// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang ldeg cing 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang skrag nas bdud kyi rigs kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can rnams
25b1(rgyud): shin tu sdug bsngal zhing / yid mi bde bar gyur nas nyam thag go// sems can gang dag sa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
25b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum ched du brjod
25b3(rgyud): do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis/ lha'i me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen pos bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs
25b4(rgyud): rgyas la skyabasu dong ba de dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba skyeso// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shAkya seng ge ya nga dag rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas skyob pas skad cig yud
25b5(rgyud): gang la// sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi ni snying po yi// gzu ngas 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yis// skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug g.yos// rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi
25b6(rgyud): gnas kun kyang // rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi rigs rnams ni// lha dag rab tu sngags shing 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya ngan non// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab
25b7(rgyud): zos nas// 'jig rten mgon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// nam khar gnas nas me tog man nga 'thor// gang dag sangs rgyas mngon dang gzhan rnams kyis// se mo de dang sho shal spos rnam
25b8(rgyud): dang / phye ma dag dang byug pa gos rnams dang // rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o// brgyad gang zhe ma 'di
26a1(rgyud): lta ste byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thaMd yongs tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos zab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
26a2(rgyud): rgyan dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin par shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin so sor rtog/ 
26a3(rgyud): cing spyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la mkhas pa'i
26a4(rgyud): rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad po de dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// ga/ zungs 'di ni rtag tu rgyun tu yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjesu
26a5(rgyud): dran pa bsgom par bya'o// gzungs kyi gzhi 'di ngag rnams yid la byas na/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// pad+ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya
26a6(rgyud): ba'i ting 'dzin kyang thob bo// nad thams cad dang / na ba thams cad la lag pas khyab par bya'o// bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
26a7(rgyud): stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ 
26a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ 
26b1(rgyud): Ar+ya puSh+pa ku Ta nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag
26b2(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mtsho chen po ma dros pa na klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i khang pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu
26b3(rgyud): bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa/ byang chub sems dpa' stong du chang pa thams cad kyang gzungs
26b4(rgyud): thob bo// ting 'dzin thob pa/ skye ba cig gis thogs pas bcu la gnas pa/ de ma thag tu rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskur bgago cha chen po bgos pa/ 
26b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ston thaMd la the tshom med pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba zhes bya
26b6(rgyud): ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba/ stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ 
26b7(rgyud): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
26b8(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/ de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
27a1(rgyud): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad rjes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
27a2(rgyud): bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur zhes seng ge rnam par brtse ba khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
27a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa/ ting 'dzin dpag tu med pa/ shes rab dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
27a4(rgyud): ba dpag tu med pa ste/ seng ge rnam par brtse ba gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu
27a5(rgyud): med pa dang ldan pa de'i phyir/ de la mchod bI rnam par smin pa de yang dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// seng ge rnam par brtse ba gang la la ngag de bzhin ga
27a6(rgyud): pa bzhugs kyang rung / yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa
27a7(rgyud): chen po 'am/ theg pa gsum los theg pa gcig gis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// seng ge rnam par brtse yang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
27a8(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong nas/ sems dngas par gyur la/ dad pa'i sems kyis rnyed pa dang / na bza' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / bsnyun gsos sman dang / 
27b1(rgyud): yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis sti stang du byas shing ri mor byas te/ mchod cing rjed la/ rim gror byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das
27b2(rgyud): pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gyi mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mnyam par shes par bya ste bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba med do// seng ge rnam par brtse byang
27b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang zhig gis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rin po che'i
27b4(rgyud): phung po ri rab tsam dbul ba phul ba bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang rab tu byung nas kar sha pa na cig tsam dbul bar phul la/ phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag
27b5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des/ dge ba'i rtsa ba phyi ma'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs
27b6(rgyud): dang cha dang bgrang ba dang / skrun pa dang / rgyu yang nye ba mi 'gro ba nas/ dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// seng ge rnam par brtse gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
27b7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lo gcig gam/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong yang rung ste/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs
27b8(rgyud): pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la/ byang chub kyi sems kyis yang dag par zin pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir me tog 'ga' 'bul lam/ chu snyim pa
28a1(rgyud): gang tsam 'thor ram/ drug pa'i theg le dri 'am/ me tog gi nyal nyil 'phyag gam/ byug pa 'bul lam/ spos 'bul lam me tog 'bul lam/ bdug spos 'bul lam/ 
28a2(rgyud): phreng ba 'bul lam/ rol mo'i sil snyan 'bul lam/ gdugs 'bul lam/ dri 'bul lam/ dpyangs pa 'bul lam/ rgyal mtshan 'bul lam/ ba dan 'bul lam/ dar 'bul lam/ mar
28a3(rgyud): me 'bul lam/ phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshalo// zhes smra ba de dag ni seng+ge rnam par brtse bskal
28a4(rgyud): par ram/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong du 'am/ bskal pa 'bum du'ang ngan 'gror log par ltung bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ 'di la dogs pa
28a5(rgyud): 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o// seng ge rnam par brtse me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod kyis/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po
28a6(rgyud): la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha dang mi'i skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bshad par bya'o// seng ge rnam par brtse gang la la zhig me tog brtse
28a7(rgyud): pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad pa de rtag tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// de
28a8(rgyud): ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ dal ba rnyed par 'gyur/ nam du yang dkon mchog gsum dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi 'bral bar
28b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ nam du yang sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang byang chub sems dpa' dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ nam du yang byang chub sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// 
28b2(rgyud): nam du yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam du yang rigs dma' bar skye bar mi 'gyur// spobs pa sna tshogs zab mo phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
28b3(rgyud): khams grangs med pa dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra Ni/ mu ni pra b+hA sA re/ sid+d+he tsaN+Da Nen maHtsi ni he re/ a ro ga ba ti/ bud+d+ha ma
28b4(rgyud): dra ye bud d+hi swA hA// seng ge rnam par brtse ba gang la la zhig gis me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di'i ming dang / yi ge dang tshig mtha' dag shes te kun chu
28b5(rgyud): par byed pa des/ dpyid zla tha chung dang / dbyar zla ra ba dang // ston zla tha chung yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas bzung la bco lnga'i bar du/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum
28b6(rgyud): mtshan lan gsum bsam zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la rtse gcig tu yid la byas la/ bcom ldan 'das la spos dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / bdug spos kyis mchod na sangs rgyas
28b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing / chos kyang ston pa bco lnga mthong bar 'gyuraro// gzungs rab tu thob par 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ blo gros dang ldan
29a1(rgyud): par 'gyur rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur blo dang ldan par 'gyur / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyu'o/ thos pa thams cad dang / bstan bcom
29a2(rgyud): thams cad dang / bzo thams cad dang / las thams cad rab tu shes par 'gyur/ ting 'dzin thams cad kyang de'i sems la gnas par 'gyur te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni ma gtog so// de
29a3(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag ni zag pa med par gtogs pa'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng+ge rnam par
29a4(rgyud): brtse dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong de ngag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
29a5(rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa me tog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi ma la nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ 
29a6(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
29a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par
29a8(rgyud): dag pa/ tshul khrims yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ting 'dzin yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam pa
29b1(rgyud): dag pa bzod pa yong su dag pas// de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag po blo gros rnam par dag ga/ phan pa'i dngos po yong su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag go// blo gros
29b2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa byams pa yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pas/ snying rje yongasu dag pa dang / dga' ba yongasu dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongasu
29b3(rgyud): dag pag/ de bzhin gshegs pa yong su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ rnam par grol ba yong su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongasu dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs
29b4(rgyud): pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / stobs yongasu dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu dag pas de bzhin gshegs
29b5(rgyud): pa yongasu dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa/ thams cad mkhyen DI l+le yongasu dag pas// de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu ngag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de
29b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag pa la/ su zhig me tog dang phreng ba dang / spros dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyi sti stang
29b7(rgyud): byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gto/ 
29b8(rgyud): par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thad kyi tshad
30a1(rgyud): med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so// bsam gyis mi khyab po// mtshungs pa med do// grangs med do// dpag
30a2(rgyud): gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag gsu zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la sti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor
30a3(rgyud): byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yung 'bru tsam la sti stang
