81a8(rgyud): gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyis gsungs te/ nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rje su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
81b1(rgyud): / rigs kyi bu mo gang kha la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ kun chub par byed na de tshe rabs bcu bzhi'i bar du tshe rabs dran
81b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyuraro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yino// tad+ya thA/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ ag+ne/ bag+ne/ tha/ Thag+ne/ d+ha ke d+ha ra d+hak+Sha
81b3(rgyud): Ta ke Ta ra ke/ a ka si/ sa ka si/ ma ka si/ i li mi li/ ti l-i mi li/ rau ra ge ma hA ro ra be b+hU taM ga me b+ha ta pa rA ya Ne ti mi ma gi se ma hA ti mi se/ saM b+ha be ma hA saM b+ha be/ bdag dang sems can
81b4(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thaMd dang // nad 'gro ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ kun dga' bo gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags
81b5(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu rtsa dgus gsungs te/ nga yang da lta na 'chad cing rje su yi rang ngo // kun dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi
81b6(rgyud): bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag 'chang ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa de tshe rabs nyi shu
81b7(rgyud): rtsa gcig gi bar du/ tshe rabs dran par 'gyuraro// de byang chub kyi sems las phyir ldog par mi 'gyuraro// de la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags gzhi ni 'di rnams yino// tad+ya thA ru le ma hA ru le/ 
81b8(rgyud): he he ri/ mad ta ri/ dza b+ha ni/ stam b+ha ni kun dga' bo dang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis shing skam po srung ba 'am/ 
82a1(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yong su gzung ba dang / yong su bskyang ba dang zhi pa dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhal ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / 
82a2(rgyud): mtshams bcad pa dang / na mkha' bcing ba dang / sa bcings pa byas te/ de la srad bus bcings na de'i rtsa ba yang skye bar 'gyur/ yal ga dang / lo ma dang / lcug ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu
82a3(rgyud): yang skye bar 'gyur na/ rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ kun dga' bo sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtog so// kun dga' bo nyi zla 'di ltar
82a4(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 'di ltar mthu che ba/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags pa 'di gnyis ni sa la ltung yang srid do// kun dga' bo ri'i rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yo yang srid do// 
82a5(rgyud): kun dga' bo rgya mtsho chen po 'di ltar zab pa/ 'di ltar rgya/ che la/ 'ji ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba bzhi po 'di dag ni skams shing yongasu zad de/ mthar thug
82a6(rgyud): par 'gyur yang srid do// kun dga' bo sa chen po 'dadi ni rnam pa stong du 'gyes kyang srid/ chu ni gsher ba nyid 'dor yang srid / me ni tsha ba 'dor yang srid rlung ni grang ba 'dor yang srad
82a7(rgyud): kyi/ gzungs chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sku mi srid do// kun dga' bo lha 'am/ klu 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding ngam rlung lha 'am/ dri za 'am/ ma 'am ci 'am/ 
82a8(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srid po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum mam/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ bram ze srin po 'am/ grib gnon nam/ 
82b1(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa gang la la zhig gam/ gzhan su yang rung ba zhig gis gzungs chen po'i gseng sngags 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ tad+ya thA/ a g+ni le tsag+ni le/ bal le mal le/ 
82b2(rgyud): hA ni/ mo hA ni/ dza~M b+ha ni/ ste ba ni/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ga rab tu 'bar ba/ 
82b3(rgyud): kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gems so// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu yang
82b4(rgyud): lcags kyi 'khor lo 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab/ tu 'tshed cing 'bar gA/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas/ de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gem so// lha'i dbang po
82b5(rgyud): brgya byin yang rdo rje 'phen to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ga na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba dang / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur
82b6(rgyud): pas/ de'i mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gem so// de rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du gnas su mi dbang ste de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gaso// bcom ldan 'das
82b7(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
82b8(rgyud): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa gzungs chen po rdzog so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ 
83a1(rgyud): skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya skal pa ak+Sha ra pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU / bod skad du/ 'phags
83a2(rgyud): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 
83a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang / 
83a4(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ dpal
83a5(rgyud): gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhug so// de nas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig sa dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag
83a6(rgyud): ba gcig tu gzar nas/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'dzum sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
83a7(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thaMd byang bar 'gyur ba dang / 
83a8(rgyud): byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba/ gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags sgrub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bac+doMs kyis byang/ 
83b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir
83b2(rgyud): brtson pa leg so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems
83b3(rgyud): can thams cad kyi las kyis sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags sgrub
83b4(rgyud): par brtson pa de dag bgegs med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
83b5(rgyud): dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sen thang
83b6(rgyud): dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// mnyam par gzhag pa nges smin 'tshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/ 'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas
83b7(rgyud): kyi zhing thang khyab par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur
83b8(rgyud): to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma'i char yang phab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
84a1(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mnyam pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / byas pa gzo ba dang / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i semasu bya'o// 
84a2(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di yang gangon par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne
84a3(rgyud): ma hA mu na ye swA hA/ ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa
84a4(rgyud): shAkya thub pa chen po las/ khyod kyis 'di nyid thob bas// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
84a5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyuraro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to// gang dag
84a6(rgyud): khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang / glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin
84a7(rgyud): gshegs par 'gyuraro// tad+ya thA oM dza ya dza ga/ pad mA b+he a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni d+hi ri d+hi ri d+hi ro d+hi ro/ de ba tA / a nu pA lo ni bung d+ho tA ra Ni pu ra ya pU ra ya b+ho ga ba ti/ sar+b+ba
84a8(rgyud): a shrI ma ma pa ri pU ra ya sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA nAny+tsa/ sarba karma A ba ra NA ni bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA ne na swA hA// don dam pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na/ 
84b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed ga byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'phrul tu sdig pa 'phrog pa byang chub sbyin par byed pa 'di lta ste bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams
84b2(rgyud): kyis phan yon brjod par mi nuso// 'di bklags pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems
84b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84b4(rgyud): phyin pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pa dka' stsal pa/ thabs sba ba'i phyir te/ sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / 
84b5(rgyud): klog pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla bas/ byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rje bya'o// 
84b6(rgyud): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
84b7(rgyud): 'das kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa
84b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
85a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
85a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso// // rgya gar skad du/ 
85a3(rgyud): b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hri da ya/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tsha'o// 
85a4(rgyud): 'di dag bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge
85a5(rgyud): 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// yang de'i
85a6(rgyud): tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing / phung po lnga po de dag la
85a7(rgyud): yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
85a8(rgyud): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smraso// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des/ ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa
85b1(rgyud): dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
85b2(rgyud): mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des/ 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par yang dag par rjesu
85b3(rgyud): blta'o// gzugs stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gzugs so// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yino// stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yi mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du she dang / 
85b4(rgyud): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams stong pa'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ chos thaMng stong pa nyid de/ mtshan nyid med pa ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ dri ma med pa/ 
85b5(rgyud): dri ma dang bral ba med pa/ bri ba med pa/ gang ba med ba'o// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du shes med/ 'du byed rnams med/ rnam par
85b6(rgyud): shes pa med/ mig med/ rna ba med/ sna med/ lce med/ lus med/ yid med/ gzugs med// sgra med/ dri med/ ro med/ reg bya med// chos med do// mig gis khams med pa nas/ yid kyi kham
85b7(rgyud): med/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang medo// ma rig pa med/ ma rig pa zad pa med/ rga shi med/ rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do// sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 
85b8(rgyud): 'gog pa dang / lam med/ ye shes med/ thob pa med/ ma thob pa yang med// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
86a1(rgyud): mo la brten cing gnas te/ sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/ phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar phyin to// dus gsum du
86a2(rgyud): rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thaMd kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyaso// de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi
86a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/ sdug bsngal tha~Md rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/ mi brdzun pas na
86a4(rgyud): bden par shes par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM ga te ga te pA ra ga te/ pA ra saM ga te/ bo d+hi swA hA/ shA ri'i bu de lta bas/ byang chub sam+ba
86a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ byang
86a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legaso leg so// rigs kyi bu de de bzhi no// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te// 
86a7(rgyud): ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rje su yi rang ngo // bac+doMs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
86a8(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / zad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te
86b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo rdzog so// / sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa'i
86b2(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzung sngags dang bcas pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tsha'o// bac+doMs snying rje'i
86b3(rgyud): tsan dan dri zhim po'i spos chus byugs pa'i sku/ zhabs pad+ma lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang byung sel mdzad bla ma 'jig rten la phan par mdzad pa/ ston pa de
86b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rtsub pa nyos pa dang bral gozhi pa'i 'ang / nyi tsam gzugs mdzes pam can gsal ba'i gzi rjid pa/ sbu pe byad kyis rgyan g.yon ta thams cad
86b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tsha'o// pad+ma rgyas pa ltar zhal ba zhad de/ tshems dkar zhing snyoms la thags bzang bas rab tu rgyas shing / snang la nor bu dri ma med pa ltar 'od gsal
86b6(rgyud): zhing mdzes te/ dpa' zhing gsal ba la nyi ma 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zil gyis gnon pa/ thub pa'i mchog stobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tsha'o// 'dung ngo // 
86b7(rgyud): oM b+ho/ hUM hUM/ A A hI hI/ shi ba shi ga shI ti shAM ti/ sha ma sha ma sha ma pa ya/ ta thA ga ta/ a nu ga ta swa b+hA ga a b+hA ga sa mud tA ya/ a sa ma ba la/ a bi ra la ba la/ a mi ta ba la/ a ti
86b8(rgyud): ba la/ tsi hU~M d+h+r-im+mA T+wA~Mg+h+ra~M d+de du b+he d+ya/ hrI ts+tshi b+ha ga g+ha d+h+ra bI ta ka su ra ta b+ho ga ma hA shA~M ti kar pra la kal+lo Sha nI sha ka swA hA/ de nas dpe byad mtshan gsal bas// yan lag tshad rab brgyan cing
87a1(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba'o// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mnga' ba// glags shing dri ma rab spangs la/ dri med skyon bral chos kyi b+h+yo// khyab bdag chen po stongs bcur ldan/ rdul
87a2(rgyud): bral dpal dang ldan pa po// rin chen sa gzhi chen po la// pho brang rtse mo rdo rje rtse/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams gnas gyur pa/ nor bu du ma rab 'phro zhing // 'od zer dri med gsal bkod pa'i// rdo rje'i
87a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pho brang na// thub pa'i longs spyod sa gzhi la// seng+ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs/ nor bu'i dbyig gi sa gzhi dang // khri chen rab dpa' de nyid la// de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes chen
87a4(rgyud): gyi phun sum tshogs pa brgyan bkod lha// thub pa me zla nor bu'i 'od// nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde blag shin tu bkra shis tshul// 'od gsal skyil mo krung bcas nas/ sku
87a5(rgyud): 'od 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor can// 'od gsal rgyas pa thub dbang gis// dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni// mi g.yo rdorjecan zhes bya/ dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa yi/ rdo rje sa
87a6(rgyud): dag rab 'dul ba// gang yin de kun dag byas nas// dkyil 'khor dri meng bskor bar byed// ngan song dam tshig dri ma kun// legs par shin tu dag bya'o// srid gsum dkyil 'khor rgya che la/ rnam pa
87a7(rgyud): du mar 'od gsal ba// 'gro dang mi 'gro ma lus pa// bkod nas bde chen rdo rje can// rdo rje ral gri thogs pa de/ cod pan ma g.yos nang du zhugs// de nas 'jigs pa'i sgra skad kyis// 'gengs shing
87a8(rgyud): mig ni glog ltar 'gyu/ rig sngags hUM zhes sgrogs pa po// rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs byed pa/ bzhin mdzes 'jus gyis rnam par rgyan/ sdig med mig tu nod gyur cing // stan las langs te/ 
87b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas// legs par mdzo sa smras pa ni// kye ma skye ba'i phyogs 'joms shing // bskal pa du ma'i dri ma sel// rig sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa// thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs
87b2(rgyud): de gzigs dge ba du ma brnyes// sangs rgyas blo gros rgyas par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyod pas kyang // rgyud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // spyod pa du
87b3(rgyud): ma 'byung ba yi// yon tan 'di yis spos ldan 'di// thob pas spro bar mi nuso// longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po can// byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchog rnams kyis dbang
87b4(rgyud): bskur ba'i// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos chen ldan// / 'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams// ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni// blo gros dri ma med par
87b5(rgyud): 'gyur// zhi zhing dag byed bkra shis la// rdul med rgyun te zhi bar byed// dge zhing mya ngan tha~Mng sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms// dbang byed gsang sngags dpa
87b6(rgyud): pa ste/ sa stengs sdig pa tha~Md sel// ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyim// bstan pa yin te sdang ba 'dul// nyes pa byas pa sel ba yika gzungs 'di gang gis thos gyur des// sangs rgyas rnyed par
87b7(rgyud): dka' ba yang // ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// sgrib pa thong rab zhi zhing / khyab bdage nyon mongs kun sel ba// gang zhig nyon mongasa'i byed pa/ gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa las// kun tu
87b8(rgyud): bzang po nyid dang ni// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob// rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang // 'di thos pas ni thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten kun la lham me ba/ bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ 
88a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa// 'di ni ji srid ma gsan par// rab ni nyon mongs 'dul ba yi// rang byung go 'phang ma brnyes te// rnam par dag phyir gsan gyur nas// gsan ma
88a2(rgyud): thag tu rnam par dag/ de phyir phun sum tshogs pa dang // legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas// thub pa kun gyis gang brnyes pa// 'khor ba 'di ni nam du
88a3(rgyud): yang // bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang // mya ngan med cing 'thab med pa// gzungs la gnas pas 'thob par 'gyur// gnas kyi dam pa thos nas kyang // thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo// gzigs
88a4(rgyud): pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i// bzang 'gro der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis ni// tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par bgyis// nyon mongs zad par bya
88a5(rgyud): ba la/ rgyal bas gsungs pa'i gzungs 'dis cho ga/ sdig pa byed cing dge la sdang // sdig pa'i rang bzhin rab 'ju ngas pa// gang gis thos nas des spong ba// nga yis mngon sum
88a6(rgyud): 'byor par 'gyur// sdig pa gzhan yang mi bya zhing // snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya// gzungs mchog gi ni mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// tshe rabs gzhan ni stong dag
88a7(rgyud): dang // tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa// ngag 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// yar gyi ngo yi ches brgyad dang // de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga la// bsnyen gnas legs par lhur blangs
88a8(rgyud): te/ cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod/ de nas rmongs pa med par yang / nyon mongs dgra ni rab 'joms shing // shin tu thub dka' dpe med pa/ nyes pa bzlog pa'i gzungs brjod na/ thub pa'i
88b1(rgyud): zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nges par mthong bar 'gyur// de nas tshogs rnams rdzogs pa yang // rgyal ba'i sras po nyid du 'gyur// 'od dpag med la mnga' ba yis// yon tan mtha' yas rab
88b2(rgyud): rgyan pa// bskal pa bye ba stong du yang // mtha' mi rtogs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi tshig/ dkyil 'khor dag na gnas rnams kyis// thos nas rgyan rnams sna tshogs pa// bcom ldan 'dra
88b3(rgyud): la dbul bar byed// rdo rje ril ba la sogs pa/ lha bdag gsal ba thams cad dang // ri bo ti se ri rab la// gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po na// 'khod pa'i
88b4(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // ma la ya yi ri bo la// gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs rnams dang // khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa// lha yi bdag po rnams dang ni// lag na rdo rje la so/ 
88b5(rgyud): pa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/ nor bu'i dpung rgyan rdza cha dang // rgyan rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i lus/ rab tu bskyed de langs nas ni// sdig bral mnga' bdag rgyal ba
88b6(rgyud): la/ phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar byas nas// kun gyi sa yi dbang phyug go// thub mchog dam pa de la ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod// mnyam nyid chos de de bzhin nyid// shin tu rtogs pa lam
88b7(rgyud): me ba dul ba bstan pa dri ma sel// dri ma med pa skyon bral ba// thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu zhi// 'jig rten mgon po skye dgu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul bsal
88b8(rgyud): ba/ ston pa ston mdzad brtan pa ste// sdig pa med pa rdul dang bral// 'jig rten mgon po snang mdzad pa// dag pa zhi ba zas gtsang sras// nyon mongs rab bcom phan 'dogs pa// ston pa po de dri ma sel// 
89a1(rgyud): / spyong tshul dri med tshul bzang ba// zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan// bcan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings
89a2(rgyud): pa las grol nges par grol// 'jig rten kun mchog 'khra ba'i sa// bdag gir mi 'dzin dri ma med// nyon mongs sel ba dpal dang ldan/ dpal mdzad de bzhin phan mdzad pa// mnyam pa med pa dpe med
89a3(rgyud): pata khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong // khengs pa med pa dman pa med// mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam// snang ba mnyes pa sna byed med// 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa// sgrib pa thaMd
89a4(rgyud): spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// dpa' bo ni bzhi mdzad pa// nyon mongs dgra rnams zad par mdzad// mnga' bdag thabs mkhyen thabs che ba// sems can kun gyi 'khra
89a5(rgyud): sa lags// don yod rnyed dka' blo dang ldan// rdo rje dkyil 'khor thub par dka'// skyob pa 'jigs sel tshangs pa ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos 'dzin pa// dpa' bo chen po 'ji
89a6(rgyud): pa med// gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi longs spyod rgya mtsho lags// dpe byad bzang po bkod pa'i sa// spras pa'i bdag nyid ya mtshan ston// 
89a7(rgyud): dka' ba med pa'i ston pa po// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa// mthu chen yangs pa rgya che ba// bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams sel mdzad pa// brtson chen spro ba che ba ste// dgyes pa chen po stobs po che// mthu
89a8(rgyud): brnyed bstan pa chen po ste// gnas ldan dbang gis dang ba lags// gsal ba gsung ldan dpe med pa// dge ba stong pa nyid kyis rgyal// rab tu zhi ba mun pa med// blo gros chen po chos 'dzin te// phun sum tshogs
89b1(rgyud): ldan sa chen brnyes// 'dod pa rnams ni 'dul mdzad pa// dpal mdzad dpal mnga' dpal dang ldan/ dpal gyi longs spyod shin tu rgyas// bcom ldan legs bgo bgo bar mdzad// gsung ldan bkra shis
89b2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gnas// mnyam nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan dpag med// rab tu dgyes la longs spyod gsal// gzhi bcas sel ba mnyam pa lags// blo dang blo ldan dri ma spangs/ 
89b3(rgyud): gnas chen brtan pa ldan pa ste// rgyal ba longs spyod dri ma med// thub pa thugs rje'i rgyan mnga' ba// bskal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs med nyon mongs sel// dri med skyon bral
89b4(rgyud): rgyu ste ston gnas// rjed 'od mchog gnas longs spyod che// na mkha'i mtshan te rnam dag blo// rin chen gzugs 'dra bkra shrI pa// khyu mchog che spyan pa rdzi ma// rgyal ba skyon
89b5(rgyud): bsal shes rab can// shes rab thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod brtan pa dang // sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod// pha rol phyin pa kun la mnga'// 
89b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnam par bgo la mngon sum pa// stong pas sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags// thaMd mkhyen pa yul las 'das// spyod yul
89b7(rgyud): sgrib pa mi mnga' ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal// dam pa'i don te tshul che ba// shes bya'i yul rnams mtha' dag la// sgrib pa med par 'char ba brnyes// rin chen 'thun par skyes pa ste/ 
90a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas// khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid brnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba
90a2(rgyud): thub par dka'// dge sbyong sdig pa spyong mdzad pa// gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin// blo rgya che ba thaMd mkhyen/ thos pa'i mtshon cham lus gsan/ dkon pa bde bar 'thob 'gyur ba// mnyam pa
90a3(rgyud): khyad pa yul dang ldan// 'jig rten tha~Md dar mdzad mgon// zhi gnas mtshon cha thub par dka'// bsam gyis mi khyab bsam yas yul// dpe med pa ste dper bya ba// 'od bzang rab dgyes
90a4(rgyud): dpal dang ldan// legs gsung blo yi stobs kyis 'byung // / mkhas pa zhal bzang bde sbyin pa// rab dgyes 'das pa'i spyo da yul can// gsung ba chen po ye shes che/ 
90a5(rgyud): gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste// mchod par gyur pa yul las 'das// bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa po// sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste// shes bya'i spyod yul rgya che ba/ 
90a6(rgyud): kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu can// 'jig rten dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mkhyen yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan/ 
90a7(rgyud): chos kyis gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan bsgyur mdzad pa// spyod pa ma lus 'dud par mdzad// yongasu rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnams sangs rgyas/ 
90a8(rgyud): bgegs med ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi dregs pa sel bar mdzad// g.yul ngor rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po thub med stobs// theg pa chen po'i shing rta bcibs/ 
90b1(rgyud): / blo chen brgal bar dka' ba yi/ nyon mongs rgya mtsho'i pha rol gshegs// theg pa chen po'i tshul la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa/ nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las
90b2(rgyud): kyang 'das pa ste// sangs rgyas pa yi 'bras bu gnas// gong nas gong du khyad par mkhyen// khyod ni namakha'i gnas na bzhugs// bde 'byungs dang zhing rnams kyi// mtsho tshon dag la longs par spyod/ 
90b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dbang po rgyas pa la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod nas// de la lha tshogs tshogs rnams kyis// phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig 'khod// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po na// gnas
90b4(rgyud): pa ma lus chem mer 'khod// thod du rdo rje'i thod 'ching zhing / langs nas cod pan rab tu g.yos// dkyil 'khor mthon po thang du/ skad ber chen por yongs bkang nas/ nor bu'i rgyam
90b5(rgyud): ni rnam g.yo zhing / ha ha drag pa'i sgra sgrogs te/ kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal pa grangs med gsum bsags pa/ byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis/ 
90b6(rgyud): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// kye ma rnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal la bstod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgya
90b7(rgyud): brgyad sngags bcas pa// bac+doMs drung brjod na ni// sgrib dang kun nas nyon mongs dang / sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad mchog bton na// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // 
90b8(rgyud): nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs// shes rab che ba nyid du 'gyur// de ni longs spyod chen po dang / bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// blo ldan tshe rabs dran par/ 
91a1(rgyud): 'gyur// de nas rdo rje thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de la/ bcom ldan bdud las rgyal ba yis/ mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa 'di zhi ba ste// nga rgyal
91a2(rgyud): la sogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs bde mngon du phyogs// gzhan gyi mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag rnam dag
91a3(rgyud): bdag nyid de// sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan cig thos pa tsam gyis kyang // de dag sa chen 'bras bur 'gyur// ring por mi thogs dga' 'gyur na// 'chang sogs lta la ci zhig smos// de phyir
91a4(rgyud): rtag tu rab sgrims la// gtan tu bde ba 'dod pa yis// ston rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang zhig nang par langs nas brjod// bdag nyid kyis
91a5(rgyud): kyang bton na no// de yi don kun 'grub 'gyur la// gnod pa dang yang phrad mi 'gyur// 'di ni yon tan kun gyi snod// dge ba phun sum tshogs sbyin pa// kun mkhyen 'bras bu bla
91a6(rgyud): med mchog/ bde 'byung thob par byed pa yin// 'bras bu 'byor pa ci yang rung // thob par mi 'gyur dogs pa med// kun mkhyen go 'phang thob gyur nas// dpe meng gan su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'di ni
91a7(rgyud): dge zhing 'bras bur ldan// sangs rgyas sa yi 'bras bu sbyin// yid du 'ong zhing yon tan ldan/ snying rje dri ma med sbyin pa// 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi mdo// 'jig rten kun gnas dga' ba ste// 'jig rten
91a8(rgyud): kun gyi bde 'byung ba// 'di dang 'dra ba gang yang med// ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa gzungs sngags dang bcas pa rdzog so// // de bzhin gshegs pa
91b1(rgyud): / dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swAhA/ lan gcig bzlas brjod byas na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad khri
91b2(rgyud): bar du sdig pa byas pa gang yin pa de dag thaMd 'byang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs
91b3(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po
91b4(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bi ri bi ri/ hu ru hu ru/ bai ro tsa na rash+mi sany+tso di ta A gats+tsha/ Ar+ya A ka sha~M gar+b+ha ma hA ka ru Ni ka pU ra ya ha shA na d+ha ra ya bud+d+he bi sh+tsa ya na
91b5(rgyud): tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ swA hA// bton pas 'grub ste/ mtshon cha dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byang stems rnams kyis mi chug so// rgyal po dang chom rkun la sogs
91b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi glags mi rnyed do// gang du bris te bzhag pa der/ yams kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nang thang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ ro// dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin kyang
91b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
91b8(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a mi ta bi krAn+ta gA mi nI/ ga ga na kI ra ti ka re sarba kle shak+Sha ye ka ri swA hA// gzungs
92a1(rgyud): 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'ang lan gsum bzlas pa byas na de rnams zad par rig par bya'o// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa
92a2(rgyud): byas na/ rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba 'ang sdig pa yongasu byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par yang 'gyuraro// snang ba mtha' yas rjesu dran pa rdzogaso// // zla ba'i
92a3(rgyud): 'od de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ tsan+de tsan+d+ra su tsan+d+ra ma ti tsan+da/ tsan+d+ra ka ra Na/ sau ri si ra~M bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki
92a4(rgyud): li/ d+har+m+ma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ki li/ se g+hA a d+hiSh+Ti te swAhA// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang bar langs te/ zla ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i
92a5(rgyud): mtshan dran par byed pa de ni bskal pa bzhi khri'i tshe rabs dran bar 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rje su dran pas ston de rnams thob par
92a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// zla ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rje su dran pa rdzog so// // na maHsarba ta thA ga ta hri da ya/ a nu ga ta/ oM ku ru gi ni swA hA// 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong du
92a7(rgyud): bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang zad par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rjesu dran pa rdzog so// // sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshalo// na ma rat+na shi khi ne/ 
92a8(rgyud): ta thA ga ta ya/ an te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+ne rat+ne rat+na shi khe ne swA hA/ 'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ shi 'phos nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi
92b1(rgyud): lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan rje su dran pa rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ pU dza me g+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni / bod skad du/ mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs dkon mchog
92b2(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ badz+ra sA ra pra marda ne ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re/ ma hA badz+re/ ma hA te dza badz+re/ ma hA bid+yA swA hA/ ma hA bo d+ha
92b3(rgyud): tsit+ta badz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi maN+Do pa saM kra ma Na badz+re/ sarba karma A ba ra Na/ bi sho d+ha na badz+re swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ dran pa tsam gyi modado la phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs
92b4(rgyud): rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed la mchod pa byas par 'gyur zhing / zhabs la phyag byas par 'gyuraro// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang
92b5(rgyud): phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thaMd dang / gdan dang / gding ba dang / na bza' dang / spyan gzigs dang / bshos gtsang la sogs pa dang / rgyan dang / 
92b6(rgyud): lhab lhub thaMd kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// sdig pa tha~Md dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thang dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Mthad mthong bas yang dag par dbugs
92b7(rgyud): 'byin par 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gsang ba pa'i bdag
92b8(rgyud): po dang bcas pa rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams phyi bzhin yang dag par 'brang zhing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du
93a1(rgyud): / skye bar 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs par lan cig dran pa tsam gyis thob par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / dkon mchog
93a2(rgyud): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa tha~Md rnam par sel
93a3(rgyud): ba la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM ta ra ta ra/ tai ri ti ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri / b+hu ru b+hu ru/ b+ha ya b+ha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na dza ni me sha pra b+ha ya swA hA/ 
93a4(rgyud): la no b+hi d+ha ne be swA hA/ ku ru pany+tsa li swA hA/ sA ga ra saM bai ro swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te/ nang par langs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zhag nyi shu
93a5(rgyud): rtsa gcig lon pa'i tshe/ las kyi sgrib pa tha~Md zad par 'gyur ro// spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// de la mig nang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// lus la nad 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// 
93a6(rgyud): yid kyi nyes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga yang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yid rnam pa lnga yang thob par 'gyuraro// tshe rabs tha~Md du sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par 'gyuraro// byang chub
93a7(rgyud): kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos mthong ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / seMn thams cad smin par byed pa dang / 'bral bar mi 'gyuraro// lus mdzes par 'gyuraro// 
93a8(rgyud): sems dang bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ su rU pa nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ su ru pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
93b1(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// na maHsu rU pa ya ta thA ga ta ya/ an+ta te/ samyak+saM bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru/ pra su ru pra su ru/ ta ra ta ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ sma ra s+pha ra/ san+ta ba
93b2(rgyud): ya/ sarba pre ta nA ma swA hA// gzungs 'dis chu dang bcas pa'i zan la lan bdun yongasu bzlas te/ lag pa g.yon pas se gol gyi sgra lan gsum du byas nas yi dgas tha~Mng la dben pa'i sa phyogs su
93b3(rgyud): sbyin par bya zhing / 'di skad kyang brjod par bya ste/ skabs tshol ba dang glags lta ba rnams dengs shig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thad na gnas pa'i yi dgas rnams la bza' ba 'di bdag gis sbyin par
93b4(rgyud): bgyi'o// zhes pa'o// zas ma zos pa'i sngon rol nyid du sbyin par bya'o// de ltar na yi dgas tha~Mng la 'bras bre'o tshe re re'i bza' ba so sor byin par 'gyuraro// de ltar byas na skye ba nas skye
93b5(rgyud): bar yang nyam chung bar mi 'gyuraro// dbul por mi 'gyuraro// stobs che ba dang / mdzes pa dang / mthong na dga' ba dang / phyug cing longs spyod che bar 'gyuraro// tshe ring zhing nad med pa dang / 
93b6(rgyud): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// shi 'phos nas kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi kham su skye bar 'gyuraro// gzugs legs shes
93b7(rgyud): bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta ma hA b+ha ya tA rA Ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni / bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang
93b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos dri la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa
94a1(rgyud): // gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsal dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa tha~Mng rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba mchog la phyag 'tsha'o// 
94a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'jigs pa
94a3(rgyud): med par byed pa la phyag 'tsha'o// tad+ya thA/ d+ha re d+ha re/ d+ha re d+ha re NI/ ra na ko te/ a b+ha yA kalpe kalpa ni/ ga Ne a nan+ta kalpe/ a mr-i ta kalpe hu tA sha re/ a nan+ta mu khe/ a nan+ta tsAk+ShA sa mud ga te/ oM b+ha swA hA/ rigs
94a4(rgyud): kyi bu gzungs kyi gsang sngags 'di dag ni sems can ngan song du 'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa
94a5(rgyud): dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / rje su yi rang ba yin no// rig kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzungs 'di 'dzin pa byed pa de/ 'jigs pa brgyad po/ sems can
94a6(rgyud): dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pa
94a7(rgyud): mtha' yas pa dang / bgrod dka' ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / skye ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / nad kyi 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mtha' yas pa
94a8(rgyud): ngag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyuraro// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// sems rnam par g.yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byed cing / sangs rgyas
94b1(rgyud): rnams kyi spyan sngar skye bar 'gyur/ zad mi shes pa'i lus thob par 'gyur// sprul pa'i lus kyang thob par 'gyur/ na maHsarba bid+yA/ sid d+hAnA me man+ta pa da swA hA// 'phags pa 'jigs pa chen po brgyad
94b2(rgyud): las sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai sha ba ti nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
94b3(rgyud): dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das sbrul gyi lo'i dgun zla ra ba tshes nyi shu la/ yul phug ron can na/ grong khyer sin tse zhes bya ba'i gtsug
94b4(rgyud): lag khang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe/ dge slong tshe brjod ces bya ba don gcig gi phyir/ grong khyer gan so zhes bya bar song ste dge slong de mi yul gyi grong khyer nas dpag tshad brgya'i
94b5(rgyud): lam du phyin pa dang / dge slong des/ bar der mi lus chen po khrun tu 'doms sum cu yod pa/ bzhin 'dom bzhi pa zhig rlung ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dge slong
94b6(rgyud): brjod des mi de lta bu de la 'di snyam du bsams te/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus cha ste/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin du nges so snyam nas/ des dbus mo gnyis ka'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 
94b7(rgyud): mi lus chen po ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ mi lus chen po de la 'di skad ces smra so// ci khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de/ 'dir 'khod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
94b8(rgyud): dge slong de de bzhin no// dge slong des smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sen rnams la nad rnam pa sna rko
95a1(rgyud): pa 'byung ste/ gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnaso// des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / 
95a2(rgyud): gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang na mkha' bar skabs na mi snang ngo // de'i tshe lha dang lha ma yin kyang g.yul 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni 'pham/ lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tshe
95a3(rgyud): 'byung po dang / yi dgas rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis son rnams la nad gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang / 'brum phran dang / me dpal dang / lto ba na ba dang / rims nyin gcig pa
95a4(rgyud): dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang // rlung las gyur pa dang / 'khris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / klad pan
95a5(rgyud): ba dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad ba dang / mig nang la sogs pa nye bar sgrub po// 'di lta ste/ char ches pa dang / than pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog phun
95a6(rgyud): sum tshogs pa'i 'ongs 'phrog/ sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog/ tshe dang stobs dang / mdog dang gzugs 'phrog ste/ de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can tha~Md nad sna tshogs kyi yongasu nyan to// 
95a7(rgyud): gtum po seng ge dang / spyang kaM dang / stag dang / sbrul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams kyi mdangs 'phrog te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la dus ma yin par
95a8(rgyud): chung za ba nye bar gnas pas/ sen rnams nad las thar bar bya ba yang dka' ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sen rgan pa dang / bar ma dang / gzhon pa dag las bkrigs phrag sum cu 'chi bar 'gyuraro// 
95b1(rgyud): de ci'i phyir/ nga dge slong khyod gan du yongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sgrogs shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i seMn thad ni/ 
95b2(rgyud): 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro// de lta bas na dge slong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di sgrogs
95b3(rgyud): te/ sems cad thaMd la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shig/ dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu rgyun tu dang par gyis shig/ lha brjod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
95b4(rgyud): rnams sam sku gzugs rnams la spos dang me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shog khyad par can gyi gzungs kyang lhogs shig/ nyi ma bdun yan la
95b5(rgyud): brgyang pa dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo langs zab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tsha'o// 
95b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ di pu la gardzi te / bi s+phu la sA re/ bi pu la yo ni she/ a na sa le/ a na la saM b+ha be/ a na la te/ sha ta ka ra/ b+he dza li ne swA hA/ dzam b+ha ni/ sam+b+ha ne/ mo ta ne swA hA/ bon ta ri ka
95b7(rgyud): yang swA hA/ ho ma d+harme d+harmA tsi ta ye swA hA/ d+ha re b+ha d+ha re swA hA/ ka la baM ki ru ta ye swA hA/ shAM te phen ne nirba pa n+ya swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru khi du ru d+hi ye swA hA/ bi la ma pa tsun d+ha ye swA hA/ a ba lo ki tA
95b8(rgyud): ye swA hA/ adz+nyA na bi d+ha ma n+ye swA hA/ pad+ma swa re/ pad+ma sa~M b+ha re/ kaM ka re/ hi taM ka ri ye swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tsan+d+ra prab+he tsan+dan gar+b+he/ 
96a1(rgyud): tsan+na tsUH/ ke la sa pa ti/ sarba bud d+ha/ a doSh+Thi ta a nu mo de ti swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza la
96a2(rgyud): lab d+he/ dza ya ma hA ma he swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste tad+ya thA/ ga ga nA ar+ye/ ga ga na sa mud
96a3(rgyud): ga te/ ga ga na bi krAn ta/ bi krAn te/ oM dze me dzi pad me dzi swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ tad+ya thA/ ho b+ha dre/ ma hA b+ha dre/ a ti b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ 
96a4(rgyud): bi ga ta rA dza me/ ma hA bi ga tA dze se/ sa ga ting ga te swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyi ga 'tsha'o// 'di lta ste/ he ma he ma ha ma ha ma swA hA/ 
96a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ a mi tod b+ha ge/ a ma ta saM b+ha ge/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta bi kAn+te ga re/ a mi ta ga ga ni kArti ka
96a6(rgyud): re swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di lta ste/ ga ga na a ka re/ ga ga na se b+ha ge ga ga na kIrti ki ri swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos mchog la
96a7(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// 'di lta ste/ sa ma sa me swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan stsal gyis 'brug bsgrags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshalo// a sa ma a sa me swA hA/ 
96a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa nga rgyal gnon la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ mA nA bi shud+he/ pad+me shwa re/ pad+ma sa b+ha re/ king ka re/ hi tang kai re yo swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thad la phyag 'tsha 'o// 
96b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa zad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di lta ste/ ma ti bi ga rA dzas/ he ma ga ti/ ka rma ma hA rA dzang / khi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ 
96b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa byams pa la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di lta ste/ mai tri ma ni se swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ gar+b+he gaN+DI/ gar+b+ha bi shi d+ha ni
96b3(rgyud): swAhA byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 'tshalo// 'di lta ste/ ak+Sha ye phu/ ak+Sha ya kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni pu swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa la
96b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshamo/ 'di sa s+t+wa~M N+Di twA ArkA ne/ ma dz+dzak+ShaN+Da.A bap+ta ni 'ang+gA sa ka re/ bang+gA ba dAkA re sAs byang chub sems pa'i sgrib pa 'ang rnam par sel ba la phyag 'am po
96b5(rgyud): g+ha ste/ sarba A ba ra Na bi skam bi d+h+ye swAhA/ d+hA tu bi ka ra d+d+he swAhA/ me g+ha mi s+pho Ta mi swA hA/ a pa rA dzi ta kA li swA hA/ ba la dang N+yai swAhA/ da kar+Na da pa me swAhA/ karma nit+ta bi ta kA ye swAhA/ e
96b6(rgyud): ka a ra ma ye swA hA/ yo gA tsa rA ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha a b+hi Shi ka tA ye swA hA/ praslob ku te ye swA hA/ sar+b+ba d+harma a bi Shi ka ta ye swA hA/ sarba bud d+ha a b+hiSh+Thi ta ye swA hA/ e ka shre gA yai swA hA/ a shre gA yi swA hA/ 
96b7(rgyud): b+hu ta ye swA hA/ a se b+hUb+hu ta yai swA hA/ sar+b+ba duHkhro pra sha sa d+h+ye swAhA/ zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ tsa dra pra b+he/ su pra b+he/ pra b+ha a ka re/ pra b+hod ka re / pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harmA bi shud d+he/ karma
96b8(rgyud): shu d+hir/ b+ha ba tu me swA hA/ che brjod gang la la zhig rigs sngags 'dis nyin zhag bdun du nyid lan bdun mtshan lan bdun du bya ba byed na/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus pa rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// dge slong
97a1(rgyud): bdun la zas sbyin no// me las me spel bar bya'o// mtshan mo mar me thogs te mchod rten la sti stang byas la bskor ba bya'o// dam pa'i chos bri ba dang / bklag pa la brtson pa bya'o// 
97a2(rgyud): gal te yams kyi nang cher byung nas/ khyim nas khyim dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du/ khu ba dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma dang / lha bshos kyi mchod pa bya'o// nad pa gang yin pa des kyang / cho ga
97a3(rgyud): 'di bzhin du byas na/ de myur du nad las thar bar 'gyuraro// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smra so// dge slong rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos
97a4(rgyud): kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
97a5(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par 'gyuraro// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo tha~Md kyi rna lam du grag par 'gyur
97a6(rgyud): bar yul nas yul dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer dang / grong nas grong du bskur bar bya'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces spraso// cha brjod rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
97a7(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar bar 'gyuraro// sus lan gnyis bklags na de lta bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar 'gyuraro// sus lan gsum
97a8(rgyud): bklags na de rtsa lag gi tshogs kyi skye bo dang bcas te thar bar 'gyuraro// sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor tha~Md thar bar 'gyuraro// sus lan lnga bklags na de nyen 'khor gyi rgyal po dang thar bar
97b1(rgyud): 'gyuraro/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smraso// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan dag tu bskur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar
97b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tshe brjod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos la mi 'dzin tam/ mi klog gam/ yi ger mi 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir mi 'jug gam kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag
97b3(rgyud): par rab tu mi ston na/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sen tha~Md dang thun mong du byas te/ mi nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu mi sngon 'tshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams
97b4(rgyud): kyi 'gro ba ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' zad kyis smad pa'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad
97b5(rgyud): ces smraso// tshe brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par bya ba yin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi sen thaMd bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir// nga ri'i
97b6(rgyud): rgyal po ri rab la song ste/ lha dang dri za rnams la rje su bstan pa dang 'thun par sbyar bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o// de skad ces smras nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi snang bar gyur to// 
97b7(rgyud): dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod de bzung nas song ngo // 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// 
97b8(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI mU la tan+ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
98a1(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i stengs gau nam kha'i dkyil na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs so so tha dang gabasam gyis mi khyab pa
98a2(rgyud): mtshar rmad du byung ba so sor rab tu gnas pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyis lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag
98a3(rgyud): khyed cag nyon cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i cho 'phrul gyi spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung bting 'dzin gyi
98a4(rgyud): bye brag dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'a khor byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ga/ tshe dang
98a5(rgyud): nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / yid la bsams pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin tu le/ 
98a6(rgyud): par nyon la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes gsol te/ byang chub sem
98a7(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting 'dzin gyi khyad par dang / sa chen po thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang
98a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thang kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnam su skye bar bya ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / dngul ba dang / nang rnams zhi bar byed pa longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa
98b1(rgyud): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phongs par mi byed pa/ re ba thaMd yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa
98b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang / bdag dang sems can tha~Mng thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas bcom ldan 'das de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'dra
98b3(rgyud): shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang gtsang ma'i gnas la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas dag pa'i yul la 'od rnam par spros te/ yul rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya/ 
98b4(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu mdzod pu nas me tog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
98b5(rgyud): bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma'i 'khor gyis bac+doMs la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
98b6(rgyud): su song nas/ byang shar phyogasu brgya stong gi gang ga'i klung gi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu rje su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa
98b7(rgyud): rgyal po'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par ro// der yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
98b8(rgyud): spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur nas byang chub sems
99a1(rgyud): dpa'i tshogs de dag la smras gargyal ba'i sras ngag 'od 'di ni nga la yang dag par bskul ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag g.yeng ba med par gyis shig ces smra'o// de nas byung
99a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mig mi 'dzums shing kha bye bas 'od ga na ba de log su mngon du bltas nas 'dug// de nas bskul ba'i 'od des me tog
99a3(rgyud): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor byas te/ byang chub sems
99a4(rgyud): dpa'i sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bI spyi bor nub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ste/ na las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu
99a5(rgyud): yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
99a6(rgyud): ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
99a7(rgyud): rgyas kyis bdag la dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags tha~Md kyi spyod ba dang / sgrub thabs dang / 
99a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / chog dngag gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / cho ga'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dag gsang po dang / phyag rgya dang / dbang bskur ba bstan pa dang len dza kyi
99b1(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas mchi bar 'tsha'o// 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de
99b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzin gang la snyoms par zhugs pa na phyogs bzhi mtha' yas mu med pa steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thaMd dang
99b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par gang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas rgyal ba'i sras leg so leg so// 'di
99b4(rgyud): lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thaMd kyis kyang mi nus/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas
99b5(rgyud): pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
99b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge
99b7(rgyud): gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba sems can tha~Mng byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par
99b8(rgyud): skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thang dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi gzigs te/ sangs rgyas
100a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsung so// na maHsarba bud d+ha nA~M oM maM/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog
100a2(rgyud): yin te las thod byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting 'dzin de las langs nas dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bsnams pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba wa
100a3(rgyud): bskums pa 'am/ se gol btogs pa tsam mam/ mig 'byeng 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis shug sau blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes
100a4(rgyud): bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'ji garten gyi khams su chas te song ba dang / steng gi na mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
100a5(rgyud): lha rnams gnasu chas te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gan sa de thaMd 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te/ 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
100a6(rgyud): la snyoms par zhug so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / dpag tshad brgya stong
100a7(rgyud): phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa de'i dus la
100a8(rgyud): bab par shes na song shig/ 'on kyang nga'i bkas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes zhu bar bya'o// de nas bcom
100b1(rgyud): ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhan yang gzhon gang ga'i klung brgya stong
100b2(rgyud): bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang / 
100b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs dang / cho ga dang / sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang / brtul zhugs bsam pa thaMd yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ sems can tha~Mng dga' bar byed pa/ 'od rin po che'i tshogs kyis rab 'byam 'das
100b4(rgyud): ba dang / da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa shes pa/ rgyal po'i dbang phyug lung ston par byed pa/ sngags bzla ba yul gyi mthar 'gro bar byed pa/ mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang / dam tshig
100b5(rgyud): rab 'byam kyi tshogs tha~Md dang / 'jig rten pa ma lus pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
100b6(rgyud): kyi nges par 'byung ba'i spyod pa mthar thug pa gsungs pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rje su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i dus la bab par shes na
100b7(rgyud): song shig/ shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar mngon sum du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par gyur te khyod kyang ston par 'gyur ro// yang gsungs pa/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta nA/ a tsid bya.a pra ti ha ta shA sa nAnA/ 
100b8(rgyud): oM s+pha ra s+pha ra a pra ti ha ta shA sa na ku mA ra rU pa ha ri Na/ oM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par rtsa ba'i sngag so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po ste/ de bzhin
101a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs la gsung zhing gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham su song nas dbye ba dang / rnam par dbye ba rgya cher ston par 'gyur te/ 
101a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya bas kyang las thams cad byed pa 'di rje su gnang bar 'gyuraro// 'dir snying po mchog tu gyur pa ni/ oM bA kye de na maH'dir nye ba'i snying po ni bA kye hUM/ de nas
101a3(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas bkod pa tha~Md kyi rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu
101a4(rgyud): 'thun pa byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom sa par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang / rgyal
101a5(rgyud): mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phreng ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel pa snyan pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thob par byed pa/ lha'i
101a6(rgyud): dri dang / byug pa dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma'i char dbab par mngon par sprul to// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul gyi
101a7(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa mthong nas ba spu ldang zhing gnas g.yo ba mthong nas snying 'dar zhing spangs te/ ci bdag cag gi 'byor pa nyams par ma gyur tam zhes phan tshun du rings par 'gro zhing skad mthon
101a8(rgyud): bos smra ba rtsom par byed de/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongasu bskyab du gsol/ shAkya thub pa yongasu bskyab tu gsol zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas
101b1(rgyud): gtsang ma'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs ma 'jigs shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni me tog yang dag par skyes
101b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de spyan snga nas nga la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / don chen po'i spyod pa dang / sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya che zhing rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi tshig ston pa'i
101b3(rgyud): phyir 'ongs pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzums par bac+doMs la blta zhing zhabs gnyis la btud
101b4(rgyud): de tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/ skyes bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal// skyes bu gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal// spyod pa
101b5(rgyud): thaMd don sgrub pa// skyes bu seng ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phung khrol thams cad bzlog byed pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// ngan 'gro thams cad 'jigs byed pa// skyes bu pad dkar
101b6(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// kun nas bsod nams dri ldan pa// skyes bu pad+ma khyod phyag 'tshal// sring gsum 'dam ni rnam dag byed// rnam grol khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sdug bsngal ma lus rnam grol byed// 
101b7(rgyud): zhi gyur khyod la phyag 'tshalo// thams cad ldan pa legs 'dul byed// thams cad grub pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sngags kyi spyod pa'i don sgrub byed// bkra shis khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// bkra shis kun gyi
101b8(rgyud): bkra shis pa// sangs rgyas kun la khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kun rnam par rtogs mdzad pa// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid spros pa med pa'i ngo bo la yang dag par rje su zhugs shing ston par byed
102a1(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la phyag 'tsha'o// shes pa dang shes bya'i dngos po thams cad dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / theg pa gsum gyi lam dang / mya ngan
102a2(rgyud): las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed pa dang / gnas par byed pa tha~Md mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo zhes tshig 'bru 'di dag brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon
102a3(rgyud): sum du bstod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di nas gang ga'i klung brgya phrag stong gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na me tog yang
102a4(rgyud): dag par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchis te/ de na me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes
102a5(rgyud): pa dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten
102a6(rgyud): mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa de chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge gdon bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu
102a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa/ yong su dag pa/ yongasu dkar ga/ tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// sngags kyi spyod pa dang / byang chub sems
102a8(rgyud): dpa'i sde snod dang / lam gsum gyi spyod pa'i lam sgrub par byed pa/ skyob pa dang / gnas dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / bde ba dang / shin tu mthar thug pa dang / shin tu yong su mthar phyin/ 
102b1(rgyud): bar byed pa sems can rnams la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyis rjesu gnang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung 'dir mchis// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal
102b2(rgyud): po'i dbang po de yang bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri'o// 'di skad kyang gsung ste/ gang du 'di lta bu'i snyigs ma lnga'i
102b3(rgyud): dus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes// de yang lam gsum dang / byang grol dang / mir skye ba thob pa nyid kyi chos ston par byed do// gang du sen
102b4(rgyud): gyi ris skal pa med pa dang / srid pa gsum yang dag par 'joms par byed pa'i lam dang / gtan du grub pa dang / bde ba dang / 'thun pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
102b5(rgyud): la sems can rnams 'god par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i brtson 'grus ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sangs rgyas bcom
102b6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi thugs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis ci zhig 'tshal ba rngo thog/ dbang phyug gis rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
102b7(rgyud): rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa shes par gyur ram/ 'tshal bar ram/ thugs kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i rjesu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa
102b8(rgyud): dang / spyod pa 'tshal bar ram/ mdor na bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong gi bar du yang bstan par mi nus// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad
103a1(rgyud): pa bsdus pa 'am/ tha dad ma lus pa'i ngo bo 'di ni chos 'dus ma byas su blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba la brten pa 'am/ yon tan ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
103a2(rgyud): pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi/ bdag gis ni ma lag so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pas rin po che'i pad+ma sprul pa la bcom ldan 'das
103a3(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la blta zhing 'du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang rje su 'thun
103a4(rgyud): pa'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs sngon du 'gro ba mdzad nas chos bstan pa dang rje su 'thun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang rje su 'thun pas tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / 
103a5(rgyud): ka la bing ka'i skad dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i sgra skad kyi gsung gis dbyangs kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
103a6(rgyud): pa khyod legs par 'ongs sam/ sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa sangs rgyas thaMd kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md kyi don thob par byed pa/ sngags
103a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi tshig dang / gsang ba dang bcas pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor cho ga dang / dbang bskur ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / bsam pa thaMd yongs
103a8(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed pa sgrub pa'i thabs thad dang ldan pa/ rgyud shes pa dang / shes bya dang / dus dang / mi snang ba dang / rgyal po'i zhing du gyur pa 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
103b1(rgyud): par byed pa/ mdor na sems can tha~Md kyi bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ rang gi yon tan dang 'thun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa rjesu 'jug pa/ sems can gzhan dga' bar byed pa/ 
103b2(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba/ chu la mi nub par 'gro ba/ yid gzhungs par byed pa/ 'gugs par byed pa/ sa 'og tu 'jug pa/ mngon du spyod par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad thob par
103b3(rgyud): byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo thams cad dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / sha za dang / 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ byis pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu gnas
103b4(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin 'jog par byed pa/ mdor na las tha~Md byed pa ste/ yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ mngon spyod dang / rgyas pa dang / zhi ba'i las dag rab tu byed pa/ 
103b5(rgyud): ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde stod phal po che bskal pa chen po'i rin po che'i le'u rab 'byam 'di ngas kyang rje su gnang zhing sangs rgyas tha~Md kyis
103b6(rgyud): kyang gsungs te/ sems can dag pa'i rang gi sngags spyod pa'i don gyi chos kyi mdzod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dang / seMn thams cad kyi
103b7(rgyud): don du bstan pa'i phyir// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi sprin gyis brlabs pa 'od kyi snang la bkod pa'i rgyan yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba byang chub
103b8(rgyud): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dag pa'i sems can gyi 'od kyi snang bas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi
104a1(rgyud): zhing 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar dang / mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po'i bar du khyab par byas te/ sems can gang su dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag thaMd kyi sdug bsngal
104a2(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar gyur to// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bskul nas/ 'od de yang 'jam dpal
104a3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// 'dir gang dag shar phyogs na rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'od zer rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi reg pa'i bya bas sangs rgyas

104a8(rgyud): tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa dag la/

113b6(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas lhag pa'i bsam pa dag dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid na mkha'i ngo bo dang / chos kyi
113b7(rgyud): dbyings dus gsum las yang dag par 'das par mkhyen nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gyi don spyod pa la yang dag par soms shig/ 
113b8(rgyud): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i las kyi 'bras bu la dad pa dang ldan pa la sngags kyi spyod pa'i don yang dag par thob pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi tshig dang / las kyi
114a1(rgyud): tshig dang / zhi ba'i tshig dang / thar pa'i tshig dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i mnyam pa nyid thob par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
114a2(rgyud): bcu kun gyi stobs dang / bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms shig ceso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
114a3(rgyud): ma thag tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'di dang / 
114a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong du ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yang dag par rab tu g.yos te/ 
114a5(rgyud): snang ba chen pos gsal bar yang byas nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs skyed pa ston te/ rang gi sdug sa kyi tshig kyang ston pa la// // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/ 
114a6(rgyud): a b+hA ba swa b+ha ba mung+ga tA nA~M/ na maHpra t+ye ka bud+d+ha ar+ya shrA ba kA nAM/ na mo bi d+hi sa twA nAM/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te shwa rA NAM/ bo d+hi sa twA nAM/ ma hA sa twA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ duSh+TAM sa twa
114a7(rgyud): da ma ke a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha haste/ tsa tur+b+hu dza/ tsa turmu kha Sha Ta tsa ra NaM/ gats+tsha gan+d+ha/ sarba big+h+na big+h+nAM ta ka/ bi kr-i tA na na/ sarbe b+hU ta b+ha ye ka re/ an+tan+ta sa ha ni nA di me byA g+h+ra tsarma Ni bA
114a8(rgyud): san/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba d+harmANAM/ tshin+ta Nim+b+ha sarba mA tAn/ bin+ti bim+b+ha pa ra mu tA A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ sarbe b+hu tIn/ ni rma tha na rmeg/ sarba duSh+TAn/ pA be sha ya pra ba~M sha ya/ maN+Da la mad d+h+ye/ bai bsar+b+ba
114b1(rgyud): dzi bi tan+ta kar/ ku ru ku ru ma ma sarba kAr+ya da had ha/ ba tsa pa tsa mA bi lam+ba mA bi lam+ba/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ hU hUM phag s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarbA sha pa ri pU ra ka/ he b+ha ga bi ki tsa rA ya si ma ma
114b2(rgyud): sarbAr+tha sA d+ha ya/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba yin te/ gshin rje'i rgyal po yang 'joms pa dang / 'gugs par
114b3(rgyud): byed pa yin na seMn gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gzungs sngags 'di smras ma thag tu sems can thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags
114b4(rgyud): par gyur te/ 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / sngangs pa dang / yid skyo ba dang / snying 'gas par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal
114b5(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa ma gtogs par skyabs gzhan med/ skyob pa gzhan med// dpung gnyen gzhan med par gyur te/ de nas gang su dag sa la gnas pa dang / chu la gnas
114b6(rgyud): pa dang / nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / brtan par gnas pa dang / mi brtan par gnas pa dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus te
114b7(rgyud): skyes pa'i sems can gyis grangs su gtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dag na rnam par gnas pa steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag
114b8(rgyud): tu skad cig de dang / yud tsam de lag ba cang gnas pa dag skad cig de nyid la khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'di nyid du bkug par gyur to// khro bo rgyal po'i sngags 'di ni 'dod chags dang ma bral
115a1(rgyud): ba rnams kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir na/ de yang 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skam par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// dam tshig la dmigs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi sku
115a2(rgyud): gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar bzlas par bya'o// yang na las gzhan gyi tshod du brjod par bya ste/ gang de
115a3(rgyud): dang de dag tu ni brjod par mi bya ste/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ltas ngan chen po dang / mya ngan chen po dang / bdag nyid 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// thugs rje mchog dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas

115a5(rgyud): du bya ba dang / chos kyi tshul yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob par bya ba dang / bstan pa med pa dag
115a6(rgyud): tu bstan pa dang / lam gsum la/ yang dag par sbyor ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi bcad pa dang / sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i phyir dang / thugs rje chen po'i mthu'i rgyu 'thun pa'i

119a5(rgyud): dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / sa dang / mun pa dang / rdul dang / nye ba'i rdul dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba dang / byang chub dang / so so gcig dang / nyan thos dang / dmyal ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / gzi
119a6(rgyud): brjid chen po dang / gzi brjid chen po ldan dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / lha ma yin dang / sha ldan dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / 'byung ba pa dang / phyogs kyi
119a7(rgyud): glang po dang / steng 'gro dang / thad kar 'gro dang / kha bye ba dang / bsam gtan 'gro dang / rnam 'byor 'gro dang / rab tu gnas dang / mchog dang / bar ma dang / tha ma ste/ khyim chen po de dag kyang khyim brgya
119a8(rgyud): stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa gang na gang na gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gang na bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der lhags shing phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la/ 
119b1(rgyud): btud nas rang rang gi gnas su 'khong bar gyur to// gang yang gnod sbyin mo dag gnod sbyin mo dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa la 'di lta ste/ mig bzang ma dang / 
119b2(rgyud): skra bzang ma dang / skad snyan ma dang / blo bzang ma dang / dge ldan ma dang / sna tshogs mig ldan ma dang / rdzogs byed ma dang / bzang po ma dang ska rags bzang po ma dang / pad+ma ltar smra ba dang / 'jig
119b3(rgyud): byed ma dang / mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / nam gru ma dang / sgra gcan ma dang / sgra mthar byed ma dang / rlung ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / yid ldan ma dang / me
