119b4(rgyud): tog ldan ma dang / me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang / ser skya ma dang / 'phrog ma dang / dpal ldan ma dang / dpa'i mo dang / dpa' bzang mo dang / shin tu mi bzang ma dang / mi bzang ldan
119b5(rgyud): ma dang / lha mdzes ma dang / ro bzang ma dang / gsang ba dam pa ma dang / shing la mu la gnas ma dang / mya ngan med ma dang / mun par mdzes ma dang / snang bar mdzes ma dang / 
119b6(rgyud): 'od ldan ma dang / lhag par ldan ma dang / gzugs mdzes ma dang / dkar med ma dang / zhi ba ma dang / phyogs mtshams ma dang // stug ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / nye ba'i dga' byed ma dang / 
119b7(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das ma ste/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das
119b8(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang yang sha za mo dag sha za mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom
120a1(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ sdud ma dang / phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang / sha za drag mo dang / sha za mo skar mda' ma dang / shan mo
120a2(rgyud): ba ra ma dang / thal ba za ma dang / sha za ma dang / dug ma dang / bung ba ma dang / rmongs byed ma dang / bsngags mdzub ma dang / dmar ldan ma dang / glang dmar ma dang / 'jig rten nye gnas ma dang / thal bar
120a3(rgyud): nye gnas ma dang / shing bi lu dang / ldan ma dang / mang ldan ma dang / mang ma dang / gdul dka' ma dang / e la ma dang / mtshon byed ma dang / du ba la gnas ma dang / du ba ma ste/ sha za mo chen mo 'di
120a4(rgyud): ngag sha za mo'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gang yang ma mo dang / ma mo chen
120a5(rgyud): mo dag 'jig rten gyi rjes su rnam par spyod cing sems can rnams la 'tsher bar byed cing gtor ma dang / me tog dman ma la spyod par byed pa dag la 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa
120a6(rgyud): ma dang / dbang phyug chen po ma dang / khyab 'jug ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / rgan byed ma dang / phag mo dang / dbang mo dang / gshin rje mo dang / me phyogs ma dang / nyi ma'i bu mo dang / 'jig rten
120a7(rgyud): mthar byed ma dang / chu lha ma dang / dbang ldan ma dang / rlung phyogs ma dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog ma dang / mgo bregs ma dang / bya ma dang / bya ma chen mo dang / srul mo dang / skem byed ma ste/ 
120a8(rgyud): ma mo chen mo de dag kyang ma mo'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod
120b1(rgyud): par gyur to// de bzhin du mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas sring pa'i rtse mo'i bar du
120b2(rgyud): thams cad kyang skabs 'dir na mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to// sems can gyi ris na srog chag su la yang phan tshun mi mthun pa med par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / 
120b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sems can thams cad kyi spyi bo'i gtsug na bzhugs par mthong bar
120b4(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas/ kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu
120b5(rgyud): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par gtan la dbang pa ngang ting 'dzin gyi le'u rab 'byam byang chub sems dpa'i sna
120b6(rgyud): snong gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la bab par sems na shod cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjesu gnang bar mdzad pa na mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra ba'i
120b7(rgyud): rdo rje mthug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyun zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang
120b8(rgyud): de dpag tshad brgya stong du ma rgya che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhags par gnas par gyur to// gang du gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / rlung lha dang / sha za de dag dang / mdor na sen gyi khams thams
121a1(rgyud): cang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal med khang de dag rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bur gyur te/ der rab tu zhugs nas 'khod par gyur kyang phan tshun rnam par 'tshe bar
121a2(rgyud): byed pa med do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po de 'dus par gyur par shes nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la smras pa/ kye khro bo chen po sangs rgyas pa
121a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjesu nges par 'byung bar byed pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa 'di'i sems can thams cad srungs shig srungs shig/ dbang du gyis shig/ ma rungs
121a4(rgyud): pa gdul bar gyis shig/ sems can zhi ba dag sad par gyis shig/ sems can thams cad dang par gyis shig/ ji srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjesu sgrub pa byang chub
121a5(rgyud): sems dpa'i sde snod rgya che ba dag las sngags spyod pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol tu song la srung ba gyis shog/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 
121a6(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas khro bo chen po gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjesu srung ba dang / rjes su bstan pa'i phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du khro bo'i rgyal po
121a7(rgyud): gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs bzhi kun dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka dag tu shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra rab tu 'don cing gnas par gyur to// de nas sems can de dag
121a8(rgyud): zhi ba dang / yid dang / sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur to// bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to// 'di lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te/ gang dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de dag ni ardza ka
121b1(rgyud): / dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa'i don du chos kyi
121b2(rgyud): tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsams na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i
121b3(rgyud): rnam par rje su mthong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis la rab tu gnas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis po gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / 
121b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// chos gsum dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad yongasu mi gtong ba
121b5(rgyud): nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa srung ba dang / rang gi sngags yongasu mi gtong ba nyid do// chos bzhi dang yang dag par ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i
121b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur/ te/ bzhi po gang zhe na/ rang gi sngags yongasu mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi sngags rje su gcod pa med pa nyid dang / sems can thad
121b7(rgyud): la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen pos yongasu bsgos pa'i sems pa nyid do// chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub
121b8(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa grub pa yong su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben pa'i phyogs yang dag par
122a1(rgyud): bsten pa nyid dang / bas mtha' dgon pa sten par byed pa nyid de/ sems can gzhan la zhe sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims dang / thos
122a2(rgyud): pa dang / spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de/ chos lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos drug dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing yongs
122a3(rgyud): su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ drug po gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la dang brje su mi gcod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' la dang brje su mi gcod pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las
122a4(rgyud): 'das pa'i sngags la kun tu dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa la lta ba nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab mo'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems
122a5(rgyud): nyid dang / sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang // dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan na rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang
122a6(rgyud): dag par bsgrub pa nyid du 'gyuraro// chos bdun dang ldan na rig pa sgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing sngags kyi spyod pa la rjesu spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na/ theg pa
122a7(rgyud): pa zab mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid sgom pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / 'don du 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa nyid dang / dus dang / phyogs dang
122a8(rgyud): nges par sdom pa dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mi smra ba dang / dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang / rtogs pa dang / blo dang / dran pa dang / shes rab dang / brtan pa la bsnyen pa nyid dang / byang chub
122b1(rgyud): kyi tshogs dang / theg pa chen po dang / zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang / rang dga'i sngags dgug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang / byams
122b2(rgyud): pa chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su sgom pa nyid dang / spros pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyis su med
122b3(rgyud): pa'i ngo bo thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu tshol ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / theg pa dman pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/ chos bdun po
122b4(rgyud): de dag gis ni rig pa dang sngags 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos brgyad dang ldan na rig pa dang snga gas kyi spyod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ 
122b5(rgyud): brgyad po gang zhe na/ mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bra sa bu dag la blta ba dang / sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chu ba sems dpa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / 
122b6(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tsom med cing dang ba nyid dang phyin ci ma log pa'i sngags bzung ba dang / bla ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i nyid kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang / 
122b7(rgyud): spyod pa bstan pa mi slu bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam na mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / 
122b8(rgyud): ser sna dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing rtag tu brtson 'grus rtsom la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang / mdor bsdu na
123a1(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa bas chog mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs thams cad rab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa dang / longs spyod chen po dang
123a2(rgyud): dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
123a3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyuraro// grogs po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang
123a4(rgyud): mi 'bral ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa la yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la nga'i sngags
123a5(rgyud): kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing rmad du byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i yid las byung ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan du shes par bya ba
123a6(rgyud): ma yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas nas nyam sad pa'i phyir yang bslob par bya ba ma yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
123a7(rgyud): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag gis 'di skad du tshig brjod par byed de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras leg so leg so// sngags spyod pa'i don rnam pa sna
123a8(rgyud): tshogs pa'i bya ba chos kyi tshul la rje su 'jug pa dang 'thun zhing chos bstan pa legs par bstan pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir ro// des na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos
123b1(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang rjes su 'thun zhing sngags kyi spyod pa dang rje su 'thun pa legs par bstan pa nyid do// rgyal po chen po gang la la zhig 'dus pa'i le'u 'di klog par 'gyur ba dang / 
123b2(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / yid la byed par 'gyur ba 'am/ g.yul gyi thog mar glang po che'i steng du bzhag pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par
123b3(rgyud): byed na de la bdag cag byin gyis rlob par byed cing phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dag kyang dbang du 'gyur la/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung yang gzhig par bgyi'o// glegs bam la bris pa byas te
123b4(rgyud): rang gi khyim du bzhag na/ de la rigs kyi bu 'am ri kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am rgyal po chen po 'am/ rgyal mo 'am/ rgyal mo chen mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen
123b5(rgyud): nam/ dge bsnyen ma dag la srung ba chen po dang / longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / tshe ring ba nyid dang / nad med pa nyid dang / longs spyod rtag tu mngon par 'phel ba nyid kyang bgyi'o// de skad ces smras
123b6(rgyud): nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cang mi smra bar gyur to// theg pa chen po sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho ga zhib mo las byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam par
123b7(rgyud): 'phrul pa'i le'u rab 'byam rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo las 'dus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
123b8(rgyud): 'khor la bltas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rje su 'jug cing kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par
124a1(rgyud): zhugs ma thag tu lte ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs nas 'od zer bye ba brgya stong du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa'i 'od zer phyung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar
124a2(rgyud): byas nas slar log ste/ gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang snang bar byas nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhonur
124a3(rgyud): gyur pa la smras pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u rab 'byam gyi spyod pa sgrub pa sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur pa
124a4(rgyud): khyod kyi sngags kyi tshogs gang du sems can yang dag par zhugs na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags 'grub pa yang dag par 'gyur bas sams
124a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po khyod smos shig smos shig/ de ska da ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mchog tu
124a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyung smraso// rig pa thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i rdu tshul rtsi pa dru ba ston par byed do// lag pa g.yas pa bteg nas sor mo'i rtse mos 'khor gyi/ 
124a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ston par byed do// sor mo'i rtse mo de las rig pa'i rgyal po bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma byung ste/ byung nas kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang thams cad
124a8(rgyud): snang ba chen pos gnas par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi snying po las thams cad byed pa dang / dpa' bo gcig pa dang / 
124b1(rgyud): spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyong dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / chu la mi nub par 'gro ba dang / dgug pa dang / 
124b2(rgyud): rnam par dbye ba dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams cad dang / phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge
124b3(rgyud): gsum zhes bya ba stobs chen po don thams cad sgrub par byed pa khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags smras pa/ de gang zhe na/ oM AHhUM/ 'di ni khro bo chen po de'i snying po ste/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil
124b4(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa la sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis spras te/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par byed pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal
124b5(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste/ khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa byas so// 'di skad du yang smras te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
124b6(rgyud): rnams dgongs su gsol/ gang su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dam tshig la
124b7(rgyud): lhag par gnas par gyis shig/ de skad smras nas khro bo'i rgyal po la lag pa bskor nas btang bar gyur to// khro bo'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
124b8(rgyud): ngag tu song nas skad cig tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul che ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang ma
125a1(rgyud): gzhal med khang der yang dag par bcug ste/ gnas ji lta ba bzhin gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dag la yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i chog su byas shing spyi bo
125a2(rgyud): la yang dag par gnas par byas so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de la yang bltas nas sems can khyed cag thams cad nyon cig/ gang yang dam tshig 'di
125a3(rgyud): las 'das par gyur na de la khro bo'i rgyal po 'dis chad pa gcod par 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam tshig ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ sngags kyi don gyi
125a4(rgyud): tshig gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis mdor bstan pa brjod par bya yis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad par
125a5(rgyud): bya'o// oM AHhUM/ na maHsarba bud d+hA mAM/ oM ra ra s+pha ra a pra ti ga tA shA sa ma ku mA ra rU pa d+hA riHhA hUM phaT phaT+Ta swA hA/ khroH/ po dag 'di ni rtsu ba'i sngags yin te/ 'phags pa
125a6(rgyud): 'jam dpal zhes bya ba yin no// phyag rgya ni gtsug pud lnga pa zhes grags te/ de la rab tu sbyor bar bya'o// rtsa ba'i sngags 'di ni las thams cad pa zhes bya'o// snying po'i sngags las thams cad
125a7(rgyud): byed cing shes pa yin te/ oM bA kye daM na maH'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug bud gsum zhes bya ba yin te/ longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por
125a8(rgyud): 'gyur ba ni bA kye hUM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems cad thams cad 'gugs par byed pa yin no// 'dir snying po mchog tu 'gyur ba ni ma/ 'dir
125b1(rgyud): phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni rma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba yi ge brgyad yod de/ 
125b2(rgyud): dpal mchog tu byed pa/ dag byed chen po/ srid pa gsum gyi chos nye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ zhi ba thams cad byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ mya ngan las
125b3(rgyud): 'das pa'i bde ba thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ sems
125b4(rgyud): can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir mchog tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa/ re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga yang yongasu
125b5(rgyud): sbyor bar byed na bzlas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de yang gang zhe na/ oM A bI ra hUM khe tsar/ grogs po dag 'di ni yi ge brgyad po dpa' po chen po zhes bya ba gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid
125b6(rgyud): yin te/ sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no// mdor na bya ba thams cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus te/ 
125b7(rgyud): 'dir phyag rgya yang stobs po che zhes rnam par grags pa/ re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'o// spyan drang ba'i sngags ni/ oM he he ku mA ra bi shwa rU pi Na~M/ sarba pA la b+hA shi Ta pra bo d+ha ne/ e h+ye hi bA ga bAn/ 
125b8(rgyud): e h+ye ha~M ku mA ra krI Da nut+pa la d+ha ri Na maN+Da la ma d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ a pra ti ha ta shA nA nAn hUM A bi laM ba ku ru phaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan drang ba'i sngag so// 
126a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
126a2(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / sha za dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi'ang yin no// tsan dan gyi chur byas te/ lan bdun bsngags nas
126a3(rgyud): phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / tha~Md du gtor na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad
126a4(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang / sngags dang / de bzhin du 'byung po'i tshogs dang / sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyuraro// na maH
126a5(rgyud): sarba bud d+hA nAn/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAn/ oM d+hu d+hu ra d+hu ra d+hu ma bA si ni/ d+hu ma ra tsa shi hUM tiSh+Tha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngag so// tsan dan dang / ga bur dang / gur
126a6(rgyud): gum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thod dang / sems can thams cad bdug pas tshim zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par
126a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// pad+ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa// thams cad 'gugs byed zhi ba yin// spyan drang ba yi sngags la yang // pad+ma'i phreng ba bzang po zhes// bya ba'i phyag
126a8(rgyud): rgya 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon dbul bar bya ste/ ga pur dang / can ngan dang / gur gum chu dang sbyar nas// 
126b1(rgyud): me tog su ma dang / ma li ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / me tog pu na ka dang / me tog pa ku la dang / me tog piN+Di ta ga ru 'di dag gang yang rung ba'i me tog gam/ dus ji lta ba'i me tog dri zhim
126b2(rgyud): po bcug ste/ sngags 'dis mchod yon dbul bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ he he ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shwa rU pa d+hA ra Ni/ arbaM pra tIts+tsha pa ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sA
126b3(rgyud): tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra be sha pra be sha sarba d+hu tA nu kaM pa ka grah+Na hU~M/ oM pa ra bi tsI ri Na swA hA/ 'dir yang phyag rgya ni gang ba zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad rje su 'thun
126b4(rgyud): zhing brtan pa'o// 'dir yang dri'i sngag su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ na maHsa man+ta gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa shri yaM/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ gan d+he gan d+he ga~M d+ha de/ gan+d+he na mo ra te/ pra
126b5(rgyud): tIts+tsha pra tIts+tsha maM/ gaM d+h+waM sa ma tA nu tsa ri NaM swA hA/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni lo ma zhes bya ba re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dir me tog gi sngagasu 'gyur
126b6(rgyud): ni/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ na ma saM ku su mi ta rA dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya tad+ya thA/ ku su me ku su me ku swa ma d+he/ ku su ma pU ra bA sa mi ku su ma ba ti swA hA/ 
126b7(rgyud): bdug pa'i sngags 'di nyid dang / gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sku ni rmang byung bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs
126b8(rgyud): pa yid// gtor ma'i sngags ni bshad par bya/ na maHsarba bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA mA~M tad+ya grA he he b+ha ga gAM ma hA sa twa sar+b+ba ba lo ki ta i maM ba liM grah+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM / sarba / 
127a1(rgyud): shwa ra ra Ta Ta phaT swA hA/ 'dis ni bshos dbul bar bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o// 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa thams cad bzlog pa
127a2(rgyud): byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ sarba ta mon d+ha kA ra bi d+h+waM sA nAM/ na maHsa man+ta dz+yo ti gan+d+har+tha b+hA sa shr-i ye / ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ he he b+ha ga bAM/ dz+yo ti rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra bra
127a3(rgyud): ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra bi kurba bi kurbe ma hA bo d+ha sa tra sa man+ta dzA lod d+yo ti ta murti khurda khurda/ e ba lo ka ya/ a ba mo ka ya mo/ laM sarba / sa twe nAny+tsa swA hA/ mar me'i sngags te/ 'dis mar me dbul
127a4(rgyud): bar bya'o// kha bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ni sems can kun gyis mthong ba'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ ted+ya thA/ dz+wA la dz+wa la/ dz+wa la ya dz+wA la ya/ hUM bi b+ho da ka ha
127a5(rgyud): kr-iSh+Na ping+ga la swA hA/ me'i bya ba byed pa'i sngags so// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ sems can kun la 'od gsal byed// kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags// byang chub
127a6(rgyud): sems dpa' blo ldan gyir// thub pa mchog gis sngon bshad pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
127a7(rgyud): po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang bar bya ba yin te/ khyod bu 'jig rten rnam grags pa'i// mi bzad pa ni gang yin pa/ sngags rnams dag ni thams cad
127a8(rgyud): kyis ta mkhas pa rnams kyis sgrub pa te// spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs kyang yin// de ni rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na maHsa man+ta/ 
127b1(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nA~M/ oM ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kar+ya bany+dza bany+dza/ sarba big+h+na da ha da sarba badz+ra bi nA ya kAM mur+N+Na ka Ta dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra ma hA bi kri ta rU pa d+hA ri Ni/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta~M/ 
127b2(rgyud): ma hA ga na pa ti dzi bi tAn+ta ka ra ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba gra hAn/ Sha Da mu kha ShaH b+hu dza/ ShaT tsa ra Na ru dra ma nA ya/ biSh+Nu ma nA ya/ brah+ma d+ya de ba ma nA ya mA bi laM ga la phul hu maN+Da la ma d+h+ye pra bai
127b3(rgyud): sha yas ma ya ma nu smar hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT/ phaT swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug
127b4(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba yin te/ khro bo'i rgyal po bgag/ sa thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyi sa sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
127b5(rgyud): dpa' yang 'jigs par byed pa yin na bgegs ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di brjod pa tsam nyid kyis srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ 
127b6(rgyud): nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i// bgegs rnams thams cad zhi byed pa'o// 'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHbi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha truM nA sha ya staM b+ha ya phaT phaT
127b7(rgyud): swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzer chen po dang / nad chen po dang / nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyuraro// rtag tu dga' ba med pa dang / byams pa med pa dang
127b8(rgyud): snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas zin gyi bar du grol bar mi 'gyur zhing 'chi bar 'gyuraro// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya'i zhi ba'i sems yod pa gzhan
128a1(rgyud): dag la ni ma yin no// phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya'o// 'dir nye ba'i snying por 'gyur ba mi oM tri kA la rU pa hUM swAhA/ phyag rgya ni rtse gsum chen po zhes bya ba nyid
128a2(rgyud): sbyar bar bya'o// ma rungs pa thams cad la gang 'dod pa de byed par 'gyur ro// snying po'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa yo ga~M gcig pa zhes bya'o// glu/ 'di ni las thams cad
128a3(rgyud): byed pa'o// phyag rgya yang rtse gsum chen po zhes bya bar sbyar bar bya'o// phung khrol thams cad bzlog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa ste/ mdor na khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni las thams
128a4(rgyud): cad la sbyar bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzlas pa byas na grub pa'i dus su khyad par du 'phags par 'gyuraro// 'dir gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsarba/ 
128a5(rgyud): bud d+ha nAM/ oM pra ti ha ta shA sa na nA/ tad+ya thA/ dzaya dza ya su dza ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bi shA rU pi Ni gan+d+ha sarba bud d+ha sh+tsa bi sar+b+ba ya sa pa ri bA raM swa b+hA nAM tsa pra be sha ya sa
128a6(rgyud): ma ya ma nu sma ra sar+b+ba d+hA sh+tsa me/ sid d+hA n+tu man+t+ra pA da ma nor thaM tsa/ me pa ri pU re yan+d+ha swA hA/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ las thams cid la sbyar bar bya'o// 
128a7(rgyud): phyag rgya ni bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dis gdan la yang sbyar bar bya'o// yid kyis bzlas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsolo// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa
128a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / sngags 'grub pa dag dang / dam tshig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang / nges par sdom pa dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur/ 
128b1(rgyud): gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang / rang gi rig pa'i tshogs kyi sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam smraso// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a
128b2(rgyud): pra ti ha ta gA tI NAM/ oM ri Ti ni swA hA// 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi rjesu 'brang ba sgra gcan ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa las thams cad byed pa/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga zhes bya ba dug gi las thang
128b3(rgyud): la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsarba bud d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ oM ni ti/ 'di ni nye ba'i sgra can ma zhes bya ba'i rig pa yin te/ las thams cad byed pa'o// phyag rgya ni kha bye ba zhes bya ba
128b4(rgyud): gza' thams cad kyi las la sbyar bar bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha naM/ a pra ti ha ta gA tI nI lo n+di/ rig pa 'di ni pad+ma can zhes bya ste/ las thams cad byed cing dge ba'o// phyag
128b5(rgyud): rgya bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba dang ldan pas gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par bya'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsa~M t+yAd b+hu ta ru pI NAM/ oM Sh+T+r-iSh+TaM swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsdams pa yis// mkha'
128b6(rgyud): 'gro ma rnams 'joms par byed// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// thams cad gzugs can rab sngags pa// rig pa thong can zhes bya ba// 'jam po'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bung
128b7(rgyud): d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta tsa rI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyag rgya gtsug pud gsum nyid ni/ dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya'o// gzugs mnga' 'chang ba lha mo ni// myur du longs spyod grub byed pa'o// na maHsa
128b8(rgyud): man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a tsit+ta b+hU ta rU pa NAM/ oM b+hu ri swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung rtse yang dag sbyar// rims nad thams cad rnam 'jig yin// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA NAM/ a tsi twAd b+hu ta rU pI NA~M oM tA re swA hA/ rig pa phug
129a1(rgyud): / ron zhes bya ba/ las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ a tsi tA b+hU ta rU pI d+h+waM/ 
129a2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ oM bi lo ki ni swA hA// rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ oM tsin+ta
129a3(rgyud): b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM bi she bi shwe saM b+hA be bi shwa rU pI Ni ka ha A be sha A be sha sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra ru ru tiSh+Tha sA hA/ rig pa rin po stobs chen 'di/ 'jig rten 'dren pas bsten pa ste/ 
129a4(rgyud): mche ba'i phyag rgya ldan byas te// sems can thams cad 'bebs shing dge/ 'byung po kun la mchog sbyin pa// thams cad ces ni yang dag bsgrags// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a \u0f7f
129a5(rgyud): tA b+hu ta rU pI d+h+waM/ ai she te shrI ba su swA hA/ rmabya'i gdan gyi phyag rgya yis// rnam dgod las ni thams cad byed// dkar mo chen mo zhes bya ba/ rmang byung bsam med
129a6(rgyud): gzugs can te// 'jig rten rnams kyi skal ldan byed// skyes pa bud med dbang du 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a tsi t+yAd b+hu ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM khi khi r-i khi ri b+haM khu ri sarba sha truM staM b+ha
129a7(rgyud): ya dzaM b+ha ya mo ha ya ba sha mA nA ya swA hA/ rig pa 'di ni rig chen po// rnal 'byor ma zhes rab tu bstan// phyag rgya gdong gsum sbyar byas na// ma rungs sems can 'dul bar byed// na mas
129a8(rgyud): man+ta bud d+hA nAM/ oM pra ti ha ta sha ka ti pre tsa rI NA~M / tad+ya thA/ oM shrIH/ rig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan po ste/ phyag rgya kha sbyar sbyar byas nas// rgyal srod chen po spya
129b1(rgyud): byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nA~M/ sarba satwa b+ha ya pra dA yi nAM/ oM a dza~M ti ku mA ra rU pi naM e h+ye hi A gan+d+ha ma ma kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/ rgyal byed ma zhes rnam grags pa// gzhon nu bdud rtsi las byung
129b2(rgyud): ba/ rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis// ngagra rnams thams cad bzlog par byed// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a tsin+d+ha b+hU ta rU pI NAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza ye swA hA/ a dzi te swA hA/ a pa rA dzi te swA hA/ sring mo
129b3(rgyud): bzhi zhes rnam grags pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes 'gro ba// sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro zhing // ku la rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o// ming po gtum bu ru zhes grags// 'di dag gi ni rjes su
129b4(rgyud): 'brang gru yi bzhon pa la zhon nas// rgya mtsho la ni gnas pa yin// khu tshur phyag rgya bcings pa yis// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ 
129b5(rgyud): lo kA grA d+hi pa tI nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ku mA ra ma hA ku mA ra ki Ta ki Ta/ sho mu kha bo d+hi satwa nu dz+nyA ta/ ma yu rA sa na/ shak+Sho d+he te pA ne/ rak+taM ga rak+taM ga d+hA nu le pa na pra A yA kha kha khA hi khA
129b6(rgyud): ha hUM nr-id t+ye/ rak+ta pu shwA tsi ta murti sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+hU ma b+h+rab+hU ma/ b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/ la phu la huM mA bi laM ba sarba kAr+ya NaM me ku ru ku ru/ bi tsing tra rU pa d+ha ri NI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM sarba bud d+ha nu dz+nyA ta swAhA/ 
129b7(rgyud): skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa ni// sa rnams ma lus rnam drug tu// kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos// sems can kun gyi don phyir dang // ma rungs
129b8(rgyud): sems can bzlog pa'i phyir// mi bzad dbang phyug bu'i gzugs su// gdul ba'i don du 'dir skyes te// skem byed dang ni mig dmar gyi// phyag mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste// snying rjes thugs
130a1(rgyud): ni brlan pa yi// 'jam pa'i ngag gis gsungs pa yin// sems dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams la phan byed gang // sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni// 'gro ba kun la
130a2(rgyud): rnam par spyod// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid chen pos sbyar na ni// tshangs pa sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na// mi rnams la ni smos ci dgos// gzhon nu'i semasu mtha' dag ni// bsdus nas
130a3(rgyud): yongasu bshad par bya// smin drug bu dang 'jam dpal gyi// sngags su 'di ni yang dag bstan// sems can rje su gzung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpar 'dir ston to// yid gsum zhes bya'i snying po ni/ 
130a4(rgyud): 'di yi sngags su brjod pa yin// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// longs spyod 'dren pa'i mchog de yin// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bkod na las kun byed pa yin// oM
130a5(rgyud): hUM dzA/ sngags 'di ru bsdu byas na// mi rnams kyi ni don byed do// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ sa man+ta d+yo ti ta mur+t+ti nA~M/ oM bi kri ta gra hA hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di yang nye ba'i snying po ste// de bzhin
130a6(rgyud): phyag rgya mdung ldan pas// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs byed cing // de bzhin gza' dang ma mor bcas// phyag rgya kun gyis phyag rgya la// bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni
130a7(rgyud): sngangs byed cing // ma rungs 'jug pa bzlog par byed// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gzhon nu ni rje su 'brang ba ste// las thams cad byed pa
130a8(rgyud): sted bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// 'byung po thams cad spangs par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / skem par byed pa
130b1(rgyud): dang / 'jig par byed pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM brah+ma brah+ma ba ra tsa sa shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ sngags
130b2(rgyud): 'di tshangs pa chen po ste/ byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin// 'byung pos zhi gyur rab tu thob// skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur// phyag rgya gtsug pung lnga sbyor ni/ myur du dge legs thob par
130b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ mngon spyod dag ni thams cad la/ sring srung gi ni rig byed 'dod// 'di ni mdor bsdus bstan pa ste/ 'di yi cho ga bsdus pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM
130b4(rgyud): ka ru Da bA ha na tsak+Sha pa d+hi/ tsa tur+N+Na dza hUM hUMs ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ bo d+hi satwa Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i don ni myur byed yin// 'byung po rnam
130b5(rgyud): ni rnam 'jig cing // khyab 'jug gzugs kyi lus can yin/ phyag rgya gtsug pud gsum sbyar na// las rnams kun byed brtan pa yin// gang dag khyab 'jug rgyud las mi// bya ba rgya
130b6(rgyud): cher bstan pa dag/ thabs kyis gdul bya'i sems can la// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM ma hA ma he shwa ra b+hU tA d+hi pa
130b7(rgyud): ti pra Sha b+ha d+h+wa dza pra le ba dza TA mu ku Ta d+hA ra Ne/ si ta b+hasma sa ri Ta mUrti hUM hUM phaT phaT/ bo d+hi sa twA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// sngags 'di bdag gis smras pa ste// phyag rgya
130b8(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum sbyar na// 'byung po thams cad rnam 'jig pa'o// bdag gis sngon ni gang bstan pa// 'di yi cho ga sngon byung ba// sems can sa steng gnas pa la// zhi ba pa zhes brjod pa ste// yon tan
131a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rgya skye ga/ zhi ba'i rgyud las ngayis bstan/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+hAm+b+hamAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA mA~M dad+ya thA/ oM shA ku na ma hA shA ku ma/ pad+ma bi dA ta pak+Sha sar+b+ba bA nA shrI ga la kha3/ 
131a2(rgyud): hi khA hi sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM tiSh+Tha bo d+hi sa twa A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ sngags 'di mthu ni chen po ste// na mkha' lding zhes rnam par grags// gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs ka can
131a3(rgyud): gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na// phung khrol shin tu mi bzad 'joms// gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni// gso bar byed par the tsom med// sems can gdul bya'i thab su ni// 
131a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag bka'// namakha' lding gzugs sa la spyod// 'dab chags dbang po 'od chen ldan// ji srid na mkha' lding rgyud du// cho ga rgya cher bstan de dag/ sems can
131a5(rgyud): rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' na mkha' lding // gdul ba'i don du 'di bstan to// gdengs can dug ni gzhom bya'i phyir// 
131a6(rgyud): 'dab chags tshul gyis rnam par rgyu// 'jig rten sngags ni ji srid pa// cho ga 'di ni bstan pa na// sems can gdul bya'i don du ni// de lta de ltar rnam par rgyu// gang yang de bzhin gshegs sngags dang / 
131a7(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma'i rigs dag kyang // nga yis cho ga rab 'byam dang // mdo dag kyang ni bstan pa yin// ji ltar ma mo mang po ni// 'bad pas byis pa rnam srung ba// de bzhin byis pa'i blo can la// sngags kyi
131a8(rgyud): tshul gyis nga yis bshad// sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan// da ni nga yis bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don ni ma lus pa// 'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa yin// rgyal ba mchog gis gang
131b1(rgyud): gsungs dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang // rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis// 'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan
131b2(rgyud): pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la gzigs nas dam tshig yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// gang du ting nge
131b3(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na sems can mtha' dag gi/ sgrub pa'i spyod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpa'i gzhon nur gyur pa snyams par zhugs ma thag tu thang
131b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang nor bu chen po sna tshogs pa'i rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmad du byung ba'i byang chub
131b5(rgyud): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa
131b6(rgyud): ngag gis kyang dkyil 'khor de bri ba 'am/ 'drir 'jug par mi nus na so so'i skye bor gyur pa'i sems can gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang po de grub pa'i gnas
131b7(rgyud): skabs la gnas pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang
131b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa tha~Md 'jam dpal
132a1(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / ting 'dzin gyi khyad par gyi
132a2(rgyud): thugs las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes par gyur to// sems can so so'i skye bo'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mi nus na/ bri ba
132a3(rgyud): 'am 'drir 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil 'khor chen po bzang po de la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/ grogs
132a4(rgyud): po dag nyon cig/ 'di ni de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin na sems can gzhan 'phags pa dang / 
132a5(rgyud): 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i
132a6(rgyud): sras mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa yid las byung ba ni bstan to// mi rnams kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yongasu mya ngan las 'das
132a7(rgyud): na yang sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes
132a8(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras gang de dus la bab par shes na gsungs shig/ gsungs shig/ shAkya seng ge mgon po ni// yongasu mya ngan 'das 'og na/ 
132b1(rgyud): sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid// sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed// mthong ba tsam gyis 'jig rten na// sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// mi shes cho ga nyams pa 'am/ dam tshig
132b2(rgyud): bdag por ma gyur na// bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// sngags la dad pa med pas ni// 'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi
132b3(rgyud): 'gyur bas// ma rungs dam tshig mi bsten to// dam tshig sbyar ba nyams pa ni// rab 'byam brgya byin yin na yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur na// mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam
132b4(rgyud): tshig bstan bcos de nyid shes// las kyi spyod pa sgrub pa la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// sngags rnams tha~Md 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor ni
132b5(rgyud): las kun byed la rab zhugs na// bstan pa la ni gzhon nu bzhin// sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes sems dpa'
132b6(rgyud): chen po de la gsol ba btab pa// kye sems can chen po sems can gyi don gyis phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so// gsang ba pa'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / 
132b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras pa/ re shig dang po cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed dam/ dpyid zla 'bring po 'am/ dpyid zla tha chungs sam/ zla ba yang
132b8(rgyud): ngo 'am/ nyin zhag dge ba dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa yang ngo'i tshes gcig dang / zla ba nya ba dang / dus gzhan la dbyar gyi dus spangs la/ snga dros byin gyis
133a1(rgyud): brlab par bya ste/ gang du grong khyer chen po la rten pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon rang nyid 'dug par bya'o// rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sam/ rgya mtsho'i ngogs dang
133a2(rgyud): nye ba grong khyer chen po'i byang shar gyi phyog su ha cang yang mi ring / ha cang yang mi nye bar dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon song ste/ lo ma'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du gcig
133a3(rgyud): pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de dag tu yang gtsang ma'i sa phyogs rdo ba med pa/ gyo mo dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phug ma dang / rus pa spangs pa/ shin tu gtsang ba/ shin tu
133a4(rgyud): yongs su sbyangs pa'i sa phyogs srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga 'am/ tsan dan dang / ga bur dang / gur gum gyi chus ba sres pa khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi sngags
133a5(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas sa phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dang / thang ka dang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du bsang gtor bya'o// 
133a6(rgyud): de nas phyogs der kun nas gru bzhir khru bcu drug gam/ khru bcu gnyis sam/ khru brgyad pa byas te/ de la chen po ni khru bcu drug pa'o// 'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o// chung ngu ni khru brgyad pa'o// 
133a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di ni rnam pa gsum// thang gzigs pas gsungs pa yin// rgyal po 'dod pas chen po ste// 'bring ni longs spyod 'phel byed pa// chung ngu dam tshig yang dag srung // las rnams
133a8(rgyud): kun byed zhi ba yin// de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de la sa phyogs der khru do tsam brkos la/ der rdo ba dang / sol ba dang / thal ba dang / rus pa dang / sgra la son pa dang / 
133b1(rgyud): srog chags kyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs gal te mthong na sa'i phyogs gzhan du brko ba byas gnod pa med pa dang / 'tshe ba med par 'gyuraro// ri bo'i rtse mo dang / chu bo'i ngogs dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram
133b2(rgyud): dang / chu bo chen po'i ngogs su bye ma'i phung po chen po rnams 'bad pas shin tu so sor brtags te/ shin tu gtsang ba dang / srog chags med par byas la bri bar bya'o// sa phyogs de yang srog chags
133b3(rgyud): med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam pa lnga bsres te chu bo'i klung gis gtsang ma 'am/ grog mkhar gyi sa gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bkang nas kyang legs par brdungs te kun nas
133b4(rgyud): mnyam por byas la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gang 'dod par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur pa bzhi la khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla zhing phyogs bzhir gdab bo// tshon sna
133b5(rgyud): lnga'i skud pa la khro bo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbu sa kyis gan su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o// 
133b6(rgyud): dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o// gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grogs po
133b7(rgyud): dang / bdag nyid srung bar byas la/ sngags zlo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de la g.ya su bskor ba byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te ku sha'i stan la 'dug pa bya'o// 
133b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyil 'khor de'i gru bzhi kun tu ku shas bskor zhing dgram par bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi rol tu yang ba rnams zhag gcig gan/ 
134a1(rgyud): pas bsnyal zhing dbyung bar bya'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngon du bya ba rnams byas nas rang gi rgyud kyi sngags la mkhas pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi
134a2(rgyud): phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / zhag gcig bsnyung bar byas pa dang / grogs bzang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan bcos sna tshogs kyis las mthong bas tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin tu gsal
134a3(rgyud): zhing legs par sbyar ba byas la/ yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag par bya'o// phyi rol tu yang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / 
134a4(rgyud): babs bzhis rgyan pa/ chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga rdung ba dang / dung gi sgra dang // dga' ba dang / bkra shis pa'i sgra sgrogs pa dag bya'o// zur bzhi
134a5(rgyud): nas chos mnyan pa dag la bshad par bya'o// / phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo sde bklag par bya ba la 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
134a6(rgyud): pa lho phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa sdong po rgyan pa byang phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 
134a7(rgyud): 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shar phyogasu bklag par bya'o// glegs bam med na mdo sde bzhi po shes pa'i gang zag chos 'chad pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir bskul bar bya'o// 
134a8(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon langs nas tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim pa dkar po la rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de tha~Md du tshal par
134b1(rgyud): dgram par bya'o// mngon par bkram pa byas nas phyi rol tu byung ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar 'dod pa'i kha zas bsten pa'i ri mo mkhan gnyis sam/ gsum byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong
134b2(rgyud): nye bar bsten pa mkhas pa dag bcug ste/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis gtsug pud bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang / dngul dang / zangs dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las tshon sna shin tu mdzes pa
134b3(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te/ longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang / chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang
134b4(rgyud): chub 'thob pa yin na/ sngags sgrubs par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur nas// / sen bsod nams chung ba la// 'di 'dra'i long spyod ga la yod// de bas
134b5(rgyud): cho ga 'di bstan bya// 'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis// skye bo phongs par gzigs nas ni/ nyung zhing dkyil bsdu sa dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sa
134b6(rgyud): lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin tu zhib pa'i tshon sna lnga bzang po dkor ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba dang / nag po dang / ljang khu dag gis bsgyur te/ sngar bzhag pa'i tshon gyi phye ma slob dpon rang gis
134b7(rgyud): blangs nas gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas phye ma de la phyag rgya bcing ngo // sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob dpon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar
134b8(rgyud): lho mtshams kyi phyogasu cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis thab khung bya ste/ rgyar khru do la zabs su khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba// phyi rol yang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra ba// shing pa la sha'i
135a1(rgyud): yam shing gis me sbar par bya/ shing bil ba'i yam shing gis mtho gang tsam rlon pa la zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la btags pa la rtsa ba'i sngags 'bru drug pa 'am/ snying pos
135a2(rgyud): khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyan drangs nas sngar bstan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor
135a3(rgyud): gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang / 'chog chas byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan yang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin sreg byed du gzhug go// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon sangs rgyas dang
135a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la bya ste/ sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdugs nas thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud nas/ 'jam
135a5(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yang phyag byas te/ tshon gyi phye ma blangs nas sku'i gzugs kyis bcad pa la ri mo mkhan gyis yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// tshi ga 'di dag gis
135a6(rgyud): dang por sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid rnam pa tha~Md kyi mchog dang ldan pa seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhugs pa bri bar
135a7(rgyud): bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon ri mo 'dri ba la 'dir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis slob dpon bdag nyid srung ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung po thod pa'i gtor ma btang bar bya ste/ 
135a8(rgyud): phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og dag tu gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te thab khung du nye bar song nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsang sbra dang / srung ba'i cho ga byas nas gur gun
135b1(rgyud): dang bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brkyang bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas bzlas pa byas te de nyid du gnas par bya'o// nyungs kar la khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi
135b2(rgyud): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par bya'o// bgegs kyi rnam pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sgra rnam pa du ma
135b3(rgyud): rlung dang / char dang / yul ngan gzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba mthong na khros pas nyung kar chang bar bcas te/ lan bdun sbyin sreg byas pa des ni bgegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur// 
135b4(rgyud): mi'i bgegs la ni lan lnga chang ba nas sbyin sreg na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba 'am/ nus pa med par 'gyurab 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skad cig de nyid
135b5(rgyud): la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur ba la rnams kyang the com med de brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na ma rungs pa'i sems can dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bgegs tha mal pa
135b6(rgyud): lta smos kyang ci dgos/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyis 'jigs pas bgegs rnams phan tshun du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis de du ku sha'i khres
135b7(rgyud): la gnas nas khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyis bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi
135b8(rgyud): g.yas ngos su rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan pa bya'o// de dag gi yang g.yas su bcom ldan 'dra
136a1(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog ltar dkar ga/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pa na
136a2(rgyud): pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ de'i yang g.yas na bcom ldan 'das yum gis dkar mo// phyag g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bac+doMs shAkya thu
136a3(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal ba/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag gser gyi cod pan 'chang ba/ dar la dkar po'i na gza' banabs pa/ dar la'i bla gos banabs pa/ thal ba nag pos
136a4(rgyud): thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can lnga rang rang gi gnas su spyod lam dag gis gnas pa bya'o// de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum
136a5(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan dang / gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun
136a6(rgyud): tu bzang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / na mkha'i mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang / byams pa rnga yab lag na thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom
136a7(rgyud): ldan 'das la lta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / nor bzang dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams
136a8(rgyud): cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang / 'jig rten 'gro ba dang / blo chen po dang / blo bzang po ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin tu zhi ba dang / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// 
136b1(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang / pad+ma'i rigs gzugs dang / phyag rgya lung ji lta ba bzhin du gnas ji lta ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o// mtha'i gru bzhi'i gnas dag tu
136b2(rgyud): gnas rnams bzhag par bya'o// pad+ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang / rig pa'i lha gang dran pa yang de dag tu bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / 
136b3(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni ri spos kyi ngang ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi shar du bdag nyid lta ba dang / thams cad la yang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bac+doMs
136b4(rgyud): thub pa'i g.yon phyog su rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsan dan dang / grub pa zhes bya ba gnyis bri bar bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos gnyis ni 'od srung chen po dang / 
136b5(rgyud): ka t+yA ya na bri bar bya'o// de dag gi yang g.yon du 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje ud pa la ltar mdog sngo bsangs gzugs shin tu me sa pa/ rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa
136b6(rgyud): g.yas pa na rnga yab thogs pa/ g.yon pa khro bo'i lus kyis gnas pa/ rdo rje khu tshur ma/ rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma/ dpung bzang ma/ rdo rje sde ma cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bgegs kyi
136b7(rgyud): gdan la gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa ji ltar shes pa bzhin bri bar bya'o// de dag gi yang g.yon du zung
136b8(rgyud): bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang gnas gang du rig pa'i tshogs ma dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// de'i steng du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bcom
137a1(rgyud): ldan 'das yum mA ma kI bri bar ste rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs shin tu mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po brgyad kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya
137a2(rgyud): bcings nas rang rang dag gis 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin tu dul la/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
137a3(rgyud): la zur gyis lta ba dag la 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba dang / gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang / gtsug tor gdugs po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / pad+ma'i gtsug tor dang / 
137a4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug te dang / gtsug tor mthon po ste brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rnam so// g.yon du bri ba ni rang sangs
137a5(rgyud): rgyas rnam so// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi sgor ni byang chub sems dpa' gnyis bya ste/ g.yas phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes bya ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag
137a6(rgyud): g.yon pa mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi'u blugs 'dzin cing sgo la mngon du phyogs pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// 'jug pa'i sgo'i g.yon
137a7(rgyud): phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma rgyal ba las rgyal ba zhes bya ba bri bar bya ste/ lus rab tu zhi ga ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang spri'u blugs 'dzin
137a8(rgyud): pa/ lag pa g.yas pa ni mchog sbyin pas phreng ba 'dzin pa/ bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang ldan pa sgo la mngon par phyogs pa bri'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo kun tu 'bar bas
137b1(rgyud): khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can sku mdog dmar
137b2(rgyud): skrad zhi ba'i gzugs dang mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yon pa na ud pa la sngon po bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa na bil ba bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan tha~Md kyis
137b3(rgyud): brgyan pa/ gtsug pungad lngas nye bar mdzes par gyur pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ dar la'i stong g.yogs banabs pa/ dar gyi na bzas smad g.yogs mdzad pa/ 'od kun nas
137b4(rgyud): 'phro ba/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la nye bar bzhugs pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed la gzigs pa/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgro la mngon
137b5(rgyud): du phyogs pa blta na sdug pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi/ ngos kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen po'i gzugs
137b6(rgyud): can/ kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ bka' len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs su lta'o// g.yon phyoTakyi pad+ma'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
137b7(rgyud): lha'i bu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' lnga bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dri med dang / shin tu dul ba dang / dag pa dang / mun sel dang / kun tu snang ba'o// de dag tha~Md kyang gnas
137b8(rgyud): gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyi gcal bkram pa/ shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// phyi rol
138a1(rgyud): khor yug tu zur bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshon sna lngas gsal bas ri mo shin tu drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi
138a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo'i dbusu me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs
138a3(rgyud): pa'i gzugs cung zad chung bar bya'o// 'od kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ de'i g.yasu gtsug tor 'khor los
138a4(rgyud): bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// g.yon du ni gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bri
138a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi steng du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyagargya'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu
138a6(rgyud): med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs can te/ phyag rgya mchog sbyin pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i yang g.yas phyogs su lhung
138a7(rgyud): bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya bya'o// bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin
138a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i g.yon phyog su gtsug tor gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya bri ste/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i g.yon phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog bya ste/ 
138b1(rgyud): rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du chos ston cing bzhugs pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po dad / margad dang / pad+ma rA ga rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'phro ba'i kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya'o// de'i yang g.yon
138b2(rgyud): phyogasu rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa bi'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba dang ldan pa bri'o// de'i yang
138b3(rgyud): g.yon phyogs su 'khar sil dang / spri'u blugs dang / phreng ba dang / bzang po'i gdan gyi phyag rgya bri'o// mthor gyis sgor gan su rdo rje rtse gsum pa gnyis ga la yang kun nas 'bar ba bri'o// 
138b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga zhes bya ba dang / ud pa la'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis phan
138b5(rgyud): tshun 'brel pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o// sgo dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang / 'jug pa na ni mdun gyis lta bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du
138b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshon shin tu gsal ba sna tshogs blta na sdug pa zur bzhis rnam par mdzes pa/ rta babs bzhi'i rnam pa phyogs bzhir khru gnyis tsam/ nang gi dkyil 'khor
138b7(rgyud): gyi phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su tshangs pa chen po bri bar bya ste/ gdong bzhi pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa la stod g.yogs gos dkar pa dang / tshangs skud dkar po thogs pa kha dog gser 'dra
138b8(rgyud): ga ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ lag na dbyug pa dang spyi'u blugs 'dzin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ bsam gtan khyad par can gyi
139a1(rgyud): gzugs can dar la'i gos bgos pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ bzhin shin tu gsal ba/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po cam skyil mo
139a2(rgyud): krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus rab tu zhi ba/ bsam gtan gyi rnam pa'i
139a3(rgyud): cha byad can/ dar la'i gos bgos pa/ dar la'i gos kyi stod g.yog byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas
139a4(rgyud): pa/ de'i rim gyis dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'thab bral dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ go rims ji lta ba
139a5(rgyud): dang / cha byad dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin du'o// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris la rtag tu myos dang / phreng thogs dang / lag na gzhong thogs dang / pi bang
139a6(rgyud): gnyis pa dang / sa bla'i lha'i bu dag go rims ji lta ba dang / cha byad ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom
139a7(rgyud): snang ba dang / dge chung dang / bsod nams skyes la sogs pa'i lha'i bu cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs dang / byang phyogasu yang de bzhin te/ de dag ni rim pa
139a8(rgyud): 'og ma gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi phyi rol tu dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la mthar gyis phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas
139b1(rgyud): 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos gter nye bar gnas pa la gnod sbyin rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug pud cung zad 'dud pa/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ de'i g.ya su nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang po
139b2(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'phrog ma yang bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyog su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang / klu dga'
139b3(rgyud): bo dag nye dga' bo dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad po bri'o// de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi
139b4(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / drang srong dang / grub pa dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / namakha' lding dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sman dang / 
139b5(rgyud): bu rin po che'i bye brag dang / ri dang / chu bo dang / gling dang / mthar gyis gtso bo thams cad bri bar bya'o// lho phyog su ni gc-i rje ma mo bdun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// 
139b6(rgyud): shar lho mtsham su me kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ dbyug pa dang / spyi'u blugs dang / phreng ba lag na thogs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ gos dkar po bgos pa/ dar li'i
139b7(rgyud): stod g.yogs byas pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ thal ba'i thig le gsum byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyun dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang / dbyings dang / kha
139b8(rgyud): dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bri bar bya'o// thaMd kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rol tu dka' bzlog gi bdag po khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag na mdung rtsegasu
140a1(rgyud): thogs pa/ lha mo dka' zlog ma kha dog sna tshogs pa/ rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bu rma bya'i gdan la 'dug pa/ mdung thogs pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ gdong drug pa/ 
140a2(rgyud): lus dmar por snang ba/ gos ser po bgos pa/ gos ser po'i stod g.yogs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na dril bu dang / ba dan dmar pa thogs pa/ mthar gyis b+h+ring gi ri ti shin tu rid pa 'dra
140a3(rgyud): ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin bri bar
140a4(rgyud): bya'o// nor lha brgya dang / drang srong bdun dang / khyab 'jug lag pa bzhin 'khor lo dang / dung dang / ga dA dang / ral gri thogs pa/ gdan na mkha' lding rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan
140a5(rgyud): pa/ gza' brgyad dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgyu ba yang bri bar bya'o// mthar gyis tshe grangs bco lnga dang / 
140a6(rgyud): yar ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang / dus drug dang / zla ba bcu gnyis dang / lo tshigs dang / sring mo bzhi gru la zhon pa dang / ming po lnga gru la zhon cing chu la gnas
140a7(rgyud): pa ste/ mdor na phyag rgyar bzhag par bya ba yang yino// lha mo de dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la bsten te bya ba yin no// slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol tu byung nas dkyil 'khor de
140a8(rgyud): la g.yas phyogasu bskor ba byas te/ mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum yang dkyil 'khor gsum la rten cing bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gsum car yang gru bzhir rnam par gnas par
140b1(rgyud): bya ba yin no// mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi mgon po ni nges par bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri
140b2(rgyud): bar bya'o// rdo rje'i rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje yang nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun tu bzang po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpal
140b3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa yang nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma rnams kyi ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bar ma la yang shar
140b4(rgyud): phyogs su ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o// sgo'i drung du ni smin drug gi bu rma ba'i stan yod pa/ lag na mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog dmar gagos ser pos stong
140b5(rgyud): g.yogs dang gos byas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na dril bu dang ba dan thogs pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can 'khor la lta ba'o/ shar phyog su ni na mkha' lding 'dab chags
140b6(rgyud): kyi gzugs can/ drang srong gi nang nas mar kan da nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// shar lhor ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po
140b7(rgyud): gzhon nu dang bcas pa gru'i bzhon pa la gnas pa/ rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang / me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogasu ni srin po'i bdag po las
140b8(rgyud): ni grong khyer lnga ka'i bdag po b+hi b+hi sha na shing pi tsu marda la gnas pa dang / dzam+b+ha la chu dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du
141a1(rgyud): mthar gyis gshin rje'i rgyal po yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par g.yengs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni
141a2(rgyud): ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi mtshams su ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang nye dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o// gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o// nub phyogasu ni drang srong
141a3(rgyud): thub pa'i mchog gcer bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// nub byang mtsham su ni gnod sbyin gyi
141a4(rgyud): rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug bud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag ma ni gnas ji lta ba dang / dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin
141a5(rgyud): du phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa phyi rol tu ri mo lngar bkod de/ phyag rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ zur bzhi nas rta babs bzhi dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis rgyan
141a6(rgyud): pa/ ji ltar gnas pa la 'di lta ste/ phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgor 'jug pa la ud pa la sngon po bri'o// g.yas dang g.yon phyogasu ni pad+ma rdo rje/ dgra sta ral gri/ mdung dang / mdung rtse gsum
141a7(rgyud): pa dang / ga dA dang / 'khor lo dang / swasti ka dang / bum pa dang / nya dang / dung dang / gdub kor dang / spyi'i blugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / zhags pa dang / dril bu dang / chu gri dang / 
141a8(rgyud): gzhu dang / tho ba dang / 'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mtshon cha'i mchog gis phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogasu kun nas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir/ 
141b1(rgyud): rgya mtsho chen po bzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogasu ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bya ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o// shar phyogasu dkyil 'khor gzhu'i
141b2(rgyud): dbyibs can byas te bzhag la kun nas 'bar ba'i pad+ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o// lho phyogasu ni dkyil 'khor zur gsum pa byas te/ kun nas 'bor ba'i lhung bzed kyis mtshan
141b3(rgyud): pa'o// nub phyogasu ni dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum po byas te/ ud pa la sngon po sdong bu dang / mdab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// phyogs mtshams bzhir
141b4(rgyud): yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ba yin te/ nub byang gi phyogasu ni dkyil 'khor zlum po bya ste/ zhags pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// lho nub kyi mtsham su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu
141b5(rgyud): 'dra ba bya ste/ dbyug pas kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// shar lho'i mtsham su ni dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa byas te/ dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bar bas
141b6(rgyud): mtshan pa'o// byang shar gyi mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba bzhag par bya'o// de ltar thams cad bris nas steng dang / 'og dang / thad kar phyag rgya gsum
141b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol sgo dang nye bar phye ma dang bri bar bya la/ 'di lta ste/ na bza' dang / rnga yab dang / lha mo 'od zer kun nas 'bar ba bri bar bya'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo can gyis/ 
141b8(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan bzhed nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga rnams// 'dir ni mdor bsdus bstan pa yin// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dang po nyid du slob ma gzung
142a1(rgyud): bar bya ba la dbang po ma tshang ba me ladang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmang rigs dang / byang chub tu sems
142a2(rgyud): bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dang pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / 
142a3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bza' ba dag dang / dul ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims
142a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom
142a5(rgyud): pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs mthon po dang / rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang / zhag gcig
142a6(rgyud): bsnyung ba byas pa dang / gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang / skra dri zhim pa dang / dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang / de'i nyin zhag la ga pur dang / gur gum dang / li shi'i dri zhom pos dri zhim par
142a7(rgyud): byas pa rtag tu nye reg dang ldan pa dang / ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang / srung ba'i cho ga byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / bden pa dang ldan pa dang / dus mtshams las rgyal ba dkyil
142a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyi rol de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang mi rang bar bzhag par bya'o// shin tu gtsang ba dang / shin tu gtsang sbra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te/ de las gzhan ma yin
142b1(rgyud): pa de dag kyang phan tshun gnyen du 'brel ba rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po chen po dag gi bu gzhon nu ma 'am/ gzhon nu grong gi chos mi shes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btso
142b2(rgyud): ldan 'das gzhon nu'i gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni byis pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa/ gzhon nu'i rol pa la dgyes pa des na/ dang po nyid du gzhon du nang du gzhug
142b3(rgyud): par bya'o// rgyal po chen po mngon par 'phel ba dang / tshe dang / nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang / skal pa chen po mngon par 'phel ba yin te/ khyad par du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags
142b4(rgyud): grub pas grub pa gnas pa yin te/ de dag sngar bzhag pa byas nas grogs po bag yod pa bzang po dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi ga pur gyi bdug pas
142b5(rgyud): bdugs te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa ma yin pas phyi rol tu byung bar bya ste/ byung nas dus dang ji ltar 'thun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang / sog chags med
142b6(rgyud): ba la rtsa ba'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas te/ gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyar byas pa'i chus khrus byas la nye reg byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos pa'i gtsang bas
142b7(rgyud): me thab kyi drung du song ste/ ku sha'i khres la 'dug byang shar gyi phyogs su mngon par bltas te/ mar gyi spyan bsreg ga pur dang / gur gum dang / tsan ngan bsres pas stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// sngar
142b8(rgyud): bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang ba dang / gsheg su gsol ba bya ste/ yang dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o// nges par yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ras gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing a
143a1(rgyud): mra'i lo ma dang / 'bras bu dang ldan pa/ gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / 'bras dang / 'bru nang du bcug pa gcig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la dbul lo// gnyis pa ni
143a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad la'o// gsum pa ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos la'o// bzhi pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po tha~Md la'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen
143a3(rgyud): po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang / brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo gang la bzhag bar bya ste/ gcig ni 'byung po thaMd la'o// gcig
143a4(rgyud): ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur par bsngos nas bzha ga par bya'o// de bas na sngar bshad pa'i cho gas spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 
143a5(rgyud): dri dang / mar mi dang / lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad du go rims bzhin du bya'o// mar me 'dzin pas mar gyi mar me bzung bar
143a6(rgyud): bya'o// 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni 'bras sa lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang / sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar
143a7(rgyud): sbyar ba'i mar la btsos pa'i snum khur gyis 'breng bu la sogs pa dang / khan da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// mar gyis gang ba
143a8(rgyud): dong / tsan dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang 'o mar bcos pa'i bza' ba dang rang sangs rgyas tha~Mng dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha thad la
143b1(rgyud): dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du garjod u lo pi ka ri ka dang / khyad par du snum khur gyi yo byad 'byung po thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i cho gas sbyin par bya'o// de
143b2(rgyud): bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa sna ma'i me tog dang / rgya spos dang / klu'i me tog dang / me tog pun na ga la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa
143b3(rgyud): nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs pa'i snga ma'i
143b4(rgyud): me tog dang / pad+ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad+ma dang / de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ud pa la dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi
143b5(rgyud): bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// tsan dan ni pad+ma'i rigs la'o// de bzhin du gu gul ni gsang ba pa'i bad ga po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o// lnga
143b6(rgyud): gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o// mar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams// thams cad la ni dbul bar bya// 'phags min lda ni thams cad la// dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya/ 
143b7(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni// 'dug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yiso// de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin dri/ sngags rnams kun la rtag tu bya// spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang // gang gsungs phyag na
143b8(rgyud): rdo rje la// rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis// sngags spyod don du sgrub pa'o// cho ga gcig pu blta bya ste/ rtag tu rjesu 'thun par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis sngar mthong ba'i tshogs
144a1(rgyud): spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang / bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas gtsor 'thun pa'i bya ba byas te/ de'i 'og tu sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gis mkhas pa dang myur bas 'byung po
144a2(rgyud): thams cad pa'i gtor ma sha med pa/ kun nas rnga pa ta ha dang / dung gi sgra dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs pa la sogs pa des bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog dang phreng bas rgyan po'i phyogs bzhi/ 
144a3(rgyud): mtshams brgyad / steng dang / 'og dang / thad ka thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu bskor ba bya zhing 'byung po thang pa'i gtor ma rgya cher gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te yang zho dang / 
144a4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis bsgos pa'i sa lu dang / 'bras thug bo che'i sbyin sreg rtsa ba'i sngags yi ge drug pa dang / snying pos stong rtsa brgyad bya'o// sbyin sreg byas nas dkyil
144a5(rgyud): 'khor la rje su bcug cing sngar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la srung ba byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas blangs pa/ byang chub tu
