144a6(rgyud): sems bskyed pa/ gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba/ dngos grub kyi phyir sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang / 
144a7(rgyud): yongasu longs spyod pa thun mong du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la/ 
144a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bston par bya'o// stan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thaMd las grol bar 'gyur te/ mchoms med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur// de nas
144b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa tha ga mas btags ma thag pa skra med pa la rtsu ba'i sngags kyis lan gsum bzlas te/ dri zhim po'i tsan ngan dang / gur gum gyis
144b2(rgyud): bsgos pa'i ras kyis gdong g.yog par bya'o// dang por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa 'am/ gtsug pud gcig gis nye bar mdzes pa
144b3(rgyud): 'am/ gtsug pud kyis nye bar mdzes pa skra dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am/ gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po
144b4(rgyud): 'dod pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// dkyil 'kho gnyis pa la phyin pa na gdong g.yog par bya ste/ ud pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'jam dpal
144b5(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan gcig brjod du gzhug ste/ me tog dri zhim po tsan dan dang / gur gum dang bsres pa shin tu gtsang ba byas pa lag pa gnyis su byin la
144b6(rgyud): me tog 'dor du gzhug go// gang du de'i me tog dbas pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya ste/ sngags 'di ni de'i yin par bstan te/ skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rje su 'brel pa yI
144b7(rgyud): te/ de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnon pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs pa'i don du mngon par sgrub
144b8(rgyud): par byed pa/ longs spyod chen po dang / rgyal po chen po dang / grags pa chen po dang / gang zag rtse gcig par mngon par sgrub pa yin no// tshe 'di nyid la yang chos thams cad la the tsom
145a1(rgyud): med par bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgyad kyi bar du bya ste/ gzhan la ni ma yin no// gzhan dag la ji ltar
145a2(rgyud): sdig pa spang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bskur na dang por re shig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ha cang yang mi nye/ ha cang yang
145a3(rgyud): mi ring bar byang shar gyi sa phyogasu rtsa ba'i sngags kyis dag par byas pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// rgyal po dbang bskur ba bzhin du bdag nyid sems pa dang / gcig tu sangs rgyas dang / 
145a4(rgyud): chos dang / dge 'dun la dad cing dang ba dang / spro ba chen po dang ldan pa dang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la
145a5(rgyud): phan par byed pa dang / dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / ma smad pa dang // tshe 'di nyid la sngags 'grub par 'dod pa dang bsam pa bza nga ba dang / sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang / blta
145a6(rgyud): bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang / sad par 'dod pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / der gtod pa'i yid dang / gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o// 
145a7(rgyud): lhag ma ni spang bar bya'o// shes rab can dang / spyod pa la rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya'i// gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad bskur ba bzhin du so/ 
145a8(rgyud): byang thaMd bsogs te/ slob dpon mkhan po mnyes na/ de nas bla re chen po bres te rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mthon po sgreng zhing / gdugs dkar po dbu la 'dzin pa dang / rnga yab dkar pos g.yob pa dang / 
145b1(rgyud): bkur sti chen pos dung dang / rnga bo che'i dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs shing rgyal ba'i sgra dang / bkra shis kyi tshig su bcad pa dang / bde legs dang / rab tu bsngags pa'i tshig su bcad pa rgyal bas gsungs pas
145b2(rgyud): mngon par bstod pa dang / dkyil 'khor de la bskor ba bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas 'di skad du slob dpon bdag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi
145b3(rgyud): spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las yang yang dag par 'das pa'i gsang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi
145b4(rgyud): rgyal srid thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'dod pa dang / mdor na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyiraro zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste/ shar
145b5(rgyud): gyi phyog su phyogs te dkyil 'khor la lta zhing / dang po re shig rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin te/ phyag rgya chen po gtsug pud lnga 'ching du gzhug par bya'o// de nas rang 'dod pa'i
145b6(rgyud): sngags gang dang gang la dga' ba gro ga'i mdab ma la gi wang gis bri bar bya'o// bris nas kyang tsan dan dang / gur gum gyi chus lag pa dang / kham por kha sbyar bkrus la/ de nas gro ga'i mdab ma de
145b7(rgyud): kham por kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhag par byas pa dkyil 'khor gyi nang du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung du bzhag par bya'o// de nas ku sha de la gnas nas rig pa'i rtsa ba'i
145b8(rgyud): sngags brgya rtsa brgyad snga ma nyid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i
146a1(rgyud): / bum pa gang bsgo dang nye bar sngar bzhag pa blangs te/ slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i sngags brjod pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// gzhan dag la ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i chuso// 
146a2(rgyud): de nas kham por kha sbyar de de la sbyin par bya ste/ mar me la klog tu gzhug par bya'o// gal te de nyid yin na ni rim gyis 'bad pas 'grub par 'gyuraro// yang na ji ste gzhan na ni sngags bzlas pa
146a3(rgyud): kho nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na yi ge'i yan lag nyams pa 'am/ lhag pa byin na ni dang po sgrub pa kho na la 'grub par the tsom med do// de ltar slob dpon gyis slar bris pa'i sgrub pa
146a4(rgyud): gsum gyis nges par 'grub par the tsom med do// de bzhin du dang pos ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor
146a5(rgyud): du lha thams cad la bstabs pa'i sngar gyi bum pa des dbang bskur bar bya'o// spyi bo la sngar gyi cho ga ji lta ba de nyid kyis byas na sdig pa'i rnyog pa tha~Md las grol bar 'gyur
146a6(rgyud): te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gnang zhing / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thad kyi dam tshig
146a7(rgyud): dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing slob dpon du dbang bskur ba sbyin// dkyil 'khor gsum pa la ni rang sangs rgyas tha~Md dang / 
146a8(rgyud): nyan thos thams cad la phul ba'i bum pa gang ba de nyid kyi cho gas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'jig
146b1(rgyud): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi sngags rgyud dag 'don pa dang / dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / ston pa dang / phyag rgya dang / spyod pa ston pa dang / rang nyid spyod cing ston par khyod la rjesu gnang zhing
146b2(rgyud): brjod par bya ba yang tshe 'di nyid yin la/ phyi nas skye ba brgyad pa dag la ni sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'gyur ba yino// de bzhin du rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur ba yang sngar bstan pa'i cho ga
146b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la sngar phul ba'i bum pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba'i bum pa gang bas kyang de bzhin du dbang bskuro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tha~Mng dang / 
146b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / nyan thos rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya zhing khyod la rjes su gnang ba yi no// 'byung po thams cad kyis rab tu thub par dka' zhing
146b5(rgyud): lus can tha~Md kyis mi pham pa dang / sngags thams cad las khyod rgyal ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa bsgrubs shig pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis re re la yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
146b6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba lnga sbyin par bya'o// sems can rnams la yang lnga po nyid kyis bya'o// de dag mthar gyis dkyil 'khor la bcug ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la bdag nyid phul
146b7(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas te slar btang bar bya'o// de las gzhan pa'i nyin zhag la mthar gyis sngags kyis spyod pa la bslab par bya zhing sbyar bar bya'o// skad cig de nyid la
146b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sngar phul ba'i bum pa gang ba blangs nas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag la chu khyor ba gsum shar du mngon
147a1(rgyud): par lta bar bya ba la glud par bya'o// 'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ kye byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig las 'das par gyur nas
147a2(rgyud): bsod nams ma yin pa mang po skye bar ma byed cig/ sngags thams cad kyang 'dor ldal byed cig/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang slu bar ma byed cig/ bla ma mnyes par gyis shig/ 
147a3(rgyud): gzhan du dam tshig las 'das par gyur na sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing bsod nams ma yin pa mang po 'gyur zhes de ltar smras la btang bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyis slob dpon gyi
147a4(rgyud): yang zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyis btags pa'i sa lu dang / 'bras thug po che'i sregs blugs kyis yi ge brgyad pa'i snying po dang sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas langs nas
147a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su zhugs te/ sngar bstan pa'i me tog gi sngar bstan pa'i cho gas lha tha~Md yid la bya ste mchod yon dbu lo// bdug pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
147a6(rgyud): dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 
147a7(rgyud): sha za dang / 'byung po dang / rnal 'byor pa dang / grub pa dang / drang srong rnams dang / se ni thaMd yang dag par bdugs nas me tog gtor te/ tsan dan dang / gur gum gyis bsangs la sngar bstan pa'i cho
147a8(rgyud): gas slar gsheg su gsol bar bya ste/ sems kyis thams cad btang ba yin no// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis bshos dang / gtor ma dang / sa tshon thams cad chu bor dor bar bya/ 
147b1(rgyud): ba 'am/ srog chags sdug bsngal ba rnams la sbyin par bya'o// sa phyogs de legs par byugs shing 'jam par byas te/ legs par phyag byas nas ba lang gi lci bas 'byug tu gzhug pa'o// 
147b2(rgyud): chus byug par bya ba 'am/ shin tu gtsang ba'i sas byug pa 'am/ bye mas gtor bar byas la/ de nas ji ltar 'dod par 'gro bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa des bdag nyid 'o ma dang / 
147b3(rgyud): 'bras zan gyis zas sam/ lha la dbul ba'i kha zas bza' bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i dbang po las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rnam pa
147b4(rgyud): 'phrul pa byang chub sems dpa'i le'u rab 'byam las dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang 'jam dpal gzhon
147b5(rgyud): nur gyur pas gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dus pa la gzigs nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la phyag
147b6(rgyud): 'tshal te/ yi ge gcig pa mchog tu gsang ba/ dug tha~Md 'joms par byed pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ sngags dang dkyil 'khor chung ngu sgrub pa'i thabs dang / las phran tshegs thang
147b7(rgyud): la nye bar sbyar bar bya ba smras// de yang gang zhe na/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM dza grogs po dag 'di ni 'byung po thong nyon cig/ sngags 'di nyid ni yi ge gcig gi dkyil 'khor
147b8(rgyud): gnyis pa'i cho ga thams cad du dgos pa/ khru brgyad dam/ khru bzhi sa'i phyogs yang dag par byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i phye mas rang nyid kyis bri bar bya ste/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin te/ 
148a1(rgyud): gang de dang de dag tu yang 'dir ni nges pa med do// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pos nye bar mdzes pa/ gtsug pud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang po re shig bri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jam
148a2(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ud pa la'i phyag rgya dang / mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / zhal gyi phyag rgya dang / dbyig pa'i phyag rgya ste/ phyag rgya 'di dag dkyil 'khor gyi nang du shar gyi char bri bar bya'o// de nas
148a3(rgyud): pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / ud pa la dang / phyag mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rta babs dang / shing rta dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / glang dang / ma he dang / swasti ka dang / rma bya dang / ra dang / lug dang / skyes
148a4(rgyud): bu gzhon nu'i gzugs can phyi rol gyi sgo'i rtsa bar bri bar bya ste/ mthar gyis rim pa la brten nas bris te/ dkyil 'khor ba sum la brten nas de ltar bri bar bya'o// de nas
148a5(rgyud): yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis shar lho'i phyogs kyi char me'i las bya ste/ shing a pa marga'i yam shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang // mar la btags pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin bsreg
148a6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas me tog gi mchod yon dbul lo// yi ge gcig pa'i sngags nyid kyis ji ltar 'dod par gtor ma dang / lha bshos dang / mar me dang / bdug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gsheg su gsol
148a7(rgyud): ba rnams bya'o// de nas rgyal srid 'dod pas ni grong khyer gyi dbus su bri bar bya'o// longs spyod 'dod pas ni shing a mra'i drung du'o// bu 'dod pas ni bo de tse'i shing gi drung du'o// chung ma dang / glang po
148a8(rgyud): tshe dang rta 'dod pas ni glang po che'i bres sgyu 'am/ rta'i bres sbyar ro// chu 'dod pas ni mtsho chen po 'am/ klu'i gnas su'o// nyin bzhi pa'i rims sam/ rtag pa'i rims sam/ rims thams cad la
148b1(rgyud): rtags gcig pa 'am/ grong gi g.yas phyogs su'o// srin pos zin pa la ni dur khrod dam/ khang pa stong par bya'o// yang srin pos zin pa la ni ba ru ra'i shing gi drung ngam/ e raN+Da'i shing gi drung du bya'o// 
148b2(rgyud): ma mo thams cad kyis zin pa la ni bzhi mdo 'am/ shi ba'i khyim dang / bu btsas pa'i khyim du nye bar bya'o// tshangs pa'i srin pos zin pa la ta la'i shing du'o// sbyar ba'i dug 'byin pa la ni ya
148b3(rgyud): ge gcig pa'i sngags kyis chu la lan gsum sngags pa bya ste/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du blud pa byas na grol bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du bud med dam/ skyes pa grogs pa 'dod pa la ni bzhi mdo
148b4(rgyud): 'am bram ze gnas par bri bar bya'o// bu shi ba la ni shing 'bras bu can nam/ 'o mo can gyi shing du'o// 'bras sa lu smin pa'i sa dang zhing gi dbus su ni bu med pa la bri bar bya'o// 
148b5(rgyud): nad rnam pa gsum bdag gir byas pa dang / gzhan gyis nyams pa la ni 'jug ngogs la sogs pa la'o// nad chen pos btab pa la ni dkyil 'khor chu bo'i ngogs dang
148b6(rgyud): 'gram du bya'o// nang thams cad kyis thams cad du btab pa la ni ri'i rtse mor bri bar bya'o// mkha' 'gro mas byas pa la yang bram ze'i ldum ra 'am/ khang pa stong pa 'am/ gnas dben pa
148b7(rgyud): gzhol ba'i phyogs su bya'o// de bzhin du las thams cad la nam phyed dam/ dus thams cad du mngon par bri bar bya'o// yi ge gcig pa de nyid kyi sngags kyis me tog gi mchod yon phul
148b8(rgyud): te gshegs su gsol lo dkyil 'khor la chus gtor ba byas na na tha~Mng srung ba chen pos byas par 'gyur te nang thams cad las grol bar yang 'gyur ro// bu med pas ni bu rnyed cing / 
149a1(rgyud): / skal med rnams kyang skal ldan 'gyur// dbul po rnams kyis nor thob pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis so// skyes pa 'am yang na bud med kyang // thos nas
149a2(rgyud): the tsom med byas na// ci 'dod rnam pa sna tshogs ni// thob 'gyur rtag tu phun sum tshogs// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi cho ga rab 'byam las 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
149a3(rgyud): pa'i rtsa ba las dkyil 'khor gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma la gzigs na/ 
149a4(rgyud): gzhan yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der 'dus pa la yang gzigs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la btud nas zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan pas
149a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir sngags kyi spyod pa'i cho ga sgrub pa'i rgyu 'thun pa/ 
149a6(rgyud): chos kyi chang ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga bsod nams bla na med pa bskyed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
149a7(rgyud): kyi sa bon mngon par sgrub par byed pa/ mdor na bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyis 'bras bu la rab tu sbyor zhing 'bras bu dang bcas
149a8(rgyud): par byed gdon med pa ma yin pa grub cing sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i
149b1(rgyud): go cha bgos pa/ bdud thams cad kyi stobs zil gyis mnan cing rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de legs par bshad du
149b2(rgyud): gsol/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de skad ces gsol ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam
149b3(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni
149b4(rgyud): leg so leg so// de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// khyod kyi ras kyi cho ga rab 'byam sngags thams cad sgrub par byed pa la
149b5(rgyud): rab tu 'jug pa mthar gyis ngas bshad par bya'o// sngon yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan te da ltar yang ngas bshad par bya'o// dang por re shig so'i phyogs gtsang ba
149b6(rgyud): rdul med pa las ras bal yang dag par blangs la/ dam tshig la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyis ras bal de yang dag par dag par byas te/ yang sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor gyis brgya rtsa
149b7(rgyud): brgyad du bsngags par bya'o// na maHsarba bud d+ha nAM bo d+hi satwa a pra ti ha ta ga ti ma ti pra tsA ri dz+dza na maH so sho d+han duHkha pra sha ma nen+ta rA dzA ya ta thA ga tA ya ar+ha te samyak+saM bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha
149b8(rgyud): ya saM sho d+ha ya/ sarba big+h+nAM an+ta ka ma hA kA ru Ni ka ku mA ra rU pa d+ha ri Ni/ bi kurba bi kurma/ sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas grong gi chos mi shes pa'i gzhon nu ma bram ze'i rigs dang / 
150a1(rgyud): rgyal rigs su skyes pa dang / rje'u'i rigs su skyes pa dang / rigs ngan pa'i skye gnas yongasu spangs pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa / pa dang mas
150a2(rgyud): rje su gnang ga gso sbyong byas pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzhin dkar ba/ kha dog gzhan rnam par spangs pa/ mdor na bud med kyi mtshan nyid rab tu zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyis
150a3(rgyud): mtshan pa/ shin tu nyan zhag shis pa dang / zla ba yar ngo dang / gza' bzang po bltas te/ du ba dang / khug sna med cing sprin dang bral ba rlung med cing gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su sngar bstan pa'i gzhon nu
150a4(rgyud): ma khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gos kyi legs par ba kab pa byas pa la sngags 'di phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pas srung bar byas te/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum
150a5(rgyud): srog chags med pa'i chu dang sbyar bas ras bal de dang / bum mo de sngar de nyid kyis yang dag par sbyangs te gtor la tsan dan dkar ba~M dang / gur gum gyis chus steng dang / 'og dang / 
150a6(rgyud): phyogs bzhir yang gtor bar bya'o// tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum dang / ga bur gcig tu byas pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya ste/ rang nyid kyis sbyin pa 'am/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog gi slob
150a7(rgyud): dpon gyis sbyin par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams ras kyis dog pa 'di la lhag par gnas par mdzod
150a8(rgyud): cig ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgongasasu gsol zhes byas nas 'dug pas 'dug pa de'i dus rma bya dang / 
150b1(rgyud): khrung khrung dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa rnam pa sna tshogs bya dge ba thang la gnas pa 'am/ chu la spyod pa rnams na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'am/ dge ba'i skad 'don na las 'di ni 'bras
150b2(rgyud): bu dang bcas pa yin no zhes sgrub pa pos shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bdag gi ras skud 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag
150b3(rgyud): gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'tsho ba yin te/ bdag gi sngags sgrub pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur// rnga paT ha dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / dung dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / khar rnga dang / rdza rnga chen
150b4(rgyud): po'i sgra thos pa 'am/ bud med dang / khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ skyes pa rnams bcos ma 'am/ bcos pa ma yin pa de'i dus su glo bur du 'di skad ces rgyal ba dang / grub pa dang / 
150b5(rgyud): sbyin pa dang / byin pa dang / khyer cig ces pa dang / dpal dang / 'bras bu dang / 'bras bu yod pa dang / cho ga dang / brgya byin dang / mang po dang / de dag la sogs pa'i sgra gzhan rab tu
150b6(rgyud): dge ba 'don pa 'am/ dril bu'i sgra dang / dga' ba'i sgra thos na/ des na rig pa 'dzin pas shes par bya ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin
150b7(rgyud): gyis brlabs pa ni 'di yin te/ don yod pa'i grub pa ni 'di yin zhing gzhan du ma yino zheso// ji ste de'i dus su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyer cig/ zo shig zung shig/ nyams pa/ rnam par
150b8(rgyud): nyams pa/ kyi hud/ ring ba/ shin tu ring ba/ med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra 'don pa 'am/ spre'u dang / ma he dang / lce spyang dang / bong bu dang / byi la dang / ba lang dang / dud 'gro smad pa rkang gnyis sam
151a1(rgyud): nang bzhi pa'i sgra 'don par gyur mdes ni sgrub pa pos bdag gi dngos grub ni med pa yin no zhes shes par bya ste/ skabs der brtul bar bya zhing yang snga ma bzhin du yang brtsam par bya'o/ 
151a2(rgyud): de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/ bdun pa'i las kyi bya ba la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nu ma de srung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la gzhag
151a3(rgyud): par bya ste/ shar ram byang phyogs su phyogs par bzhag la/ bdag nyid srung ba dang / lha la dbul ba'i kha zas zas su sbyin no// sngar sbyang ba byas pa'i ku sha'i khres de nyid kyi tsho gas ras bal la yang
151a4(rgyud): bya'o// dog pa de 'jam pa dang / legs par bsgrims pa dang / sngar bslabs pa'i bu mos yang dag par blangs te/ gcig dang / gsum dang / lnga dang / brgyad la sogs pa nas
151a5(rgyud): bcu drug gi bar ram/ kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang lnga na pas bya'o// de las rab ni bcu drug bya// de bzhin brgyad ni bar ma ste// phran tshegs las la sgrub pa ni/ 
151a6(rgyud): gcig dang lnga ni tha ma'o// las rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ji ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas brtsams te gang cung zad// sdig pa sngar ni byas pa dag/ dog par sems kyis dmigs pa ni// de yi mo
151a7(rgyud): la 'jig par 'gyur// dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs// gtsang ma'i snod du gzhug par bya// de nas bzhag pa byas nas de// ga pur gyi ni bdug pas bdug/ srog chags yan lag min byung ba 'am/ 
151a8(rgyud): gur gum tsan dan la sogs dang // me tog ma li tsam pa ka/ dri zhim la sogs yongs su bsgo/ srung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// gtsang ba'i phyogs su yang dag bzhag sngags rig las kun shes pa sde/ 
151b1(rgyud): shin tu mnyam gzhag bzlas pa bya// de nas tha ga par song nas// ci 'dod pa yi rin sbyin no// rang dbang yan lag ma nyams dang / dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dang // rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa min// lung
151b2(rgyud): pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs// ma ning smad pa ma yin dang // 'phye bo ma yin swa dkar spangs// kun gyis bkur ba'i mtshan nyid ldan// rab sngags blta na sdug pa dang / blo dang yang dag spyod pa da
151b3(rgyud): 'jig rten pa yi tshul la rten/ dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni// ras bzang bteg pa'i ched du bskul/ grogs po rigs bzang rab bsngags shing // blo ldan bzo ni mkhas pa dang // shin tu khyang par
151b4(rgyud): mchog gyur pa'i// ras 'thag bzang la bskul bar bya// rab ni rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'bring ni 'bring la bsgrub par bya// tha ma phran tshegs las la ni// dman pa nyid ni thang la
151b5(rgyud): bzo bo ji ltar smra ba bzhin/ rin ni de ltar sbyin par bya/ dang po'o cha ga ni ying dag byung // bzo bo la ni sngags rig pas// de nas myur du rin byin pa/ dpa' bo'i tshong zhes de la
151b6(rgyud): brjod/ don du gnyer med de la ni// rin du smra byed sgrub pa po// 'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i// ras ni bzang po bla na med// las kun byed cing mchod pa ste// lha dang mi yi bde ba sbyin// 'byung po kun
151b7(rgyud): gyi dpal 'gyur zhes// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas tha ga pa la rgyu skar bzang po 'am/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam/ nyin zhag dge ba 'am/ bza' dge ba bltas
151b8(rgyud): te gso sbyong sbyini// yang na dus kyi mchog dpyid kyi dus kyi zla ba yar gyi ngo la shing a mra'i me tog skyes shing // shing gi mchog rnams kyi yal ga dang / me tog rgyas pa de'i dus mtsham su snga dro nyam
152a1(rgyud): 'char ba la sngar bstan pa'i tha ga pa lha la dbul bar 'os pa'i kha zas bsten cing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ mgo la cod pan bcings nas khrus legs par byas te/ 
152a2(rgyud): tsan dan dkar po dang / gur gum gang yang rung bas lus byug nas ga pur gyi dris kha la bsgos te/ yid dga' ba dang / bkres pa dang / skom pa med par bya ste/ thags kyi lag cha tha ga pa la
152a3(rgyud): sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad sar pa las dang ba lang gi lci bas bkrus te/ yang ba'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar ba'o// tsan dan dkar po
152a4(rgyud): dang gur gum gyi chus kyang gtor bar bya'o// gtsang ba'i sa phyogasu ca co med cing skye bo dang bral ba dben pa'i gnas su bkab pa dang / gsang bar me tog gis mchod do// de na
152a5(rgyud): sgrub pos yang dag par byed pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i nyungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi stong 'og/ phyogs mtshams su gtong bar bya'o// de nas
152a6(rgyud): tha ga pa la nyungs kar gyi gtor bar bya zhing phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga bcings te/ gtsug phung bcing ba byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// gal te ras ris rab yin na ni zur bzhir
152a7(rgyud): zheng du khru bon/ chur khru brgyad de tha ga pas de tsam la yongs su goms par bya'o// 'bring ni zheng du khru do// chung khru lnga pa'o// tha ma ni zheng du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang / chung ni khru brgyad kyi
152a8(rgyud): phyed do// de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mtho gang la ni yul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di la bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/ chang ni 'dis tshad
152b1(rgyud): du bstan pa yin no// ras ni rab kyis dngos grub mchog 'jig rten gang zag mchog gis gsungs// thub pa mya ngan 'das 'og tu// rgyal srid 'dod la bar ma yin// longs spyod chen 'dod skyes bu da
152b2(rgyud): lha mi lha min gdengs can ni// tha ma la ni grub par bshad// 'bring gis 'bring ni grub pa'o// las rnams phran tshegs dag la ni// ras ni thams cad rtag tu 'grub// rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las
152b3(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// ras gsum gyis kyang bstan pa ni// skal 'dod mi la 'grub pa yin// brgya byin bde sogs bdag po la'ang // cho ga nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur// cho ga yang
152b4(rgyud): dag ldan na ni// mi yi skye ba tha ma la 'am// las rnams thams cad 'bad med par// myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed// rgyal ba rgyal mchog sras ngag gis// lam 'di dag ni
152b5(rgyud): yang dag bstan// phongs pa mgon med sdug bsngal ba'i// sen kun la legs sbyin pa'o// byang chub lam ni ma lus kyang // de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa ste// byang chub
152b6(rgyud): rgyu yi chos 'di ni// sngags kyi lam gyis bstan pa yin// 'jig rten dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te// dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis// 'bad
152b7(rgyud): pa med par sngags rnams 'grub// gang zhig byang chub rgyu 'dod pas// de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// 'gro la phan sems rtag med pa// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bdag nyid chen po
152b8(rgyud): 'jam dpal ni// gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du// byang chub 'jug pa'i khyad sems la// ras ris 'grub par gsungs pa yin// bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// thams cad 'dir ni thob pa
153a1(rgyud): yin/ de nas mthar gyis bzo bos ni// ras ni 'bad pas btag par bya/ nyin zhag lnga dang brgyad dang mi/ bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang mi/ nyin zhag gcig gis myur du mi/ myur ba
153a2(rgyud): ras kyi tha ga bya// grub pa mchog ni 'dod pa yis// nyin zhag gcig pa dge ba yin// gtsang sbra'i spyod pa phun sum tshogs// bzo bo rtag tu byini rlabs ldan// gnas nas thag ring song nas ni// bshab
153a3(rgyud): dang gci ba yongs su dor// de nas gos bcas khrus byas te// gos gzhan dag kyang bgo bya zhing // gos dkar phreng ba ldan par 'chang // yang dang yang du nye reg bya// lus ni tsan dan dkar pos byugs// 
153a4(rgyud): bzo bos lag pa gnyis kyang byug/ legs 'jam rtag tu dri med pa// 'bad pas kyang ni tha ga bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am// gzhan ni rgyal bas gsungs pa dang // 
153a5(rgyud): rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad pa yis// ras ni ma lus tha ga bya/ ras kyi tha ga zin pa dang // sngar gsungs las kyis logs byas pa// ched ldan nyams pa med pa ni/ nyin
153a6(rgyud): zhag bzang la bltab te bzhag/ yar ngo'i shin tu bzang po la// de la sngags ni gzhug par bya// ras ni yongs su gsal byas pa// kha tshar mthar ni mdud mdzes bya// 'od ma'i shing la
153a7(rgyud): btags nas ni// de nas ras ni blangs te 'gro// bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni// nor mang pos ni bgo bshar bya// brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod song nas/ 
153a8(rgyud): me tog dri zhim gyis mchod de// gtsang ba'i phyog su bzhag par bya// 'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su// srung po'i cho ga rab tu bya// sngon ni ras bal gang de yis// lan mang du ni yongs sbyangs pa// 
153b1(rgyud): bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la// de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba bya// dpa' bo chen po 'jam dpal gyis// sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang // ngas kyang da ltar
153b2(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi// sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod// brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjid che// sngags kyi don kun sgrub byed pa// cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs byed
153b3(rgyud): skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu// 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams// rmongs po spyod cing sems pa med// ma dang phyin ci log par byed// longs spyod shin tu brkam chags kyis// rdzas
153b4(rgyud): rnams ma lus pa dag dang // sngags rnams kyis kyang 'grub mi byed// 'khor ba'i mun pa'i brtson rar ni// de nyid kyis ni 'khor bar 'gyur// gang yang rtag tu yid dag
153b5(rgyud): cing / dang ldan bkra shis dag la dga'// sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang // rtag tu 'dzin dang 'chang ba dang // bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// spro ba che zhing gzi
153b6(rgyud): brjid che// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni// 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste// sa bon tshwa rgor btab pa la// myu
153b7(rgyud): gu skye ba med pa bzhin// dang pa'i rtsa ba rtag tu chos// chos don gzigs pas gsungs pa ste/ chos don spyod pa de dag la/ sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs// de nas sgrub pa pos pa
153b8(rgyud): bo legs par bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan nam// bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog gsal ba dang ldan pa'i tshon rtsi rnams blangs te// sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i chog
154a1(rgyud): ji lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyang bar bya ste/ sngar ji nyas sa pa la byas pa de nyid kyis ras la ri mo 'drir gzhug go// yang na bdag nyid
154a2(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// ga bur dang / tsan ngan dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dris tshon rtsil bsgo bar bya zhing bdug spos bsregs te/ de nyid kyi sngags kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la yang
154a3(rgyud): bzla ste/ me tog na ga ge sar dang / pun nA ga na ba ku la dang / pan tsa ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+ha nu shwa ri dang / mA la ti'i me tog la sogs pas ras de gcal bkram pa byas la/ shar
154a4(rgyud): du mngon par phyogs ku sha'i khrekhris la 'dug ste/ blo legs par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmi/ pa'i sems phra mo lag par blangs nas 'khrug
154a5(rgyud): ba med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o// dang por re shig bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
154a6(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ kun nas 'od 'bar ba sku 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa/ 
154a7(rgyud): chos 'chang bzhin pa/ sku dang zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i sdong bu can/ 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyis gdan chen po'i pad+ma'i sdong
154a8(rgyud): bu la 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ga lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/ mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mi dang 'dra ba phyed sbal gyi gzugs can/ dga' bo
154b1(rgyud): dang / nye dga' bri bar bya'o// kun nas pad+ma'i mtsho pad+ma'i mdab ma dang / me tog cung zad kha bye ba dang / rnam par kha bye ba dang / chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang / bya dang / nya la sogs pas
154b2(rgyud): khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par skyes pa bri bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las pad+ma'i me tog du ma mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o// g.yon
154b3(rgyud): gyi phyogs su pad+ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/ pad+ma de dag la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dang po la re shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal cung zad
154b4(rgyud): kha dog pad+ma'i ge sar bzhin du ser skya 'am/ gur gum mam/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba gzhon nu'i cha byad / byis pa dang / khye'u'i gzugs can/ skra zur bung lnga dang ldan pa/ gzhon nu'i
154b5(rgyud): rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ud pa la sngon po bsdams pa/ lag pa g.yas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ sku mdzes pa zhi ba'i cha
154b6(rgyud): byad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba/ bzhin cung zad dgod pa 'od 'bar ba dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab pa bri'o// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od
154b7(rgyud): shin tu gzhon sha can de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni nor bzang so// bzhi pa la ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o// lnga pa ni na mkha' mdzod do// drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la ni
154b8(rgyud): sdig med do// brgyad pa la ni spyan bzang yin te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u'i cha byad can gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas phyogs su ni
155a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar bri bar bya ste/ tshangs pa
155a2(rgyud): spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgo ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ ka sha dmar po gyon pa/ dar la dmar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa/ thal ba'i thig le gsum gyis mtshan pa
155a3(rgyud): gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ dbyig pa dang spri'u blugs 'dzin pa/ kr-iSh+Na sa ra'i lpags pa thal gos g.yon par bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas phreng ba 'dzin cing de bzhin
155a4(rgyud): gshegs pa la phyag byed pa/ der gtod pa'i lte ba sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun tu bzang po
155a5(rgyud): mdog me tog pri yang gu ltar sngo bsangs/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa ni bal ba thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ 
155a6(rgyud): gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan
155a7(rgyud): 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba stobs bcu dang ldan pa ral pa'i mthar skyil mo krung gis bzhugs shing
155a8(rgyud): cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa g.yon na pad+ma bsnams pa/ lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa/ sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar
155b1(rgyud): byas pa'o// bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas na bil ba thogs pas mchog sbyin pa/ mdog gser 'dra ba/ rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs
155b2(rgyud): mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba gos
155b3(rgyud): g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa/ dar la dkar po'i stod g.yogs byas po// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po'i na bza' stod g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o// 
155b4(rgyud): cha byad ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin bya'o// de bzhin pad+ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po// drug pa la ni blo gros zhi ba/ bdun pa la ni rnam par snang mdzad snying po// brgyad pa la ni
155b5(rgyud): ngan song spong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri bar bya ste/ bil ba'i 'bras bu dang / glegs bam lag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis shin tu mdzes pa/ 
155b6(rgyud): dar las stod g.yogs byas pa/ rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o// de dag gis steng du yang rang sangs rgyas brgyad bri bar bya ste/ dge
155b7(rgyud): slong gi cha byad 'dzin pa/ lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ chos gos dmar po gyon pa/ skyil mo klung gis nye bar gnas pa/ rin po che'i ud pa la la 'dug pa/ cha byang zhi ba'i
155b8(rgyud): bdag nyid kun nas 'od 'phro ba'i phreng bas khyab par me tog dri zhim pos gcal bkram pa la 'di lta ste/ me tog ma li dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+hA nuSh+ka ri ka dang / pun na ga dang / na ga ge
156a1(rgyud): sa la sobs pa'i me tog gis ras ris kun nas brtul bkram par bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gson phyogs 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng du rin po
156a2(rgyud): che du mas nye bar spras pa shin tu yangs pa'i gzhal med khang gi dkyil 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shin tu nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ud pa las shin tu bkab pa/ ri'i
156a3(rgyud): rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o// gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ rin chen gtsug tor can rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'od rnam par 'phro ba/ kun nas 'od
156a4(rgyud): 'dom gang garin po che pad+ma rA ga dang / in dra nI la dang / man/ da la sogs pa dang / bai DUr+ya dang / as+tha gar b+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas
156a5(rgyud): 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / bla gos dang ldan pa/ skyil krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa/ 
156a6(rgyud): na bza' ser po banabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis sku la khyab pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku nye bar mdzes gzhi ba'i gzigs pa dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi
156a7(rgyud): mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o// gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po kha dog gser 'dra ba bri
156a8(rgyud): par bya'o// gsum pa pad+ma'i gtsug tor pad+ma'i ge sar dang 'dra ba'i chos 'chad pa bri bar bya'o// bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o// lnga pa bsnyen par dka' ba dang / drug pa rgyal ba
156b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thang zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal po bri bar bya'o// 'di dag tha~Md kyang gser
156b2(rgyud): gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi steng gi phyogasu g.yas g.yon nas sprin gyis gseb nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus
156b3(rgyud): mi snang bar me tog gi char 'bebs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la
156b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la 'di lta ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i
156b5(rgyud): bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / rab 'byor dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang / dga' bo dang / bzang ldan dang / ka pi na'o// rang sangs rgyas dag kyang
156b6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ spos kyi ngad ldang dang / dman pa dang / nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po dang / dkar po'i tog dang / mu khyud dang / mu khyud bzang po'o// 'di dag thaMd kyang shin tu mdzes
156b7(rgyud): pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid can/ shin tu dul ba'i cha byad can no// nyan thos chen po bdag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa lta ba'o// steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i
156b8(rgyud): bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas gos kyi bla re chu zheng yangs pa/ shin tu mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa
157a1(rgyud): nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang / phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang / tha gu dmar po pad+ma rA
157a2(rgyud): ga dang / in dra ni la la sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa rin po che'i tha gu'i tshogs bya'o// de la yang gos kyi bla ri shin tu legs par kun nas bkod pa dang / mu tig gi phreng ba 'phyang bas/ 
157a3(rgyud): mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni pad+ma'i mtsho las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhabs drung dang nye ba na klu'i rgyal po nye dga'i phyogasu rin po
157a4(rgyud): che chen po'i ri bo pad+mo'i mtsho las mngon par 'thon pa/ rin po che'i myu gu dang / phug dang / ri sul dang / b+hu ru'i yal ga dang / rin po che'i shing gis yongasu bskor ba/ 
157a5(rgyud): drang srong chen po'i gnas dang / grub pa dag gis de la bsten pa/ ri'i rtse mo'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed shin tu mi bzad pa'i gzugs can lag pa g.yas pa na
157a6(rgyud): zhags pa thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na gzhu thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer dang ldan pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyogs te lta ba/ gsus pa 'phyang ba sta gyen du
157a7(rgyud): brjes pa mig sman nag po dang / sprin nag po dang 'dra ba kha spu ser gsen mo ring ga/ mig dmar ba/ mgul ba'i phyogs sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi lpags pa banabs pa/ bgegs/ 
157a8(rgyud): tha~Md rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ rab tu mi bzad pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po chen po kun nas 'bar ba khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed bri bar bya'o// ri de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na/ 
157b1(rgyud): 'dug pa/ lus sa la btud de smos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/ cha byang dang dbyibs ji lta ba bzhin rtags 'dzin pa/ ji ltar rjesu 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes
157b2(rgyud): lta ba'i sgrub pa po bri bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas ngos su pad+ma'i mtsho las mngon par byung ba'i rin po che'i ri'i rgyal
157b3(rgyud): po ji ltar sngar ri'i rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed med pa/ lha'i me tog gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o// ri de yang 'phags pa spyan ras
157b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o// de yang shin tu mtho ba rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin rtse mo myu gu 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// de la rten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan
157b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgro la ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la dmar pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs
157b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i gos can/ bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ud pa la thogs pa/ gser gyi kha dog can rked pa phra ga ha cang yang mi skem/ 
157b7(rgyud): ha cang yang mi sgom/ ha cang yang mi rgan/ sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongasu bskor ba/ der yang bai DUr+ya rin po che'i rtse mo
157b8(rgyud): la shing pun nA ga'i yal gas kun nas bskor ba/ yal ga dag la yang me tog 'phel zhing kha phye bas legs par rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma mngon par bkab pa/ yal ga
158a1(rgyud): mngon par 'dud pa de nyid kyang shin tu kha dog sna tshogs pa/ byi ru'i myu gu 'brel ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshon 'bar ba na lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar
158a2(rgyud): bya'o// lha mo bgegs rnams me lus 'joms/ 'jigs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog sgrub pa po ni srung don du/ des na dam pa sbyin zhing dge stobs bcu ldan sras thugs rje ni/ bud med
158a3(rgyud): gzugs 'chang lha mo yin// 'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang // mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni// gzhon nu lha mo 'di la dgyes// bgegs rnams thaMd bsal ba'i
158a4(rgyud): phyir// sgrub pa pos kyang yang dag bskur// mi yi bdag po srung don dang // dpal sgrub phyir yang ri mor bri// khro bo'i rgyal po gang yin de// ri yi rtse mor gzhag bris pa// bgegs rnams thams
158a5(rgyud): cad gzhag pa'i phyir// rgyal ba mchog dang sras kyis gsungs// mi bzad chen po 'khyil pa che// gtus chen 'od chen ldan pa po// ma rungs sems can tshar bcad phyir/ 
158a6(rgyud): sgrub pa la ni rab tu brtags// sgrub pa po ni srung ba dang // bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed// mi bzang khro za 'i ngang tshul can// sngags kyi lha dag 'gugs par byed// shin tu mi
158a7(rgyud): bzad drag po'i gzugs// brtse ba med pa thams cad 'dul// sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams// dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du byed// mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang // sa 'og spyod pa thams cad kyi// thub
158a8(rgyud): ba'i bstan la 'gal byed gang // ma rungs thams cad 'dul bar byed/ ras ni kun nas gru bzhi dang / zur bzhi dag tu bri ba yin// ras kyi 'og tu tha mar ni/ chu bo rgya che'i gnas bya ste/ klu yi gangs
158b1(rgyud): ka yan lag can// gcig ni kun tu bya ba yin// yan lag bzang po dkar po dang // lus phyed mi yi rnam par skyes// byang du mgo ni gzhag bya ste/ rtag tu thal mo sbyor byed pa/ stobs chen gdengs ka bdun dang ldan
158b2(rgyud): mtha' yas zhes ni bya ba yin// de bzhin gshegs la nges par lta/ nor bu rin chen gyis mdzes pa// legs par mdzes dang gzugs mdzes dang / rin chen rgyan gyis yongs brgyan pa'i// 'bar ba'i
158b3(rgyud): phreng can bri ba ni// klu rgyal chen por rnam par grags// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhig phyir// chu bo la rten bri bar bya// 
158b4(rgyud): ras kyi cho ga dam pa 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsungs pa// rgyas bstan ngas ni mdor bsdus yin// mkhas pa gang zhig 'dri
158b5(rgyud): byed pa// de yi bsod nams mtha' yas 'gyur/ bskal pa bye bar byas pa yi// sdig pa shin tu mi bzad pa// sa steng ri mo mthong ba tsam// de yi mod la 'byang bar byed// mtshams med lnga
158b6(rgyud): po byed pa dang // tshul khrims nyams dang smad pa dang // sdig pa kun la 'jug pa dang / 'khor ba'i mun par spyod pa dang // 'gro ba'i skye gnas ngan pa dag / der ni ras ris bzhag mi bya// ras ris mthong
158b7(rgyud): ba'ang don ldan zhes// thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs pa yin// mthong ba tsam gyis ngag 'gyur te// de bas skad cig de tsam gyis// lci dag lus ni ngag 'jug dang // rjes su bzlas pa byed pa dang / 
158b8(rgyud): sngags brten nyid la rtag brtson pa'i// mi rnams grub 'dod smos ci dgos// bskal pa bye bar sangs rgyas la// mchod pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa// sa steng ras ris 'dri ba yi// sngags pas
159a1(rgyud): bsod nams de 'thob 'gyur// gang ga yi ni bye ma dag / tshad du bstan pa gang yin pa/ de dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang / rang rgyal dang ni byang chub sems// bse ru nyan thos
159a2(rgyud): 'jig rten na// lan mang dag tu mchod ston byas// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ mi yis de bzhin bsod nams 'thob// cho ga klog pa tsam dang ni// mchod dang rjes su yi rang ba// cho ga thad
159a3(rgyud): rab brtags pa// de lta sngags kyis dngos grub nges// 'jig rten sngags rnams ji snyed pa// gang dag rgyal ba skyes mchog dang // de'i slob bse ru byang chub sems// bdag nyid chen pos gang
159a4(rgyud): gsungs pa/ ri mo 'di ni mdun bzhag ma/ sngags rnams ma lus 'grub par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde las 'jam
159a5(rgyud): dpal gyi cho ga las le'u dang po'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas 'jam
159a6(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang khyod kyis 'bring gi ras kyi cho ga de ngas bshad par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig/ dang por re shig sngar bstan pa'i dog pa
159a7(rgyud): dang / sngar bstan pa'i cho ga dang / sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / sngar gyi tshad bar ma dang ldan pa/ ras shin tu bzang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / shin tu bkrus pa kha tshar dang bcas pa dang / tshon ma
159a8(rgyud): 'dres pa dang / sgra la sogs pa med par byas la tshad ma gtogs pa dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du byas pa'i ras de la phyi nas bri bar bya ste/ dang por re shig gnas gtsang ma kun nas
159b1(rgyud): mdzes pa/ rin po che shel gyi rang bzhin lta bu mu tig dkar pos brgyan pa de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bri bar bya ste rin po che'i seng ge'i khri la rnam pa thams cad kyi
159b2(rgyud): mchog dang ldan pa chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa'o// g.yas phyogs na 'phags pa 'jam dpal pad+ma'i ge sar ram/ gur gum mam/ nyi ma'i mdog 'dra ba/ g.yon pa'i dpung gi phyogs
159b3(rgyud): su ud pa la bsnams shing thal mo sbyar bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba bzhin cung zad dgod pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ zur phung lngas mgo mdzes par byas pa/ 
159b4(rgyud): byis pa gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dang mgo 'dud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon log su 'phags pa spyan
159b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar ba snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das la rnga yab g.yob par bya'o// 
159b6(rgyud): de'i phyog su 'phags pa byams pa dang / kun tu bzang po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / blo gros chen po dang / zhi bar gshegs pa dang / na mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
159b7(rgyud): sel ba ste/ 'di dag kyang snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// dang po ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// 'di dag gi du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brgyad bri bar
159b8(rgyud): bya ste/ bzhengs pa dang / lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa dang / sku la na bza' ser pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pas chos gos kyi dkyil nas 'dzin pa/ chos
160a1(rgyud): gos kyi kha dog cung zad dmar ba banabs pa/ kun nas 'od dang ldan pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par
160a2(rgyud): skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thung dang / 'od srung dang / spyan bzang te/ sangs rgyas
160a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogasu 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mdun du 'khor chen po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ nyan thos chen po brgyad dang / 
160a4(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas brgyad snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bri ste/ 'on kyang 'phags pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la rnga yab kyis g.yob pa
160a5(rgyud): 'greng bag tu bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu bri bar bya'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / 
160a6(rgyud): dag pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / 'jam pa dang / mi 'du nga ba dang / 'od gsal dang / tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po dang / 'og min dang / de la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs na spyod pa
160a7(rgyud): dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag mthar gyis bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang nye bar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor legs par dgod par bya ste/ rang rang gi gzugs dang cha byad du
160a8(rgyud): bri bar bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu ni rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par byung ba'i kun nas rin po che'i ri bo ras ris kyi mtha' mar bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi phyogs bcid
160b1(rgyud): gi mtha' la sgrub pa po cha byad dang / dbyibs ji lta ba'i rnam pa dbus mo'i lha nga dang mgo btud pa/ spos snod lag na thogs pa bri bar bya'o// rin po che'i ri bo de'i steng 'phags pa 'jam
160b2(rgyud): dpal gyi 'og tu khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed ji ltar bstan pa de ltar bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs seng ge'i khri'i 'og 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
160b3(rgyud): phyug gi zhabs drung dang nye ba der rin po che'i ri bo'i steng du lha mo sgrol ma sngar ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// ras ris de'i khor yug tu me tog gtor bar bri bar
160b4(rgyud): bya la/ gcal bkram par bya ba la/ me tog tsam ba ka dang / nI lod pa la dang / pad+ma dang / dri mchog dang / ma la ti dang / bar shi ka dang / d+ha nut+tA ri ka dang / pun nA ga dang / 
160b5(rgyud): nA ga ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ras ris de la khor yug tu gtor bar bya'o// ras ris kyi steng gi mtha'i zur gnyis su me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba/ gzugs rnam par
160b6(rgyud): bkra ba bar snang la gnas pa/ char 'byin pa'i sprin gyi nang nas mgo tsam 'thon pa/ lding bzhin pa/ kha dog dkar po bri bar bya'o// ras ris 'bring du gsungs pa 'di// dpal don gnyer las
160b7(rgyud): yang dag byung // sa yi steng gi mi rnams la// grub pa 'bring ni 'di la rten// 'khor bar sngan chad 'khor ba na// sdig pa cung zad gang byas pa// 'dir ni ra mthong tsam gyis// de yi mod la
160b8(rgyud): rnam par 'jig/ 'gro ba lngar ni 'khor ba na// sems can rmongs pas mi shes te// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi ras ris ni// 'bring po mthong bar mi byed pa'o// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang / 
161a1(rgyud): sdig pa'i rnyog pa byed gyur pa// sngags rnams sna tshogs gsungs gyur pas// tshul khrims nyams pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur// myur du rtogs pa'ang 'grub pa ni/ 
161a2(rgyud): bzlas pas thob par byed pa yin// ras ris 'bring po mthong bas ni// nad pa dag kyang nad las thar// dbul po dag kyang nor thob byed/ bud med rnams kyang bu 'thob 'gyur// de tshe mthong ba
161a3(rgyud): tsam gyis ni// bsod nams rgya chen thob par 'gyur// nges par lha dang mi rnams kyi// bde ba mi yis sten par 'gyur// skye ba gzhan du nges par ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni nges 'thob 'gyur// 
161a4(rgyud): klog dang 'dri ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin mchod dang phyag 'tshal dang // mthong dang reg pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa'i rnyog pa kun las grol// ras ris 'di ni mthu che la// don du
161a5(rgyud): gnyer dang bskul bas ni// myur du skye ba don yod 'thob// rjes su yi rang de bzhin no// ras ris mthong ba'i skye bo yi// bsod nams thob pa don yod pa// bskal pa
161a6(rgyud): bye ba rnamasu yang // brjod par yang ni mi nuso// // byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i
161a7(rgyud): cho ga lnga pa ras ris rab 'byam las ras ris gnyis pa'i cho ga rab 'byam rdzog so// / de nas gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhonur
161a8(rgyud): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gzhan yang khyod kyis ras ris gsum pa'i cho ga rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ gang sems can rnams la 'bad pa
161b1(rgyud): med par 'grub par 'gyur ba sngar bstan pa'i bzo bo dang / cho ga dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam thad kar de bzhin du kun nas zur bzhi snga ma bzhin du ras la ri mo bya'o// sngar
161b2(rgyud): bstan pa'i tshon gyis dang por re shig 'phags pa 'jam dpal seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ snga ma bzhin du byis pa khye'u'i gzugs mdzes pa'i gzugs can/ 'od zer 'phro ba dang
161b3(rgyud): ldan pa chos 'chang pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rin po che'i ri la gnas pa/ rnga yab lag na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na nor bu rin po che
161b4(rgyud): thogs pa/ me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bas ngas snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yas phyogasu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
161b5(rgyud): dbang phyug snga ma bzhin rin po che'i ri la gan sa la/ rnga yab lag na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma 'dzin pa/ lus kun nas 'od dang ldan pa bro bar bya'o// seng+ge'i
161b6(rgyud): khri'i 'og tu rin po che'i ri ras kyi mtha'i bar du bri bar bya'o// ras kyi mtha' ma dang nye ba'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng+ge'i khri'i 'og g.yas phyog su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin
161b7(rgyud): rje gshed snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya ste/ spos snod lag na thogs pa/ thaMd kyang snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal
161b8(rgyud): gyi steng du de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po bri bar bya ste/ rin po che'i ri'i phug sor bcu drug gi tshad tsam gyi nang na bzhugs pa/ ri'i stod kyi cha khang
162a1(rgyud): pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi khor yug tu ri'i rnam pas yongs su 'khor ba bri bar bya'o// steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas pa'i ri'i stod kyi cha la
162a2(rgyud): lding ba bzhin du me tog gi tshogs 'thor ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing ras la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
162a3(rgyud): kyi gcal bkram pa yang bri bar bya'o// rnam gsum ras ris mtshan nyid ni// thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa las// 'di ni tha ma zhes bya ste// phran tshegs las rnams ngag la shis// bskal pa bye bar mi
162a4(rgyud): bzang las// ras ris mthong ba tsam gyi grol// ras ris mtho nga ba tsam gyis ni// skad cig de la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bya ba stong phrag ni// mthong ba tsam gyis grol 'gyur te/ 
162a5(rgyud): ras ris mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // de yi mod la grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag la// blo dang ldan pas bsnyen bkur bas// ras ris tha ma mthong ba ni// bcu drug
162a6(rgyud): char yang mi phod do// sangs rgyas skyob pa kun la ni// mchod byas bsod nams gang yin pa// mkhas pas bsod nams gang thob de// ras ris tha ma mthong ba'i yin// dge ba dag gi las rnams
162a7(rgyud): la// longs spyod phyir yang 'dir spyad do// sngags rnams gang dag ci yod pa/ tshangs dbang drang srong gis bshad dang // na mkha' lding gis gang bshad dang // chu lha nyi ma lus ngan dang // nor sbyin so// 
162a8(rgyud): dang srin po dang // lha min dbang po lci 'phye dang / zla ba rlung dang gshin rje sogs/ khyab 'jug lha chen sogs bshad pa/ sngags rnams 'dir ni bkug pa dag ras ris mdun du dngos grungab 'gyur/ 
162b1(rgyud): 'dir mi zhi ba bya ba ste/ de bzhin du ni rgyas pa bya/ 'dir ni mngon spyod spang bya ste/ thub pa mchog gis smad pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa las
162b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo le'u drug pa'i cho ga rab 'byam las ras ris chung ngu gsum pa'i cho ga rdzogaso// / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom
162b3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
162b4(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni leg so leg so// rig pa thad kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde
162b5(rgyud): ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
162b6(rgyud): grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyud nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed pa/ bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo tha~Mng la
162b7(rgyud): rgyas par byed par 'gyuraro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi bla ma 'das pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i rigs nub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
162b8(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis mun par gyur pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par 'jig pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam dang / rig pa/ 
163a1(rgyud): thams cad dang / sngags dang / sman dang / nor bu rin po che med pa dang / skye bo dam pa rnams kyis 'jig rten na yongasu ma zin pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar
163a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ le lo can dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang / mi srun pa dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang u ba spyod pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs
163a3(rgyud): 'di thos nas skrag par 'gyur to// le lo la mngon par 'dod cing dad par mi 'gyur la/ 'dod pa tshol zhing yid ches par mi 'gyuraro// log pa'i lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pa 'phel bar
163a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzang pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad pa 'thob pa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang / dbang med pa la dbang du bya ba'i don dang / dbang
163a5(rgyud): du gyur pa la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang / thabs mkha sa pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngags kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis
163a6(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di
163a7(rgyud): 'dri bar sems pa legaso legs so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi mchog tu gsang ba rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyod pa'i le'u ras ris kyi cho ga rab 'byam yod de/ snying po mchog rnams kyi don
163a8(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba dam pa don chen po sngags thams cad kyi cho gar gyur pa drug po 'di dag yi ge drug gi snying po'i mchog the tsom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag
163b1(rgyud): gdul ba'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa'i phyir dang / nges par yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa drug gis sngar gsungs
163b2(rgyud): shing da ltar yang ngas bshad de/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de gang zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
163b3(rgyud): shAkya thub pas sngags gsungs pa/ oM bA kyeR+Sha dza ya/ oM bA kye she sha swa/ oM bA kye ba~M dza ya/ oM bA kye niSh+Ta ya/ oM bA kye ya na maHoM bA kye de na maHde ltar 'di dag 'jam dpal gzhon
163b4(rgyud): nur gyur pa khyod kyi sngags drug dang / yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs mnyam pa/ snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba sems camathang
163b5(rgyud): kyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsu ngas pa/ dam tshig nyams pa dang / dam tshig g.yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam
163b6(rgyud): rjes su ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ mchog dang / 'bring dang / tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba/ legs par sbyangs pa'i las 'bras bu'i rnam par
163b7(rgyud): smin pa sbyin pa/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus su yang dngos grub 'thob par 'gyuraro// las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la skad cig don sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag myur du
163b8(rgyud): shin tu sbyor bar de'i tshe dang / de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyuraro// nyams sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'di dag sgrub par bya ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar 'grub
164a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jigs pa chen po dang / snyigs ma la sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 
164a2(rgyud): grags pa chung ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / longs spyod chung ba dang / longs spyod chung bas shin tu rgya che ba'i ras ris kyi cho ga'i sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te/ de dag gi phyir shin tu
164a3(rgyud): mdor bstan par bya'o// dang por re shig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dog pa srang gcig gam/ srang phyed kyis nyos la chur khru gang zhang du khru phyed tsam gyi ras kha tshar dang bcas pa tha ga pa 'thag tu
164a4(rgyud): gzhug go// yang na skra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzha na steng dang 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa khru gnyis dang / bzhi dang / drug dang / bcu dang / brgyad pa'i ras blangs te ji ltar
164a5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o// tshon ma 'dres pa dang / tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gyis bsgos te/ ras kyang tsan dan dang / ga pur dang / gur gum gcig tu
164a6(rgyud): byas pa srog chags med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te/ snod sar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs srung ba byas shing
164a7(rgyud): bdag nyid kyang gtsang bar byas te zla ba yang ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du shar du mngon par phyogs te/ ku sha'i khres la 'dug nas sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par
164a8(rgyud): bya ba la 'di lta ste/ oM hi he bA ga bAn ba hu rU pa d+ha ra/ di bya tsuk+Shu She/ a ba lo ka ya/ a ba lo ka ya/ oM ba lo ka ya/ mAM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri Ni ma hA bo d+hi satwa kin tsi rA
164b1(rgyud): ya si hUM s+tha te s+tha te swA hA/ sngags 'dis bzlas pa byas la de nyid du nyal bar bya'o// gnyid log pa'i rmi lam du 'grub pa 'am mi 'grub pa ston par 'gyuraro// de nas langs nas rmi lam du grub
164b2(rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma mthong na ring por mi thogs par ras ris bri bar bya'o// gal te grub pa'i mtshan ma rmi lam du ma mthong na ras de snod de las phyung la/ nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod sar pa
164b3(rgyud): gzhan du bcug la shin tu dben par legs par srung ba byas la bzhag go// de nas yang snying po'i mchog de dag las gang yang rung ba'i sngags blangs la gang 'dod pa'i yi ge drug pa yang
164b4(rgyud): yi ge 'bum bzla bar bya'o// de nas ras mi dge ba yang 'grub par 'gyuraro// dang por re shig ras de blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam/ yar ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar bzang
164b5(rgyud): po dang ldan pa'i chos grangs bzang po la 'phags pa 'jam dpal byis pa khye'u'i gzugs can mgo zur phung lnga dang ldan pa/ byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ mdog
164b6(rgyud): gser 'dra ba na bza' sngon po g.yo bzhin pa banabs pa/ na bza' dar la sngon pos stong g.yogs byas pa/ chos 'cha chad ga/ seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs la/ zhabs
164b7(rgyud): g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs rten la bzhag pa/ g.yon pa seng+ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan tha~Md dang ldan pa/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang bcas pa sgrub pa po la lta ba bri bar bya'o// g.yas
164b8(rgyud): phyog su 'phags pa kun tu bzang po rnga ma dkar po g.yob pa/ pri yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs lag pa g.yon pa na rin po che thogs pa lag pa zed mdzes pa rgyan thad kyis brgyan pa/ na
165a1(rgyud): bza' sngon po g.yo ba banabs pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi g.yon
165a2(rgyud): phyog su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston ka'i mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ na bza' sngon po g.yo ba banabs pa/ yan lag tha~Mng mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
165a3(rgyud): pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa ni pad+ma dkar po 'dzin pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rnga yab gser gyi yu ba can dkar po thogs pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad can
165a4(rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ de bzhi na du 'phags pa kun tu bzang po pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa gnyi ga yang de ltar bri bar bya'o// de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes
165a5(rgyud): pa'i pad+ma gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar la ni 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi seng ge'i khri dang / rin po che'i zhabs te no// gnyis pa'i pad+ma la 'phags pa
165a6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'o// gsum pa'i pad+ma la ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go/ pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin po che margad 'dra ba/ pad+ma'i me tog du ma bye ba dang / phyed tsam bye ba dang / kha
165a7(rgyud): bye ba dang ldan pa/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las skyes pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis pad+ma'i sdong bu la 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/ gdengs ka
165a8(rgyud): bdun gyis nye bar brgyan pa/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi stod mi la sbrul gyi gdengs kas mtshan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ lus phyed chu'i nang du nub pa
165b1(rgyud): nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis nye bar mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// mtsho chen po kun gyi 'og tu sgrub pa po ras ris kyi g.yas phyogs kyi mtha'i zur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi
165b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la lta ba/ spos snod lag na thogs pa/ mgo dang pus mo'i lhang nga 'dud pa/ cha byad dang kha dog snga ma ji lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng ras
165b3(rgyud): kyi zur gnyis su lha'i bu me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa na mkha' la lding ba/ sprin gyi nang nas byung ba/ me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thor ba shin tu mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi kho
165b4(rgyud): yug tu me tog nA ge sar la sogs pas rab tu gtor bar bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal chos 'chad pa dang
165b5(rgyud): 'phags pa kun tu bzang po dang / 'ang gas pa spyan ras gzigs lag na rdza yab g.yob pa ni bar bya'o// yang na sab pa po ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du
165b6(rgyud): ras ris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad ngam/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/ sgrub pa po ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar bri bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags pa
165b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal/ g.yas g.yon du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / kun tu bzang po ji ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o// yang na ji snyed pa'i ras kyi dum du mtho gang ngam/ 
165b8(rgyud): khru gang la bdag nyid dam/ gzhan gyis sam/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong byas pa 'am/ gso sbyong ma byas pa/ dad pa 'am/ ma dad pa 'am// gtsang ba 'am/ mi gtsang ba 'am / tshul khrims dang
166a1(rgyud): / ldan pa 'am/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri mo mkhan gyis kyang bri bar bya'o// bdag nyid dam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen par byas pa dang / dad pa dang byang chub tu sem
166a2(rgyud): bskyed pa ni nges par bya'o// de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du sdig pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te/ de ltar dad pa dang / de ltar gyur pas bsgrub par bya'o// sngags
166a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal po dang / sngags kyi lha dag 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no// gang phyir dad pa theg pa mchog/ gang gis rnam par 'dren pa mchog
166a4(rgyud): dad pa med pa'i mi la ni/ dkar po'i chos rnam sa mi skye ste/ sa bon tshig par gyur pa las// myu gu sngon po ji ba zhin no// nga dang ldan pa'i mi dag la// sangs rgyas las ni 'grub
166a5(rgyud): 'gyur te// sngags rnams thams cad khyad bar du// dad pa med la mi 'gru'o// gang yang 'jig rten lha dag dang // / de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa dag dang ldan kun la 'grub
166a6(rgyud): 'gyur te// sdig pa dag dang bral phyir ro// byang chub der song yid kyis ni// de dag myur du nges 'grub ste// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur zhing // bstan pa 'di la rnam par bzlog/ ras ni chung dang chen po
166a7(rgyud): dang // 'bring du nye bar bsgrags pa yin// las rnams kun la sgrub pa ni// da ni rab tu bstan par bya/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las 'phags pa
166a8(rgyud): 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga bdun pa'i le'u rab 'byam las ras ris kyi cho ga bzhi pa'i le'u rab 'byam rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
166b1(rgyud): gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gang khyod kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir le'u'i cho ga rab 'byam 'di thabs sla bas 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas kyang bstan te/ de dag gi don
166b2(rgyud): gyi phyir yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag gi dbye ba las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir yang dag par bshad par bya yis/ de legs par shin tu rab tu nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o// 
166b3(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gi tshig gi nus pa gsal bar mdzad cing sngags kyi spyod pa'i yon tan grub par mdzad pa ni legaso
166b4(rgyud): leg so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bsha da du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thang dang
166b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs te 'dzum pa mdzado// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / ljang gu dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu byung
166b6(rgyud): ste/ 'od zer de byung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rgyu skar gyi
166b7(rgyud): 'od dang / ri bo'i tshogs thaMd kyi 'od dang / gang 'di zla ba dang / nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyi mnan te mi gsal zhing 'od med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par mdzes par mi
166b8(rgyud): 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu thams cad dang / sngags dang / sman dang / rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas nas slar log ste/ bac+doMs shAkya thub pa'i zhal gyi sgor nub par gyur to// 
167a1(rgyud): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/ rings pa'i tshul gyis bcom
167a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kha 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum
167a3(rgyud): pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje de de bzhino// de de bzhin te
167a4(rgyud): ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ rgyu yod/ rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam
167a5(rgyud): dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rje su sgrub pa/ las thams cad yang dag par gzhol ga chos kyi sprin la rten pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rje su 'brang bar
167a6(rgyud): byed pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dad par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam la 'dri ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / bdug pa dang / 
167a7(rgyud): phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am/ tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag gam/ tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang
167a8(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems rgyud la thob pa 'am/ kha spu ldang bar byed pa 'am/ rig pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa 'am/ rje su yi rang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ spyod pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas bla na
167b1(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur bar lung bstan te/ des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi gzhan du ni ma yin no// 'dir dang por re shig tshe
167b2(rgyud): ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rtsa ba'i sngags sam/ snying po 'am/ nye ba'i snying po 'am/ sngags gang yang rung ba bzung nas yi
167b3(rgyud): ge gcig pa 'am/ gang 'dod pa dgon pa chen por song ste/ 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o// 'bras bu dang chus 'tsho ba 'am/ rtsa ba dang lo ma'i bza' ba byas na sngon du bya ba byas par 'gyur// 
167b4(rgyud): de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras ris chen po'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du lta ba gzhag pa byas la/ bdag nyid shar du bltas te ku sha'i khros la 'dug nas/ pad+ma
167b5(rgyud): dkar po la tsan dan dang / gur gum gyis btags te/ btso ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan
167b6(rgyud): thos dag la 'bum phrag gcig ri mo'i ras ris kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o// ga pur gyi bdug pa yang ci 'byor pas gdug go// lha'i bu dang / klu rnams la ji snyed pa'i me tog gis mchod
167b7(rgyud): par bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su cho 'phrul gyi zla phyed kyi zla ba nya la ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis me sbar nas gur gum
167b8(rgyud): dpa ga pur bsres pas sregs blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas srung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung ste/ ras kyi ri mo'i khor yug
168a1(rgyud): nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa pos gur gum dang / tsan dan gyis btags pa'i tsan dan dkar po'i me tog gis mchod yon dbu'o// de nas sgrub pa po rings pa'i
168a2(rgyud): tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag byas nas
168a3(rgyud): sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' mo'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o// de nas gzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te/ se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i
168a4(rgyud): 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te/ me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po
168a5(rgyud): dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo // chos kyang thos so// byang chub
168a6(rgyud): sems dpa' du ma dag kyang mthong zhing de dag la bsnyen bkur yang byed de/ bskal pa chen po stong du rga ba dang / 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyang de na gnas par 'gyuraro// / 
168a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag gi byin gyis brlabs par yang dag par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong yang 'dar
168a8(rgyud): bar byed do// lus stong yang ston par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang 'byin par byed do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// nges par byang chub la gzhol
168b1(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo rab 'byam sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u
168b2(rgyud): brgyad pa las dang po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ grogs
168b3(rgyud): po dag khyed cag nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor sngags sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa/ sgrub pa po bsrung ba'i phyir mchog tu gsang ba dam pa/ snying po
168b4(rgyud): dam pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis gsungs pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par gyur te/ kye lha'i tshogs dag 'di ni 'da' bar bya
168b5(rgyud): ba ma yin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la 'byor pa med par byed na/ byang chub sems
168b6(rgyud): dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad kyang 'jigs par byed de/ 'di ni stobs che ba dang / mthu che ba dang / dpa' bo gcig pa
168b7(rgyud): dang sngags thams cad kyi mchog gcig tu bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig pa bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig gis don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ bya ba thaMd byed pa/ sngags
168b8(rgyud): thams cad gcod par byed pa/ ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sngags thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa/ dge bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten dang / 
169a1(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa thogs pa med pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po// bsam pa thams cad yongs
169a2(rgyud): su rdzogs par byed pa de gang zhe na/ oM n+d+ri/ grogs po dag 'di nyid mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'da' bar bya ba
169a3(rgyud): ma yin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi thub par dka' ba/ 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag
169a4(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang phyug rnam par sdang ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang / skye bo tha~Md la snying brtse bar byed pa/ bgegs thams cad 'jig par
169a5(rgyud): byed pa ste/ mdor na ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyar ba de lta de ltar las byed de/ bsgrubs pa med kyang las 'grub par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di bzlas la reg pas de
169a6(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur ro// gos la sngags nas gon na skal ba bzang por 'gyuraro// so shing la bsngags na so nad nye bar zhi bar 'gyuraro// ka ra bi ra dkar po'i so shing la lan bdun bdun
169a7(rgyud): bsngags te zos na don du ma gnyer bar yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur// mig gi nad la rgyam che btags te lan 'dun mngon par bsngags la mig bkang na mig gi nang sel to// 
169a8(rgyud): rna ba'i nang la 'brug sgrogs pa las skyes pa'i rtsa tsha tri ka zhes bya ba glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par byas la/ rang gi lo ma'i nang du btums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin tu
169b1(rgyud): 'jam par byas la/ rgya ma tshwa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbrus te lan bdun sngags pas rna ba bkang ba dang / skad cig de nyid la rna ba nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bud med bu 'byung ba'i
169b2(rgyud): dus su mngal nas ma thon ton zhing nyam thag pa la ni shing A Da rU sha ka'i rtsa ba srog chags med pa'i chu la btags te lte ba'i phyogs su bskus na nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//
